x
The  
x

x
Hobbit  
x

x
is  
x

x
a  
x

x
tale  
x

x
of  
x

x
high  
x

x
adventure,  
x

x
undertaken  
x

x
by  
x

x
a  
x

x
company  
x

x
of  
x

x
dwarves,  
x

x
in  
x

x
search  
x

x
of  
x

x
dragon-guarded  
x

x
gold. 
x

x
A  
x

x
reluctant  
x

x
partner  
x

x
in  
x

x
this  
x

x
perilous  
x

x
quest  
x

x
is  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
Baggins,  
x

x
a  
x

x
comfort-  
x

x
loving,  
x

x
unambitious  
x

x
hobbit,  
x

x
who  
x

x
surprises  
x

x
even  
x

x
himself  
x

x
by  
x

x
his  
x

x
resourcefulness  
x

x
and  
x

x
his  
x

x
skill  
x

x
as  
x

x
a  
x

x
burglar. 
x

x
Encounters  
x

x
with  
x

x
trolls,  
x

x
goblins,  
x

x
dwarves,  
x

x
elves  
x

x
and  
x

x
giant  
x

x
spiders,  
x

x
conversations  
x

x
with  
x

x
the  
x

x
dragon,  
x

x
Smaug  
x

x
the  
x

x
Magnificent,  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
rather  
x

x
unwilling  
x

x
presence  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
Battle  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Five  
x

x
Armies  
x

x
are  
x

x
some  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
adventures  
x

x
that  
x

x
befall  
x

x
Bilbo. 
x

x
But  
x

x
there  
x

x
are  
x

x
lighter  
x

x
moments  
x

x
as  
x

x
well:  
x

x
good  
x

x
fellowship,  
x

x
welcome  
x

x
meals,  
x

x
laughter  
x

x
and  
x

x
song. 
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
Baggins  
x

x
has  
x

x
taken  
x

x
his  
x

x
place  
x

x
among  
x

x
the  
x

x
ranks  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
immortals  
x

x
of  
x

x
children’s  
x

x
fiction. 
x

x
Written  
x

x
for  
x

x
Professor  
x

x
Tolkien’s  
x

x
own  
x

x
children,  
x

x

x

x
Hobbit  
x

x
met  
x

x
with  
x

x
instant  
x

x
acclaim  
x

x
when  
x

x
published. 
x

x
It  
x

x
is  
x

x
a  
x

x
complete  
x

x
and  
x

x
marvellous  
x

x
tale  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Hobbit

was  
x

x

x

September  
x

x

x

x

x
1951  
x

x
second  
x

x
edition  
x

x
(fifth  
x

x

x

x
contains  
x

x
a  
x

x
significantly  
x

x
revised  
x

x
portion  
x

x
of  
x

x
 
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

Ballantine  
x

x

x
February  
x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
British  
x

x
third  
x

x

(sixteenth  
x

x

x
George  
x

Allen  
x

&  
x

x
Unwin  
x

later  
x

x

x

x

x

x

the  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
The  
x

x
Hobbit  
x

x
was  
x

x
entered  
x

x

x

x

x

x
files,  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
line  
x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

This  
x

x
is  
x

x
a  
x

x
story  
x

x
of  
x

x
long  
x

x
ago. 
x

x

x

x
that  
x

x
time  
x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
letters  
x

x
were  
x

x
quite  
x

x
different  
x

x
from  
x

x
ours  
x

x
of  
x

x
today. 
x

x

x

x
is  
x

x
used  
x

x
to  
x

x
represent  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

(1)  
x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
only  
x

x
correct  
x

x
plural  
x

x
of  
x

x
dwarf  
x

x
is  
x

x
dwarfs,  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
adjective  
x

x
is  
x

x
dwarfish. 
x

x
In  
x

x
this  
x

x
story  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
and  
x

x
dvarvish  
x

x
are  
x

x
used-,  
x

x
but  
x

x
only  
x

x
when  
x

x
speaking  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
ancient  
x

x
people  
x

x
to  
x

x
whom  
x

x
Thorin  
x

x
Oakenshield  
x

and  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Ore  
x

x
is  
x

x
not  
x

x
an  
x

x

x

x
word. 
x

x
It  
x

x

x

x
in  
x

x
one  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
usually  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
is  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbits’  
x

x
form  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
name  
x

x
given  
x

x
at  
x

x
that  
x

x

x

x

x

x
these  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
is  
x

x
not  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
our  
x

x
ore,  
x

x
ork,  
x

x
applied  
x

x
to  
x

x
sea-animals  
x

x
of  
x

x
dolphin-kind. 
x

x
Runes  
x

x
were  
x

x
old  
x

x
letters  
x

x

x

x
used  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

On  
x

x
the  
x

x
Map  
x

x
the  
x

x
compass  
x

x
points  
x

x
are  
x

x
marked  
x

x
in  
x

x
runes,  
x

x
with  
x

x
East  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
top,  
x

x
as  
x

x
usual  
x

x
in  
x

x
dwarf-maps,  
x

x
and  
x

x
so  
x

x
read  
x

x
clockwise:  
x

x
E(ast),  
x

x
  
x

x
S(outh),  
x

x
W(est),  
x

x
N(orth). 
x

x

x

x

x

x
Chapter  
x

x
I  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
AN  
x

x
UNEXPECTED  
x

x
PARTY  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
In  
x

x
a  
x

x
hole  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
ground  
x

x
there  
x

x
lived  
x

x
a  
x

x
hobbit. 
x

x
Not  
x

x
  
x

x
a  
x

x
nasty,  
x

x
dirty,  
x

x
wet  
x

x
hole,  
x

x
filled  
x

x
with  
x

x
the  
x

x
ends  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
worms  
x

x
and  
x

x
an  
x

x
oozy  
x

x
smell,  
x

x
nor  
x

x
yet  
x

x
a  
x

x
dry,  
x

x
bare,  
x

x
  
x

x
sandy  
x

x
hole  
x

x
with  
x

x
nothing  
x

x
in  
x

x
it  
x

x
to  
x

x
sit  
x

x
down  
x

x
on  
x

x
or  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
eat:  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
hobbit-hole,  
x

x
and  
x

x
that  
x

x
means  
x

x
  
x

x
comfort. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
It  
x

x
had  
x

x
a  
x

x
perfectly  
x

x
round  
x

x
door  
x

x
like  
x

x
a  
x

x
porthole,  
x

x
  
x

x
painted  
x

x
green,  
x

x
with  
x

x
a  
x

x
shiny  
x

x
yellow  
x

x
brass  
x

x
knob  
x

x
in  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
exact  
x

x
middle. 
x

x
The  
x

x
door  
x

x
opened  
x

x
on  
x

x
to  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
tube-shaped  
x

x
hall  
x

x
like  
x

x
a  
x

x
tunnel:  
x

x
a  
x

x
very  
x

x
  
x

x
comfortable  
x

x
tunnel  
x

x
without  
x

x
smoke,  
x

x
with  
x

x
panelled  
x

x
  
x

x
walls,  
x

x
and  
x

x
floors  
x

x
tiled  
x

x
and  
x

x
carpeted,  
x

x
provided  
x

x
  
x

x
with  
x

x
polished  
x

x
chairs,  
x

x
and  
x

x
lots  
x

x
and  
x

x
lots  
x

x
of  
x

x
pegs  
x

x
  
x

x
for  
x

x
hats  
x

x
and  
x

x
coats  
x

x
—  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbit  
x

x
was  
x

x
fond  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
visitors. 
x

x
The  
x

x
tunnel  
x

x
wound  
x

x
on  
x

x
and  
x

x
on,  
x

x
going  
x

x
  
x

x
fairly  
x

x
but  
x

x
not  
x

x
quite  
x

x
straight  
x

x
into  
x

x
the  
x

x
side  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
hill  
x

x
  
x

x
—  
x

x
The  
x

x
Hill,  
x

x
as  
x

x
all  
x

x
the  
x

x
people  
x

x
for  
x

x
many  
x

x
miles  
x

x
  
x

x
round  
x

x
called  
x

x
it  
x

x
—  
x

x
and  
x

x
many  
x

x
little  
x

x
round  
x

x
doors  
x

x
  
x

x
opened  
x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x
it,  
x

x
first  
x

x
on  
x

x
one  
x

x
side  
x

x
and  
x

x
then  
x

x
on  
x

x
  
x

x
another. 
x

x
No  
x

x
going  
x

x
upstairs  
x

x
for  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbit:  
x

x
  
x

x
bedrooms,  
x

x
bathrooms,  
x

x
cellars,  
x

x
pantries  
x

x
(lots  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
these),  
x

x
wardrobes  
x

x
(he  
x

x
had  
x

x
whole  
x

x
rooms  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
devoted  
x

x
to  
x

x
clothes),  
x

x
kitchens,  
x

x
dining-rooms,  
x

x
all  
x

x
  
x

x
were  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
same  
x

x
floor,  
x

x
and  
x

x
indeed  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
same  
x

x
passage. 
x

x
The  
x

x
best  
x

x
rooms  
x

x
were  
x

x
all  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
left-hand  
x

x
side  
x

x
(going  
x

x
in),  
x

x
for  
x

x
these  
x

x
were  
x

x
the  
x

x
only  
x

x
  
x

x
ones  
x

x
to  
x

x
have  
x

x
windows,  
x

x
deep-set  
x

x
round  
x

x
  
x

x
windows  
x

x
looking  
x

x
over  
x

x
his  
x

x
garden,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
meadows  
x

x
beyond,  
x

x
sloping  
x

x
down  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
river. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
This  
x

x
hobbit  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
very  
x

x
well-to-do  
x

x
hobbit,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
his  
x

x
name  
x

x
was  
x

x
Baggins. 
x

x
The  
x

x
Bagginses  
x

x
  
x

x
had  
x

x
lived  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
neighbourhood  
x

x
of  
x

x
The  
x

x
Hill  
x

x
for  
x

x
  
x

x
time  
x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x
mind,  
x

x
and  
x

x
people  
x

x
considered  
x

x
them  
x

x
  
x

x
very  
x

x
respectable,  
x

x
not  
x

x
only  
x

x
because  
x

x
most  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
them  
x

x
were  
x

x
rich,  
x

x
but  
x

x
also  
x

x
because  
x

x
they  
x

x
never  
x

x
  
x

x
had  
x

x
any  
x

x
adventures  
x

x
or  
x

x
did  
x

x
anything  
x

x
unexpected:  
x

x
  
x

x
you  
x

x
could  
x

x
tell  
x

x
what  
x

x
a  
x

x
Baggins  
x

x
would  
x

x
say  
x

x
on  
x

x
any  
x

x
  
x

x
question  
x

x
without  
x

x
the  
x

x
bother  
x

x
of  
x

x
asking  
x

x
him. 
x

x
This  
x

x
  
x

x
is  
x

x
a  
x

x
story  
x

x
of  
x

x
how  
x

x
a  
x

x
Baggins  
x

x
had  
x

x
an  
x

x
adventure,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
found  
x

x
himself  
x

x
doing  
x

x
and  
x

x
saying  
x

x
things  
x

x
  
x

x
altogether  
x

x
unexpected. 
x

x
He  
x

x
may  
x

x
have  
x

x
lost  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
neighbours’  
x

x
respect,  
x

x
but  
x

x
he  
x

x
gained  
x

x
—  
x

x
well,  
x

x
you  
x

x
  
x

x
will  
x

x
see  
x

x
whether  
x

x
he  
x

x
gained  
x

x
anything  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
end. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
mother  
x

x
of  
x

x
our  
x

x
particular  
x

x
hobbit  
x

x
—  
x

x
what  
x

x
is  
x

x
  
x

x
a  
x

x
hobbit?  
x

x
I  
x

x
suppose  
x

x
hobbits  
x

x
need  
x

x
some  
x

x
  
x

x
description  
x

x
nowadays,  
x

x
since  
x

x
they  
x

x
have  
x

x
become  
x

x
  
x

x
rare  
x

x
and  
x

x
shy  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Big  
x

x
People,  
x

x
as  
x

x
they  
x

x
call  
x

x
us. 
x

x
  
x

x
They  
x

x
are  
x

x
(or  
x

x
were)  
x

x
a  
x

x
little  
x

x
people,  
x

x
about  
x

x
half  
x

x
our  
x

x
  
x

x
height,  
x

x
and  
x

x
smaller  
x

x
than  
x

x
the  
x

x
bearded  
x

x
Dwarves. 
x

x
  
x

x
Hobbits  
x

x
have  
x

x
no  
x

x
beards. 
x

x
There  
x

x
is  
x

x
little  
x

x
or  
x

x
no  
x

x
  
x

x
magic  
x

x
about  
x

x
them,  
x

x
except  
x

x
the  
x

x
ordinary  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
everyday  
x

x
sort  
x

x
which  
x

x
helps  
x

x
them  
x

x
to  
x

x
disappear  
x

x
  
x

x
quietly  
x

x
and  
x

x
quickly  
x

x
when  
x

x
large  
x

x
stupid  
x

x
folk  
x

x
like  
x

x
  
x

x
you  
x

x
and  
x

x
me  
x

x
come  
x

x
blundering  
x

x
along,  
x

x
making  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
noise  
x

x
like  
x

x
elephants  
x

x
which  
x

x
they  
x

x
can  
x

x
hear  
x

x
a  
x

x
mile  
x

x
  
x

x
off. 
x

x
They  
x

x
are  
x

x
inclined  
x

x
to  
x

x
be  
x

x
fat  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
stomach;  
x

x
  
x

x
they  
x

x
dress  
x

x
in  
x

x
bright  
x

x
colours  
x

x
(chiefly  
x

x
green  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
yellow);  
x

x
wear  
x

x
no  
x

x
shoes,  
x

x
because  
x

x
their  
x

x
feet  
x

x
grow  
x

x
  
x

x
natural  
x

x
leathery  
x

x
soles  
x

x
and  
x

x
thick  
x

x
warm  
x

x
brown  
x

x
  
x

x
hair  
x

x
like  
x

x
the  
x

x
stuff  
x

x
on  
x

x
their  
x

x
heads  
x

x
(which  
x

x
is  
x

x
curly);  
x

x
  
x

x
have  
x

x
long  
x

x
clever  
x

x
brown  
x

x
fingers,  
x

x
good-natured  
x

x
  
x

x
faces,  
x

x
and  
x

x
laugh  
x

x
deep  
x

x
fruity  
x

x
laughs  
x

x
(especially  
x

x
  
x

x
after  
x

x
dinner,  
x

x
which  
x

x
they  
x

x
have  
x

x
twice  
x

x
a  
x

x
day  
x

x
when  
x

x
  
x

x
they  
x

x
can  
x

x
get  
x

x
it). 
x

x
Now  
x

x
you  
x

x
know  
x

x
enough  
x

x
to  
x

x
go  
x

x
on  
x

x
  
x

x
with. 
x

x
As  
x

x
I  
x

x
was  
x

x
saying,  
x

x
the  
x

x
mother  
x

x
of  
x

x
this  
x

x
hobbit  
x

x
  
x

x
—  
x

x
of  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
Baggins,  
x

x
that  
x

x
is  
x

x
—  
x

x
was  
x

x
the  
x

x
famous  
x

x
  
x

x
Belladonna  
x

x
Took,  
x

x
one  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
three  
x

x
remarkable  
x

x
  
x

x
daughters  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Old  
x

x
Took,  
x

x
head  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbits  
x

x
  
x

x
who  
x

x
lived  
x

x
across  
x

x
The  
x

x
Water,  
x

x
the  
x

x
small  
x

x
river  
x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x
ran  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
foot  
x

x
of  
x

x
The  
x

x
Hill. 
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
often  
x

x
said  
x

x
(in  
x

x
  
x

x
other  
x

x
families)  
x

x
that  
x

x
long  
x

x
ago  
x

x
one  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Took  
x

x
  
x

x
ancestors  
x

x
must  
x

x
have  
x

x
taken  
x

x
a  
x

x
fairy  
x

x
wife. 
x

x
That  
x

x
  
x

x
was,  
x

x
of  
x

x
course,  
x

x
absurd,  
x

x
but  
x

x
certainly  
x

x
there  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
still  
x

x
something  
x

x
not  
x

x
entirely  
x

x
hobbitlike  
x

x
about  
x

x
  
x

x
them,  
x

x
and  
x

x
once  
x

x
in  
x

x
a  
x

x
while  
x

x
members  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
Took-clan  
x

x
would  
x

x
go  
x

x
and  
x

x
have  
x

x
adventures. 
x

x
They  
x

x
  
x

x
discreetly  
x

x
disappeared,

x
it

x

remembered!  
x

x
He  
x

x
rushed  
x

x
and  
x

x
put  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
kettle,  
x

x
and  
x

x
put  
x

x
out  
x

x
another  
x

x
cup  
x

x
and  
x

x
saucer,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
an  
x

x
extra  
x

x
cake  
x

x
or  
x

x
two,  
x

x
and  
x

x
ran  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
door. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“I  
x

x
am  
x

x
so  
x

x
sorry  
x

x
to  
x

x
keep  
x

x
you  
x

x
waiting!”  
x

x
he  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
going  
x

x
to  
x

x
say,  
x

x
when  
x

x
he  
x

x
saw  
x

x
that  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
not  
x

x
  
x

x
Gandalf  
x

x
at  
x

x
all. 
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
dwarf  
x

x
with  
x

x
a  
x

x
blue  
x

x

x

x
tucked  
x

x
into  
x

x

x

x
golden  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
very  
x

x

x

x
eyes  
x

x
  
x

x
under  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
soon  
x

x
as  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
he  
x

x
pushed  
x

x
inside,  
x

x
just  
x

x
as  
x

x
if  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
had  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
hung  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

cloak  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
nearest  
x

x
  
x

x
peg,  
x

x
and  
x

x
“Dwalin  
x

x
at  
x

x
your  
x

x
service!”  
x

x
he  
x

x
said  
x

x
with  
x

x
  
x

x
a  
x

x
low  
x

x
bow. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Bilbo  
x

x
Baggins  
x

x
at  
x

x
yours!”  
x

x
said  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbit,  
x

x
  
x

x
too  
x

x
surprised  
x

x
to  
x

x
ask  
x

x
any  
x

x
questions  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“I  
x

x

x

x
just  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
have  
x

x
some  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“Balin

x

x

x
  
x

x
“Thank  
x

x

x

x
said  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
with  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

a

x

x

x

x

x

x

“Come

x

x

x

“A

“Gandalf  
x

x
for  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Kili  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

“Dwalin  
x

x
and  
x

x
Balin  
x

x
here  
x

x
already,  
x

x
I  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
Kili. 
x

x
“Let  
x

x

x

x
join  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Throng!”  
x

x
thought  
x

x
Mr. 
x

x
Baggins. 
x

x
“I  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
corner,  
x

x
while  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
four  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
sat  
x

x
round  
x

x
the  
x

x
table,  
x

x
and  
x

x
talked  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
about  
x

x
mines  
x

x
and  
x

x
gold  
x

x
and  
x

x
troubles  
x

x
with  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
goblins,  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
depredations  
x

x
of  
x

x
dragons,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
lots  
x

x
of  
x

x
other  
x

x
things  
x

x
which  
x

x
he  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
understand,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
want  
x

x
to,  
x

x
for  
x

x
they  
x

x
sounded  
x

x
much  
x

x
too  
x

x
  
x

x
adventurous  
x

x
—  
x

x
when,  
x

x
ding-dong-a-ling-dang,  
x

x
  
x

x
his  
x

x
bell  
x

x
rang  
x

x
again,  
x

x
as  
x

x
if  
x

x
some  
x

x
naughty  
x

x
little  
x

x
  
x

x
hobbit-boy  
x

x
was  
x

x
trying  
x

x
to  
x

x
pull  
x

x
the  
x

x
handle  
x

x
off. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Someone  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
door!”  
x

x
he  
x

x
said,  
x

x
blinking. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Some  
x

x
four,  
x

x
I  
x

x
should  
x

x
say  
x

x
by  
x

x
the  
x

x
sound,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
  
x

x
Fili. 
x

x
“Besides,  
x

x
we  
x

x
saw  
x

x
them  
x

x
coming  
x

x
along  
x

x
  
x

x
behind  
x

x
us  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
distance.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
poor  
x

x
little  
x

x
hobbit  
x

x
sat  
x

x
down  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
hall  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
put  
x

x
his  
x

x
head  
x

x
in  
x

x
his  
x

x
hands,  
x

x
and  
x

x
wondered  
x

x
  
x

x
what  
x

x
had  
x

x
happened,  
x

x
and  
x

x
what  
x

x
was  
x

x
going  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
happen,  
x

x
and  
x

x
whether  
x

x
they  
x

x
would  
x

x
all  
x

x
stay  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
supper. 
x

x
Then  
x

x
the  
x

x
bell  
x

x
rang  
x

x
again  
x

x
louder  
x

x
than  
x

x
  
x

x
ever,  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
to  
x

x
run  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
door. 
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
not  
x

x
  
x

x
four  
x

x
after  
x

x
all,  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
five. 
x

x
Another  
x

x
dwarf  
x

x
had  
x

x
  
x

x
come  
x

x
along  
x

x
while  
x

x
he  
x

x
was  
x

x
wondering  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
hall. 
x

x
  
x

x
He  
x

x
had  
x

x
hardly  
x

x
turned  
x

x
the  
x

x
knob,  
x

x
before  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
  
x

x
all  
x

x
inside,  
x

x
bowing  
x

x
and  
x

x
saying  
x

x
“at  
x

x
your  
x

x
service”  
x

x
  
x

x
one  
x

x
after  
x

x
another. 
x

x
Dori,  
x

x
Nori,  
x

x
Ori,  
x

x
Oin,  
x

x
and  
x

x
Gloin  
x

x
  
x

x
were  
x

x
their  
x

x
names;  
x

x
and  
x

x
very  
x

x
soon  
x

x
two  
x

x
purple  
x

x
  
x

x
hoods,  
x

x
a  
x

x
grey  
x

x

x

x
a  
x

x
brown  
x

x
hood,  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
white  
x

x
  
x

x
hood  
x

x
were  
x

x
hanging  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
pegs,  
x

x
and  
x

x
off  
x

x
they  
x

x
  
x

x
marched  
x

x
with  
x

x
their  
x

x
broad  
x

x
hands  
x

x
stuck  
x

x
in  
x

x
their  
x

x
  
x

x
gold  
x

x
and  
x

x
silver  
x

x
belts  
x

x
to  
x

x
join  
x

x
the  
x

x
others. 
x

x
Already  
x

x
it  
x

x
  
x

x
had  
x

x
almost  
x

x
become  
x

x
a  
x

x
throng. 
x

x
Some  
x

x
called  
x

x
for  
x

x
  
x

x
ale,  
x

x
and  
x

x
some  
x

x
for  
x

x
porter,  
x

x
and  
x

x
one  
x

x
for  
x

x
coffee,  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
all  
x

x
of  
x

x
them  
x

x
for  
x

x
cakes;  
x

x
so  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbit  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
kept  
x

x
very  
x

x
busy  
x

x
for  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
A  
x

x
big  
x

x
jug  
x

x
of  
x

x
coffee  
x

x
had  
x

x
just  
x

x
been  
x

x
set  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
hearth,  
x

x
the  
x

x
seed-cakes  
x

x
were  
x

x
gone,  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
were  
x

x
starting  
x

x
on  
x

x
a  
x

x
round  
x

x
of  
x

x
buttered  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
when  
x

x
there  
x

x
came  
x

x
—  
x

x
a  
x

x
loud  
x

x
knock. 
x

x
Not  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
ring,  
x

x
but  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
rat-tat  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbit’s  
x

x
beautiful  
x

x
  
x

x
green  
x

x
door. 
x

x
Somebody  
x

x
was  
x

x
banging  
x

x
with  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
stick!  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
rushed  
x

x
along  
x

x
the  
x

x
passage,  
x

x
very  
x

x
angry,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
altogether  
x

x
bewildered  
x

x
and  
x

x
bewuthered  
x

x
—  
x

x
  
x

x
this  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
most  
x

x
awkward  
x

x
Wednesday  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
pulled  
x

x
open  
x

x

x

x
door  
x

x
with  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
they  
x

x
all  
x

x
fell  
x

x
in,  
x

x
one  
x

x
on  
x

x
top  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
other. 
x

x
  
x

x
More  
x

x
dwarves,  
x

x
four  
x

x
more!  
x

x
And  
x

x
there  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
Gandalf  
x

x
behind,  
x

x

x

x
on  
x

x
his  
x

x
staff  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
He  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
also,

x

x
the

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Carefully!  
x

x
Carefully!”  
x

x
he  
x

x
said. 
x

x
“It  
x

x

x

x
not  
x

x

Bofur,  
x

x
Bombur,  
x

x

x

x

x

Thorin!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“At  
x

x
your  
x

x
service!”  
x

x
said  
x

x
Bifur,  
x

x
Bofur,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
Bombur  
x

x
standing  
x

x
in  
x

x
a  
x

x
row. 
x

x
Then  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

Thorin,

x

in

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
mat  
x

x
with  
x

x
Bifur,  
x

x
  
x

x
Bofur,  
x

x
and  
x

x
Bombur  
x

x
on  
x

x

x

x

x

him. 
x

For  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Thorin  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
was  
x

x
very  
x

x
haughty,  
x

x
and  
x

x
said  
x

x
nothing  
x

x
  
x

x
about  
x

x
service',  
x

x
but  
x

x
poor  
x

x
Mr. 
x

x
Baggins  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“pray  
x

x
don’t  
x

x
mention  
x

x
it,”  
x

x
and  
x

x
stopped  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Now  
x

x
we  
x

x
are  
x

x
all  
x

x

x

x
said  
x

x
Gandalf,  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
row  
x

x
of  
x

x
thirteen  
x

x
hoods  
x

x
—  
x

x

x

x
best  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

and  
x

x
his  
x

x
own  
x

x
hat  
x

x
  
x

x
hanging  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
pegs. 
x

x
“Quite  
x

x
a  
x

x
merry  
x

x
gathering!  
x

x
I  
x

x
  
x

x
hope  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
What’s  
x

x
that?  
x

x
Tea!  
x

x
No  
x

x
thank  
x

x
  
x

x
you!  
x

x
A  
x

x

x

x
red  
x

x
wine,  
x

x
I  
x

x
think  
x

x
for  
x

x
me.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“And  
x

x
for  
x

x

x

x

x

x
Thorin. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“And  
x

x
raspberry  
x

x
jam  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“And  
x

x
mince-pies  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x
“And  
x

x
pork-pie  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x
Bombur. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“And  
x

x
more  
x

x
cakes  
x

x
—  
x

x

x

x
ale  
x

x
—  
x

and  
x

x
coffee,  
x

x
if  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
called  
x

x
the  
x

x
other  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Put  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
Gandalf  
x

x
called  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“And  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x
the  
x

x
warriors  
x

x
—  
x

x
the  
x

x
usual  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
too  
x

x

x

x

x

x
back  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

you!”

“Hear,

x

x

x

x

x

x

him  
x

x
up  
x

(“but  
x

x
  
x

x
with  
x

x
never  
x

x
a  
x

x
thank-you”  
x

he  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“Don't  
x

x

x

Bilbo  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
began  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
to  
x

x

x

x
about  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
night  
x

x
before. 
x

x

x

x
fact  
x

x

x

x
was  
x

x
just  
x

x

x

x
down  
x

x
to  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
nice  
x

x
little  
x

x
second  
x

x
breakfast  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
by  
x

x
the  
x

x
open  
x

x
window,  
x

x
when  
x

x
in  
x

x
walked  
x

x
Gandalf. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“My  
x

x
dear  
x

x
fellow,”  
x

x
said  
x

x

x

x
“whenever  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

—  
x

x

x

x

x

x
are  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
message,

x

Then  
x

x
they  
x

x
came  
x

x
to  
x

x
lands  
x

x
where  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
people  
x

x
spoke  
x

x
strangely,  
x

x
and  
x

x
sang  
x

x
songs  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
  
x

x
had  
x

x
never  
x

x
heard  
x

x
before. 
x

x
Now  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
gone  
x

x
on  
x

x
  
x

x
far  
x

x
into  
x

x
the  
x

x
Lone-lands,  
x

x
where  
x

x
there  
x

x
were  
x

x
no  
x

x
  
x

x
people  
x

x
left,  
x

x
no  
x

x
inns,  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
roads  
x

x
grew  
x

x
steadily  
x

x
  
x

x
worse. 
x

x
Not  
x

x
far  
x

x
ahead  
x

x
were  
x

x
dreary  
x

x
hills,  
x

x
rising  
x

x
  
x

x
higher  
x

x
and  
x

x
higher,  
x

x
dark  
x

x
with  
x

x
trees. 
x

x
On  
x

x
some  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
them  
x

x
were  
x

x
old  
x

x
castles  
x

x
with  
x

x
an  
x

x
evil  
x

x
look,  
x

x
as  
x

x
if  
x

x
  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
been  
x

x
built  
x

x
by  
x

x
wicked  
x

x
people. 
x

x
  
x

x
Everything  
x

x
seemed  
x

x
gloomy,  
x

x
for  
x

x
the  
x

x
weather  
x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x
day  
x

x
had  
x

x
taken  
x

x
a  
x

x
nasty  
x

x
turn. 
x

x
Mostly  
x

x
it  
x

x
had  
x

x
been  
x

x
  
x

x
as  
x

x
good  
x

x
as  
x

x
May  
x

x
can  
x

x
be,  
x

x
can  
x

x
be,  
x

x
even  
x

x
in  
x

x
merry  
x

x
  
x

x
tales,  
x

x
but  
x

x
now  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
cold  
x

x
and  
x

x
wet. 
x

x
In  
x

x
the  
x

x
Lone-  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
had  
x

x
been  
x

x
obliged  
x

x
to  
x

x
camp  
x

x
when  
x

x
they  
x

x
  
x

x
could,  
x

x
but  
x

x
at  
x

x
least  
x

x
it  
x

x
had  
x

x
been  
x

x
dry. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“To  
x

x
think  
x

x
it  
x

x
will  
x

x
soon  
x

x
be  
x

x
June!”  
x

x
grumbled  
x

x
  
x

x
Bilbo,  
x

x
as  
x

x
he  
x

x
splashed  
x

x
along  
x

x
behind  
x

x
the  
x

x
others  
x

x
  
x

x
in  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x
track. 
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
after  
x

x
tea-time;  
x

x
it  
x

x
  
x

x
was  
x

x
pouring  
x

x
with  
x

x
rain,  
x

x
and  
x

x
had  
x

x
been  
x

x
all  
x

x
day;  
x

x
his  
x

x
  
x

x
hood  
x

x
was  
x

x
dripping  
x

x
into  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x
his  
x

x
cloak  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
full  
x

x
of  
x

x
water;  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x
tired  
x

x

stumbled  
x

x
on  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
others  
x

x
were  
x

x
too  
x

x

x

x

x

x

“And  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
thought  
x

x

x
“Bother  
x

x
  
x

x
burgling  
x

x
and  
x

x
everything  
x

x
to  
x

x
do  
x

x
with  
x

x
it!  
x

x
I  
x

x
wish  
x

x
I  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
at  
x

x
home  
x

x

x

x
my  
x

x

x

x

x

x
by  
x

x
the  
x

x
fire,  
x

x
with  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
kettle  
x

x
just  
x

x
beginning  
x

x
to  
x

x
sing!”  
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
not  
x

x
the  
x

x
last  
x

x
  
x

x
time  
x

x
that  
x

x
he  
x

x
wished  
x

x
that!  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Still  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
jogged  
x

x
on,  
x

x
never  
x

x
turning  
x

x
  
x

x
round  
x

x
or  
x

x
taking  
x

x
any  
x

x
notice  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbit. 
x

x
  
x

x
Somewhere  
x

x
behind  
x

x
the  
x

x
grey  
x

clouds  
x

x

x
sun  
x

x

must  
x

x
have  
x

x
gone  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

dark  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
up,  
x

x
and  
x

x
willows  
x

x
along  
x

x
  
x

x
its  
x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
Fortunately  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
went  
x

x

x

x

x

x

for  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
all

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
said  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
down  
x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
Then  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
understood. 
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
the  
x

x
wizard's  
x

x
voice  
x

x
that  
x

x
had  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
came  
x

x
and  
x

x
made  
x

x
an  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
thing  
x

x
was  
x

x
to  
x

x
untie  
x

x
the  
x

x
sacks  
x

x
and  
x

x
let  
x

x
  
x

x
out  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves. 
x

x
They  
x

x
were  
x

x
nearly  
x

x
suffocated,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
very  
x

x

x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
not  
x

x
at  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
trolls  
x

x
making  
x

x
plans  
x

x
for  
x

x
  
x

x
roasting  
x

x
them  
x

x
and  
x

x
squashing  
x

x
them  
x

x
and  
x

x
mincing  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
to  
x

x

x

Bilbo's  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
over,

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
were  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Silly  
x

x
time  
x

x
to  
x

x
go  
x

x
practising  
x

x
pinching  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
pocket-picking,”  
x

x

x

x
Bombur,  
x

x
“when  
x

x

x

x
we  
x

x
  
x

wanted  
x

x
was  
x

x
fire  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

“And  
x

x

x

x
just  
x

x
what  
x

x
you  
x

x
wouldn't  
x

x
have  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x
those  
x

x

x

x
without  
x

x
a  
x

x
struggle,  
x

x
in  
x

x
any  
x

x
case,”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
said  
x

Gandalf. 
x

x
“Anyhow  
x

x

x

x
are  
x

x
wasting  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
now. 
x

x
Don't  
x

x

x

x
realize  
x

x
that  
x

x
the  
x

x
trolls  
x

x
must  
x

x
have  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
cave  
x

x

x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x
somewhere  
x

x

x

x

x
hide  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
in?  
x

x
We  
x

x
must  
x

x
look  
x

x
into  
x

x
it!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
They  
x

x

x

x
about,  
x

x
and  
x

x
soon  
x

x
found  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
marks  
x

x
of  
x

x
trolls'  
x

x
stony  
x

x
boots  
x

x
going  
x

x
away  
x

x
through  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
trees. 
x

x
They  
x

x
followed  
x

x
the  
x

x
tracks  
x

x
up  
x

x
the  
x

x
hill,  
x

x
  
x

x
until  
x

x
hidden  
x

x
by  
x

x
bushes  
x

x
they  
x

x
came  
x

x
on  
x

x
a  
x

x
big  
x

x
door  
x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x
stone  
x

x
leading  
x

x
to  
x

x
a  
x

x
cave. 
x

x
But  
x

x
they  
x

x
could  
x

x
not  
x

x
  
x

x
open  
x

x
it,  
x

x
not  
x

x
though  
x

x
they  
x

x
all  
x

x
pushed  
x

x
while  
x

x
  
x

x
Gandalf  
x

x
tried  
x

x
various  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Would  
x

x
this  
x

x
be  
x

x
any  
x

x

x

x
asked  
x

Bilbo,  
x

x
  
x

when  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
getting  
x

x
tired  
x

x

x

x
angry. 
x

x
“I  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
it  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
ground  
x

x
where  
x

x
the  
x

x
trolls  
x

x
had  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
though  
x

x
no  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

had  
x

x

x
it  
x

x
very  
x

x
small  
x

and

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“Why  
x

x

x

x

x
mention  
x

x
it  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
it  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

one

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“but

x

x

“Don't  
x

“You  
x

x

x

x

x

x
saying  
x

x
I  
x

x
met  
x

x
two  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
Elrond's  
x

x
people. 
x

x
They  
x

x
were  
x

x
hurrying  
x

x
along  
x

x
for  
x

x
  
x

x
fear  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
trolls. 
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
they  
x

x
who  
x

x
told  
x

x
me  
x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x
three  
x

x
of  
x

x
them  
x

x
had  
x

x
come  
x

x
down  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
mountains  
x

x
and  
x

x
settled  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
woods  
x

x
not  
x

x
far  
x

x
from  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
road:  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
frightened  
x

x
everyone  
x

x
away  
x

x
  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
district,  
x

x
and  
x

x
they  
x

x
waylaid  
x

x
strangers. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“I  
x

x
immediately  
x

x
had  
x

x
a  
x

x
feeling  
x

x
that  
x

x
I  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
back. 
x

x

x

x

x

x
I  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
made  
x

x
for  
x

x

x

x
So  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“Thank

ravines  
x

x
that  
x

x
one  
x

x
could  
x

x
neither  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

story-telling,  
x

x
or  
x

x
singing,  
x

x
or  
x

x
  
x

x
just  
x

x
sitting  
x

x
and  
x

x
thinking  
x

x
best,  
x

x
or  
x

x
a  
x

x
pleasant  
x

x
  
x

x
mixture  
x

x
of  
x

x
them  
x

x
all. 
x

x
Evil  
x

x
things  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
come  
x

x
into  
x

x
  
x

x
that  
x

x
valley. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
I  
x

x
wish  
x

x
I  
x

x
had  
x

x
time  
x

x
to  
x

x
tell  
x

x
you  
x

x
even  
x

x
a  
x

x
few  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
tales  
x

x
or  
x

x
one  
x

x
or  
x

x
two  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
songs  
x

x
that  
x

x
they  
x

x
heard  
x

x
  
x

x
in  
x

x
that  
x

x
house. 
x

x
All  
x

x
of  
x

x
them,  
x

x
the  
x

x
ponies  
x

x
as  
x

x
well,  
x

x
  
x

x
grew  
x

x
refreshed  
x

x
and  
x

x
strong  
x

x
in  
x

x
a  
x

x
few  
x

x
days  
x

x
there. 
x

x
  
x

x
Their  
x

x
clothes  
x

x
were  
x

x
mended  
x

x
as  
x

x
well  
x

x
as  
x

x
their  
x

x
  
x

x
bruises,  
x

x
their  
x

x
tempers  
x

x
and  
x

x
their  
x

x
hopes. 
x

x
Their  
x

x
  
x

x
bags  
x

x
were  
x

x
filled  
x

x
with  
x

x
food  
x

x
and  
x

x
provisions  
x

x
light  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x
carry  
x

x
but  
x

x
strong  
x

x
to  
x

x
bring  
x

x
them  
x

x
over  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
mountain  
x

x
passes. 
x

x
Their  
x

x
plans  
x

x
were  
x

x
improved  
x

x
  
x

x
with  
x

x
the  
x

x
best  
x

x
advice. 
x

x
So  
x

x
the  
x

x
time  
x

x
came  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
midsummer  
x

x
eve,  
x

x
and  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
to  
x

x
go  
x

x
on  
x

x
again  
x

x
  
x

x
with  
x

x
the  
x

x
early  
x

x
sun  
x

x
on  
x

x
midsummer  
x

x
morning. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Elrond  
x

x
knew  
x

x
all  
x

x
about  
x

x
runes  
x

x
of  
x

x
every  
x

x
kind. 
x

x
  
x

x
That  
x

x
day  
x

x
he  
x

x
looked  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
swords  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
  
x

x
brought  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
trolls’  
x

x
lair,  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
said:  
x

x
“These  
x

x
  
x

x
are  
x

x
not  
x

x
troll-make. 
x

x

x

x
are  
x

x
old  
x

x
swords,  
x

x
very  
x

x
old  
x

x
  
x

x
swords  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
Elves  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
West,  
x

x
my  
x

x
kin. 
x

x
  
x

x
They  
x

x
were  
x

x
made  
x

x
in  
x

x
Gondolin  
x

x
for  
x

x
the  
x

x
Goblin-  
x

x
  
x

x
wars. 
x

x
They  
x

x
must  
x

x
have  
x

x
come  
x

x
from  
x

x
a  
x

x
dragon’s  
x

x
  
x

x
hoard  
x

x
or  
x

x
goblin  
x

x
plunder,  
x

x
for  
x

x
dragons  
x

x

x

x

x

x
that  
x

x
city  
x

x

x

x
ages  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
This,  
x

x
Thorin,  
x

x
the  
x

x
runes  
x

x
name  
x

x
Orcrist,  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
cleaver  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
it  
x

x

x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
blade. 
x

x
This,  
x

x
Gandalf,  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

of  
x

Gondolin  
x

x
once  
x

x
  
x

x
wore. 
x

x
Keep  
x

x
them  
x

x
well!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Whence  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“I

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

its

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

“What  
x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

full  
x

x

x

x

x

x

“Durin,  
x

x
Durin!”  
x

x

x

x
Thorin. 
x

x
“He  
x

x

x

x

“Then  
x

x

x

x

x
Elrond. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“The  
x

x
first  
x

x
day  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves’  
x

x
New  
x

x
Year,”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
said  
x

x
Thorin,  
x

x
“is  
x

x
as  
x

x
all  
x

x
should  
x

x
know  
x

x
the  
x

x
first  
x

x
day  
x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
last  
x

x
moon  
x

x
of  
x

x
Autumn  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
threshold  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
Winter. 
x

x
We  
x

x
still  
x

x
call  
x

x
it  
x

x
Durin’s  
x

x
Day  
x

x
when  
x

x
the  
x

x
last  
x

x
  
x

x
moon  
x

x
of  
x

x
Autumn  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
sun  
x

x
are  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
sky  
x

x
  
x

x
together. 
x

x
But  
x

x
this  
x

x
will  
x

x
not  
x

x
help  
x

x
us  
x

x
much,  
x

x
I  
x

x
fear,  
x

x
for  
x

x
  
x

x
it  
x

x
passes  
x

x
our  
x

x
skill  
x

x
in  
x

x
these  
x

x
days  
x

x
to  
x

x
guess  
x

x
when  
x

x
  
x

x
such  
x

x
a  
x

x
time  
x

x
will  
x

x
come  
x

x
again.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“That  
x

x
remains  
x

x
to  
x

x
be  
x

x
seen,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
Gandalf. 
x

x
“Is  
x

x
  
x

x
there  
x

x
any  
x

x
more  
x

x
writing?”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
"None  
x

x
to  
x

x
be  
x

x
seen  
x

x
by  
x

x
this  
x

x
moon,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
  
x

x
Elrond,  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
gave  
x

x
the  
x

x
map  
x

x
back  
x

x
to  
x

x
Thorin;  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
then  
x

x
they  
x

x
went  
x

x
down  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
water  
x

x
to  
x

x
see  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
elves  
x

x
dance  
x

x
and  
x

x
sing  
x

x
upon  
x

x
the  
x

x
midsummer’s  
x

x
  
x

x
eve. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
next  
x

x
morning  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
midsummer’s  
x

x
  
x

x
morning  
x

x
as  
x

x
fair  
x

x
and  
x

x
fresh  
x

x
as  
x

x
could  
x

x
be  
x

x
dreamed:  
x

x
  
x

x
blue  
x

x
sky  
x

x
and  
x

x
never  
x

x
a  
x

x
cloud,  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
sun  
x

x
dancing  
x

x
  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
water. 
x

x
Now  
x

x
they  
x

x
rode  
x

x
away  
x

x
amid  
x

x
songs  
x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x
farewell  
x

x
and  
x

x
good  
x

x
speed,  
x

x
with  
x

x
their  
x

x
hearts  
x

x
  
x

x
ready  
x

x
for  
x

x
more  
x

x
adventure,  
x

x
and  
x

x
with  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
knowledge  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
road  
x

x
they  
x

x
must  
x

x
follow  
x

x
over  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
Misty  
x

x
Mountains  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
land  
x

x
beyond. 
x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x
Chapter  
x

x
IV  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
OVER  
x

x
HILL  
x

x
AND  
x

x
UNDER  
x

x
HILL  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
There  
x

x
were  
x

x
many  
x

x
paths  
x

x
that  
x

x
led  
x

x
up  
x

x
into  
x

x
those  
x

x
  
x

x
mountains,  
x

x
and  
x

x
many  
x

x
passes  
x

x
over  
x

x
them. 
x

x
But  
x

x
  
x

x
most  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
paths  
x

x
were  
x

x
cheats  
x

x
and  
x

x
deceptions  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
led  
x

x
nowhere  
x

x
or  
x

x
to  
x

x
bad  
x

x
ends;  
x

x
and  
x

x
most  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
passes  
x

x
were  
x

x
infested  
x

x
by  
x

x
evil  
x

x
things  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
dreadful  
x

x
dangers. 
x

x
The  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbit,  
x

x
  
x

x
helped  
x

x
by  
x

x
the  
x

x
wise  
x

x
advice  
x

x
of  
x

x
Elrond  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
knowledge  
x

x
and  
x

x
memory  
x

x
of  
x

x
Gandalf,  
x

x
took  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
right  
x

x
road  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
right  
x

x
pass. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Long  
x

x
days  
x

x
after  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
climbed  
x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
valley  
x

x
and  
x

x
left  
x

x
the  
x

x
Last  
x

x
Homely  
x

x
House  
x

x
miles  
x

x
  
x

x
behind,  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
still  
x

x
going  
x

x
up  
x

x
and  
x

x
up  
x

x
and  
x

x
up. 
x

x
It  
x

x
  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
hard  
x

x
path  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
dangerous  
x

x
path,  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
crooked  
x

x
way  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
lonely  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
long. 
x

x
Now  
x

x
they  
x

x
  
x

x
could  
x

x
look  
x

x
back  
x

x
over  
x

x
the  
x

x
lands  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
left,  
x

x
laid  
x

x
  
x

x
out  
x

x
behind  
x

x
them  
x

x
far  
x

x
below. 
x

x
Far,  
x

x
far  
x

x
away  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
West,  
x

x
where  
x

x
things  
x

x
were  
x

x
blue  
x

x
and  
x

x
faint,  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
  
x

x
knew  
x

x
there  
x

x
lay  
x

x
his  
x

x
own  
x

x
country  
x

x
of  
x

x
safe  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
comfortable  
x

x
things,  
x

x
and  
x

x
his  
x

x
little  
x

x
hobbit-hole. 
x

x
He  
x

x
  
x

x
shivered. 
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
getting  
x

x
bitter  
x

x
cold  
x

x
up  
x

x
here,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
wind  
x

x
came  
x

x
shrill  
x

x
among  
x

x
the  
x

x
rocks. 
x

x
Boulders,  
x

x
  
x

x
too,  
x

x
at  
x

x
times  
x

x
came  
x

x
galloping  
x

x
down  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
let  
x

x
loose  
x

x
by  
x

x
mid-day  
x

x
sun  
x

x
upon  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
snow,  
x

x
and  
x

x
passed  
x

x
among  
x

x
them  
x

x
(which  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
lucky),  
x

x
or  
x

x
over  
x

x
their  
x

x
heads  
x

x
(which  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
alarming). 
x

x
The  
x

x
nights  
x

x
were  
x

x
comfortless  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
chill,  
x

x
and  
x

x
they  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
dare  
x

x
to  
x

x
sing  
x

x
or  
x

x
talk  
x

x
too  
x

x
  
x

x
loud,  
x

x
for  
x

x
the  
x

x
echoes  
x

x
were  
x

x
uncanny,  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
silence  
x

x
seemed  
x

x
to  
x

x
dislike  
x

x
being  
x

x
broken  
x

x
—  
x

x
  
x

x
except  
x

x
by  
x

x
the  
x

x
noise  
x

x
of  
x

x
water  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
wail  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
wind  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
crack  
x

x
of  
x

x
stone. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“The  
x

x
summer  
x

x
is  
x

x
getting  
x

x
on  
x

x
down  
x

x
below,”  
x

x
  
x

x
thought  
x

x
Bilbo,  
x

x
“and  
x

x
haymaking  
x

x
is  
x

x
going  
x

x
on  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
picnics. 
x

x
They  
x

x
will  
x

x
be  
x

x
harvesting  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
blackberrying,  
x

x
before  
x

x

x

x
even  
x

x

x

x
to  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
down  
x

x
the  
x

x
other  
x

x
side  
x

x
at  
x

x
this  
x

x
rate.”  
x

x
And  
x

x
the  
x

x
others  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
although  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Elrond

x

x

x

x

hope  
x

x
of  
x

x
a  
x

x
midsummer  
x

x
morning,  
x

x

x

x
had  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
gaily  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
passage  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
mountains,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
of  
x

x
riding  
x

x
swift  
x

x
across  
x

x
the  
x

x
lands  
x

x
beyond. 
x

x
  
x

x
They  
x

x
had  
x

x
thought  
x

x
of  
x

x
coming  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
secret  
x

x
door  
x

x
  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
Lonely  
x

x
Mountain,  
x

x
perhaps  
x

x
that  
x

x
very  
x

x
next  
x

x
  
x

x
last  
x

x
moon  
x

x
of  
x

x
Autumn  
x

x
—  
x

x
“and  
x

x
perhaps  
x

x
it  
x

x
will  
x

x
be  
x

x
  
x

x
Durin’s  
x

x
Day”  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
said. 
x

x
Only  
x

x
Gandalf  
x

x
had  
x

shaken  
x

x
his  
x

x
head  
x

x
and  
x

x
said  
x

x
nothing. 
x

x
Dwarves  
x

x

had  
x

x
not  
x

x
passed  
x

x

x

x
way

x

x

x

Gandalf  
x

x
had,  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
how  
x

x
evil  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
Wild,  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
had  
x

x

x
men  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
off  
x

x

x

x
dangerous  
x

x
adventures  
x

x
over  
x

x
the  
x

x
Edge  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
Wild;  
x

x
and  
x

x
Gandalf  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
wise  
x

x
enough  
x

x
  
x

x
wizard  
x

x
to  
x

x
know  
x

x
it. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
He  
x

x
knew  
x

x
that  
x

something  
x

x
unexpected  
x

x
might  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
dared  
x

x
to  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
pass  
x

x
without  
x

x

x

x

x

x
over  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
with  
x

x
lonely  
x

x
peaks  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
where  
x

x

x

x

x

x
ruled.

x
They  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
met  
x

x
a  
x

x
thunderstorm  
x

x
  
x

x
—

x
more  
x

x
than  
x

x
a  
x

x
thunderstorm,  
x

x
a

x

x
the

x

x

x
in  
x

x
a

x

x

x

x
times  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the

x
at  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
storms  
x

x

x

x
up

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
split  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x
never  
x

x

x

idea  
x

x
at  
x

x
all.

Of  
x

x
course  
x

x
it  
x

x
  
x

x
was  
x

x
Gandalf;  
x

x
but  
x

x
just  
x

x
then  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
too  
x

x
busy  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
ask  
x

x
how  
x

x
he  
x

x
got  
x

x
there. 
x

x
He  
x

x
took  
x

x
out  
x

x
his  
x

x
sword  
x

x
  
x

x
again,  
x

x
and  
x

x
again  
x

x
it  
x

x
flashed  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
dark  
x

x
by  
x

x
itself. 
x

x
  
x

x
It  
x

x
burned  
x

x
with  
x

x
a  
x

x
rage  
x

x
that  
x

x
made  
x

x
it  
x

x
gleam  
x

x
if  
x

x
  
x

x
goblins  
x

x
were  
x

x
about;  
x

x
now  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
bright  
x

x
as  
x

x
blue  
x

x
  
x

x
flame  
x

x
for  
x

x
delight  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
killing  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
great  
x

x
lord  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
cave. 
x

x
It  
x

x
made  
x

x
no  
x

x
trouble  
x

x
whatever  
x

x
of  
x

x
cutting  
x

x
  
x

x
through  
x

x
the  
x

x
goblin-chains  
x

x
and  
x

x
setting  
x

x
all  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
prisoners  
x

x
free  
x

x
as  
x

x
quickly  
x

x
as  
x

x
possible. 
x

x
This  
x

x
  
x

x
sword’s  
x

x
name  
x

x
was  
x

x
Glamdring  
x

x
the  
x

x
Foe-hammer,  
x

x
  
x

x
if  
x

x
you  
x

x
remember. 
x

x
The  
x

x
goblins  
x

x
just  
x

x
called  
x

x
it  
x

x
  
x

x
Beater,  
x

x
and  
x

x
hated  
x

x
it  
x

x
worse  
x

x
than  
x

x
Biter  
x

x
if  
x

x
  
x

x
possible. 
x

x
Orcrist,  
x

x
too,  
x

x
had  
x

x
been  
x

x
saved;  
x

x
for  
x

x
  
x

x
Gandalf  
x

x
had  
x

x
brought  
x

x
it  
x

x
along  
x

x
as  
x

x
well,  
x

x
snatching  
x

x
  
x

x
it  
x

x
from  
x

x
one  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
terrified  
x

x
guards. 
x

x
Gandalf  
x

x
  
x

x
thought  
x

x
of  
x

x
most  
x

x
things;  
x

x
and  
x

x
though  
x

x
he  
x

x
could  
x

x
not  
x

x
  
x

x
do  
x

x

x

x
he  
x

x
could  
x

x
do  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x
for  
x

x
  
x

x
friends  
x

x
in  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
corner. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Are  
x

x

x

x
all  
x

x

x

x

x

x
handing  
x

x
his  
x

x
  
x

x
sword  
x

x
back  
x

x
to  
x

x
Thorin  
x

x
with  
x

x
a  
x

x
bow. 
x

x
“Let  
x

x
me  
x

x
see:  
x

x
  
x

x
one  
x

x
—  
x

x
that's  
x

x
Thorin;  
x

x
two,  
x

x
three,  
x

x
four,  
x

x
five,  
x

x
six,  
x

x
  
x

x
seven,  
x

x
eight,  
x

x
nine,  
x

x
ten,  
x

x
eleven;  
x

x
where  
x

x
are  
x

x
Fili  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
Kili?  
x

x
Here  
x

x
they  
x

x
are!  
x

x
twelve,  
x

x
thirteen  
x

x
—  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
here’s  
x

x
Mr. 
x

x
Baggins:  
x

x
fourteen!  
x

x
Well,  
x

x
well!  
x

x
it  
x

x
might  
x

x
  
x

x
be  
x

x
worse,  
x

x
and  
x

x
then  
x

x
again  
x

x
it  
x

x
might  
x

x
be  
x

x
a  
x

x
good  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
No  
x

x
ponies,  
x

x

x

x
no  
x

x

x

x
no  
x

x

x
quite  
x

x
where  
x

x
we  
x

x
are,  
x

x
and  
x

x
hordes  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
goblins  
x

x
just  
x

x
behind!  
x

x
On  
x

x
we  
x

x
go!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
On  
x

x

x

x
went. 
x

x
Gandalf  
x

x
was  
x

x
quite  
x

x
right:  
x

x
they  
x

x
  
x

x
began  
x

x
to  
x

x
hear  
x

x
goblin  
x

x
noises  
x

x
and  
x

x
horrible  
x

x
cries  
x

x
  
x

x
far  
x

x
behind  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
passages  
x

x
they  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

That  
x

x

x

x

x
on  
x

x
faster  
x

x
than  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
it

x

x

x

x

x
dwarves,  
x

x
the

x

(they

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“Why,  
x

x

x

“Biter  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Quite  
x

x
suddenly  
x

x
Dori,  
x

x
now  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
back  
x

x
again  
x

x
  
x

x
carrying  
x

x
Bilbo,  
x

x
was  
x

x
grabbed  
x

x
from  
x

x
behind  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
dark. 
x

x
He  
x

x
shouted  
x

x
and  
x

x
fell;  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbit  
x

x
rolled  
x

x
  
x

x
off  
x

x
his  
x

x
shoulders  
x

x
into  
x

x
the  
x

x
blackness,  
x

x
bumped  
x

x
  
x

x
his  
x

x
head  
x

x
on  
x

x
hard  
x

x
rock,  
x

x
and  
x

x
remembered  
x

x
  
x

x
nothing  
x

x
more. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

Chapter

x

x
RIDDLES  
x

x
IN  
x

x
THE  
x

x
DARK  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
When  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
opened  
x

x
his  
x

x
eyes,  
x

x
he  
x

x
wondered  
x

x
if  
x

x
  
x

x
he  
x

x
had;  
x

x
for  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
just  
x

x
as  
x

x
dark  
x

x
as  
x

x
with  
x

x
them  
x

x
shut. 
x

x
  
x

x
No  
x

x
one  
x

x
was  
x

x
anywhere  
x

x
near  
x

x
him. 
x

x
Just  
x

x
imagine  
x

x
  
x

x
his  
x

x
fright!  
x

x
He  
x

x
could  
x

x
hear  
x

x
nothing,  
x

x
see  
x

x
nothing,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
could  
x

x
feel  
x

x
nothing  
x

x
except  
x

x
the  
x

x
stone  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
floor. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Very  
x

x
slowly  
x

x
he  
x

x
got  
x

x
up  
x

x
and  
x

x
groped  
x

x
about  
x

x
on  
x

x
  
x

x
all  
x

x
fours,  
x

x
till  
x

x
he  
x

x
touched  
x

x
the  
x

x
wall  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
tunnel;  
x

x
but  
x

x
  
x

x
neither  
x

x
up  
x

x
nor  
x

x
down  
x

x
it  
x

x
could  
x

x
he  
x

x
find  
x

x
anything:  
x

x
  
x

x
nothing  
x

x
at  
x

x
all,  
x

x
no  
x

x
sign  
x

x
of  
x

x
goblins,  
x

x
no  
x

x
sign  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
dwarves. 
x

x
His  
x

x
head  
x

x
was  
x

x
swimming,  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
far  
x

x
from  
x

x
certain  
x

x
even  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
direction  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
  
x

x
been  
x

x
going  
x

x
in  
x

x
when  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
his  
x

x
fall. 
x

x
He  
x

x
guessed  
x

x
  
x

x
as  
x

x
well  
x

x
as  
x

x
he  
x

x
could,  
x

x
and  
x

x
crawled  
x

x
along  
x

x
for  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
good  
x

x
way,  
x

x
till  
x

x
suddenly  
x

x
his  
x

x
hand  
x

x
met  
x

x
what  
x

x
felt  
x

x
  
x

x
like  
x

x
a  
x

x
tiny  
x

x
ring  
x

x
of  
x

x
cold  
x

x
metal  
x

x
lying  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
floor  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
tunnel. 
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
turning  
x

x
point  
x

x
in  
x

x
his  
x

x
career,  
x

x
  
x

x
but  
x

x
he  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
know  
x

x
it. 
x

x
He  
x

x
put  
x

x
the  
x

x
ring  
x

x
in  
x

x
his  
x

x
  
x

x
pocket  
x

x
almost  
x

x
without  
x

x
thinking;  
x

x
certainly  
x

x
it  
x

x
did  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
not  
x

x
seem  
x

x
of  
x

x
any  
x

x
particular  
x

x
use  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
moment. 
x

x
  
x

x
He  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
go  
x

x
much  
x

x
further,  
x

x
but  
x

x
sat  
x

x
down  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
cold  
x

x
floor  
x

x
and  
x

x
gave  
x

x
himself  
x

x
up  
x

x
to  
x

x
complete  
x

x
  
x

x
miserableness,  
x

x
for  
x

x
a  
x

x
long  
x

x
while. 
x

x
He  
x

x
thought  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
himself  
x

x
frying  
x

x
bacon  
x

x
and  
x

x
eggs  
x

x
in  
x

x
his  
x

x
own  
x

x
  
x

x
kitchen  
x

x
at  
x

x
home  
x

x
—  
x

x
for  
x

x
he  
x

x
could  
x

x
feel  
x

x
inside  
x

x
that  
x

x
it  
x

x
  
x

x
was  
x

x
high  
x

x
time  
x

x
for  
x

x
some  
x

x
meal  
x

x
or  
x

x
other;  
x

x
but  
x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x
only  
x

x
made  
x

x
him  
x

x
miserabler. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
He  
x

x
could  
x

x
not  
x

x
think  
x

x
what  
x

x
to  
x

x
do;  
x

x
nor  
x

x
could  
x

x
he  
x

x
  
x

x
think  
x

x
what  
x

x
had  
x

x
happened;  
x

x
or  
x

x
why  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
been  
x

x
  
x

x
left  
x

x
behind;  
x

x
or  
x

x
why,  
x

x
if  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
been  
x

x
left  
x

x
behind,  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
goblins  
x

x
had  
x

x
not  
x

x
caught  
x

x
him;  
x

x
or  
x

x
even  
x

x
why  
x

x
his  
x

x
  
x

x
head  
x

x
was  
x

x
so  
x

x
sore. 
x

x
The  
x

x
truth  
x

x
was  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
been  
x

x
  
x

x
lying  
x

x
quiet,  
x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x
sight  
x

x
and  
x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x
mind,  
x

x
in  
x

x
a  
x

x
very  
x

x
  
x

x
dark  
x

x
corner  
x

x
for  
x

x
a  
x

x
long  
x

x
while. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
After  
x

x
some  
x

x
time  
x

x
he  
x

x
felt  
x

x
for  
x

x
his  
x

x
pipe. 
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
not  
x

x
broken,  
x

x
and  
x

x
that  
x

x
was  
x

x
something. 
x

x
Then  
x

x
he  
x

x
  
x

x
felt  
x

x
for  
x

x
his  
x

x
pouch,  
x

x
and  
x

x
there  
x

x
was  
x

x
some  
x

x
tobacco  
x

x
  
x

x
in  
x

x
it,  
x

x
and  
x

x
that  
x

x
was  
x

x
something  
x

x
more. 
x

x
Then  
x

x
he  
x

x
felt  
x

x
  
x

x
for  
x

x
matches  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
could  
x

x
not  
x

x
find  
x

x
any  
x

x
at  
x

x
all,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
that  
x

x
shattered  
x

x
his  
x

x
hopes  
x

x
completely. 
x

x
Just  
x

x
as  
x

x
  
x

x
well  
x

x
for  
x

x
him,  
x

x
as  
x

x
he  
x

x
agreed  
x

x
when  
x

x
he  
x

x
came  
x

x
to  
x

x
his  
x

x
  
x

x
senses. 
x

x
Goodness  
x

x
knows  
x

x
what  
x

x
the  
x

x
striking  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
matches  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
smell  
x

x
of  
x

x
tobacco  
x

x
would  
x

x
have  
x

x
  
x

x
brought  
x

x
on  
x

x
him  
x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x
dark  
x

x
holes  
x

x
in  
x

x
that  
x

x
horrible  
x

x
  
x

x
place. 
x

x
Still  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
moment  
x

x
he  
x

x
felt  
x

x
very  
x

x
crushed. 
x

x
  
x

x
But  
x

x
in  
x

x
slapping  
x

x
all  
x

x
his  
x

x
pockets  
x

x
and  
x

x
feeling  
x

x
all  
x

x
  
x

x
round  
x

x
himself  
x

x
for  
x

x
matches  
x

x
his  
x

x
hand  
x

x
came  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
hilt  
x

x
of  
x

x
his  
x

x
little  
x

x
sword  
x

x
—  
x

x
the  
x

x
little  
x

x
dagger  
x

x
that  
x

x
he  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
got  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
trolls,  
x

x
and  
x

x
that  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
quite  
x

x
  
x

x
forgotten;  
x

x
nor  
x

x
fortunately  
x

x
had  
x

x
the  
x

x
goblins  
x

x
  
x

x
noticed  
x

x
it,  
x

x
as  
x

x
he  
x

x
wore  
x

x
it  
x

x
inside  
x

x
his  
x

x
breeches. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Now  
x

x
he  
x

x
drew  
x

x
it  
x

x
out. 
x

x
It  
x

x
shone  
x

x
pale  
x

x
and  
x

x
dim  
x

x
  
x

x
before  
x

x
his  
x

x
eyes. 
x

x
“So  
x

x
it  
x

x
is  
x

x
an  
x

x
elvish  
x

x
blade,  
x

x
too,”  
x

x
  
x

x
he  
x

x
thought;  
x

x
“and  
x

x
goblins  
x

x
are  
x

x
not  
x

x
very  
x

x
near,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
yet  
x

x
not  
x

x
far  
x

x
enough.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
But  
x

x
somehow  
x

x
he  
x

x
was  
x

x
comforted. 
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
rather  
x

x
splendid  
x

x
to  
x

x
be  
x

x
wearing  
x

x
a  
x

x
blade  
x

x
made  
x

x
in  
x

x
  
x

x
Gondolin  
x

x
for  
x

x
the  
x

x
goblin-wars  
x

x
of  
x

x
which  
x

x
so  
x

x
many  
x

x
  
x

x
songs  
x

x
had  
x

x
sung;  
x

x
and  
x

x
also  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
noticed  
x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x
such  
x

x
weapons  
x

x
made  
x

x
a  
x

x
great  
x

x
impression  
x

x
on  
x

x
  
x

x
goblins  
x

x
that  
x

x
came  
x

x
upon  
x

x
them  
x

x
suddenly. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Go  
x

x
back?”  
x

x
he  
x

x
thought. 
x

x
“No  
x

x
good  
x

x
at  
x

x
all!  
x

x
Go  
x

x
  
x

x
sideways?  
x

x
Impossible!  
x

x
Go  
x

x
forward?  
x

x
Only  
x

x
thing  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x
do!  
x

x
On  
x

x
we  
x

x
go!”  
x

x
So  
x

x
up  
x

x
he  
x

x
got,  
x

x
and  
x

x
trotted  
x

x
  
x

x
along  
x

x
with  
x

x
his  
x

x
little  
x

x
sword  
x

x
held  
x

x
in  
x

x
front  
x

x
of  
x

x
him  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
one  
x

x
hand  
x

x
feeling  
x

x
the  
x

x
wall,  
x

x
and  
x

x
his  
x

x
heart  
x

x
all  
x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x
a  
x

x
patter  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
pitter. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Now  
x

x
certainly  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
was  
x

x
in  
x

x
what  
x

x
is  
x

x
called  
x

x
a  
x

x
tight  
x

x
  
x

x
place. 
x

x
But  
x

x
you  
x

x
must  
x

x
remember  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
not  
x

x
quite  
x

x
  
x

x
so  
x

x
tight  
x

x
for  
x

x
him  
x

x
as  
x

x
it  
x

x
would  
x

x
have  
x

x
been  
x

x
for  
x

x
me  
x

x
or  
x

x
  
x

x
for  
x

x
you. 
x

x
Hobbits  
x

x
are  
x

x
not  
x

x
quite  
x

x
like  
x

x
ordinary  
x

x
  
x

x
people;  
x

x
and  
x

x
after  
x

x
all  
x

x
if  
x

x
their  
x

x
holes  
x

x
are  
x

x
nice  
x

x
  
x

x
cheery  
x

x
places  
x

x
and  
x

x
properly  
x

x
aired,  
x

x
quite  
x

x
different  
x

x
  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
tunnels  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
still  
x

x
they  
x

x
are  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
more  
x

x
used  
x

x
to  
x

x
tunnelling  
x

x
than  
x

x
we  
x

x
are,  
x

x
and  
x

x
they  
x

x
  
x

x
do  
x

x
not  
x

x
easily  
x

x
lose  
x

x
their  
x

x
sense  
x

x
of  
x

x
direction  
x

x
  
x

x
underground  
x

x
—  
x

x
not  
x

x
when  
x

x
their  
x

x
heads  
x

x
have  
x

x
  
x

x
recovered  
x

x
from  
x

x
being  
x

x
bumped. 
x

x
Also  
x

x
they  
x

x
can  
x

x
  
x

x
move  
x

x
very  
x

x
quietly,  
x

x
and  
x

x
hide  
x

x
easily,  
x

x
and  
x

x
recover  
x

x
  
x

x
wonderfully  
x

x
from  
x

x
falls  
x

x
and  
x

x
bruises,  
x

x
and  
x

x
they  
x

x
  
x

x
have  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
wisdom  
x

x
and  
x

x
wise  
x

x

x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x
men  
x

x
have  
x

x
mostly  
x

x
never  
x

x
heard  
x

x
or  
x

x
have  
x

x
forgotten  
x

x
  
x

x
long  
x

x
ago. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
I  
x

x
should  
x

x
not  
x

x
have  
x

x
liked  
x

x
to  
x

x
have  
x

x

x
in  
x

x
Mr. 
x

x
  
x

x
Baggins’  
x

x
place,  
x

x
all  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
seemed  
x

x
to  
x

x
have  
x

x
no  
x

x

x

x
All  
x

x

x

x
knew  
x

x
was  
x

x
that  
x

x
it  
x

x
  
x

x
was  
x

x
still  
x

x

x

x
down  
x

x
pretty  
x

x
steadily  
x

x
and  
x

x
keeping  
x

x
  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
a  
x

x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
turn  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
off  
x

to  
x

x

the

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
down  
x

x
and  
x

x
down;

x

x

x

x

no

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
was  
x

x
icy  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
down  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
Gollum,  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Gollum

x

x

x

x

x

x
he. 
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Goblin  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

care

x

x

x

x

x

x
out.

x

x

x

from  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
there

he  
x

x
cried. 
x

x
“It  
x

x
is  
x

x
  
x

x
fish!”

x

x
Gollum  
x

x
was  
x

x
dreadfully  
x

x

x

x
but  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
asked  
x

x
another  
x

x

x

x
as  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
back  
x

x
into  
x

x
his  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
think. 
x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“no-legs”

x

x

x

the

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
wriggled  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
but  
x

x
still  
x

x

x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
dare  
x

x
to  
x

x
waste  
x

x
his  
x

x
  
x

x
last  
x

x
guess. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Come  
x

x
on!”  
x

x
said  
x

x
Bilbo. 
x

x
“I  
x

x
am  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
to  
x

x

x

x
bold  
x

and  
x

x

x

x

x
at  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“Time’s  
x

x

x

“String,  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
out

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
gollum!”

"Never  
x

x
you

x

x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

Gollum  
x

x

x

x

x

x
thought

x

x

x
was  
x

x

x

x

x

“That’s

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
“Quite  
x

x
safe,  
x

x
yes,”  
x

x
he  
x

x
whispered  
x

x
to  
x

x
himself. 
x

x
  
x

x
“It  
x

x
won’t  
x

x
see  
x

x
us,  
x

x
will  
x

x
it,  
x

x
my  
x

x
precious?  
x

x
No. 
x

x
It  
x

x
won’t  
x

x
  
x

x
see  
x

x
us,  
x

x
and  
x

x
its  
x

x
nassty  
x

x
little  
x

x
sword  
x

x
will  
x

x
be  
x

x
  
x

x
useless,  
x

x
yes  
x

x
quite.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
That  
x

x
is  
x

x
what  
x

x
was  
x

x
in  
x

x
his  
x

x
wicked  
x

x
little  
x

x
mind,  
x

x
as  
x

x
  
x

x
he  
x

x
slipped  
x

x
suddenly  
x

x
from  
x

x
Bilbo’s  
x

x
side,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
flapped  
x

x
back  
x

x
to  
x

x
his  
x

x
boat,  
x

x
and  
x

x
went  
x

x
off  
x

x
into  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
dark. 
x

x

x

x
thought  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
heard  
x

x
the  
x

x
last  
x

x
of  
x

x
him. 
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
waited  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
for  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
no  
x

x

x

x
how  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
alone. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
a  
x

x

x
It  
x

x
sent  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
shiver  
x

x
down  
x

x
his  
x

x
back. 
x

x
Gollum  
x

x
was  
x

x
cursing  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
wailing  
x

x
away  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
gloom,  
x

x
not  
x

x
very  
x

x
far  
x

x
off  
x

x
by  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
sound  
x

x
of  
x

x
it. 
x

x
He  
x

x
was  
x

x
on  
x

x
his  
x

x
island,  
x

x
scrabbling  
x

x
  
x

x
here  
x

x
and  
x

x
there,  
x

x
searching  
x

x
and  
x

x
seeking  
x

x
in  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Where  
x

x
iss  
x

x
it?  
x

x
Where  
x

x
iss  
x

x
it?”  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
heard  
x

x
  
x

x
him  
x

x
crying. 
x

x
“Losst  
x

x
it  
x

x
is,  
x

x
my  
x

x
precious,  
x

x
lost,  
x

x
lost!  
x

x
  
x

x
Curse  
x

x
us  
x

x
and  
x

x
crush  
x

x
us,  
x

x
my  
x

x
precious  
x

x
is  
x

x
lost!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“What’s  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x
called. 
x

x
“What  
x

x
  
x

x
have  
x

x
you  
x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“It  
x

x
mustn’t  
x

x
ask  
x

x
us,”  
x

x
shrieked  
x

x

x

x
"Not  
x

x
its  
x

x
  
x

x
business,  
x

x
no,  
x

x
gollum!  
x

x
It’s  
x

x
losst,  
x

x
gollum,  
x

x
gollum,  
x

x
  
x

x
gollum.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Well,  
x

x
so  
x

x

x

x
“and  
x

x
I  
x

x
want  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
And  
x

x

x

x
won  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
you  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
looking!”  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
not  
x

x
  
x

x
find  
x

x
much  
x

x

x

x
in  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x

x
had  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
that  
x

x

x

x
Gollum  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“Come  
x

x
along!”  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“No,  
x

x
not  
x

x

x

x
precious!”  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
“We  
x

x
must  
x

x
search  
x

x
for  
x

x
it,  
x

x
it’s  
x

x
lost,  
x

x
gollum.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“But  
x

x
you  
x

x
never  
x

x
guessed  
x

x
my  
x

x
last  
x

x
question,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
you  
x

x
promised,”  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
"Never  
x

x

x

x

Then  
x

x

of  
x

x

“What  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Tell  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
has  
x

x

x

in  
x

its  
x

x

x

x

x

the

x

x

“What

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
it  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“What  
x

x
has  
x

x

x

x

x
in  
x

x
its  
x

x

x

heard  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
loud  
x

x
behind  
x

x
him,  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“What  
x

x
have  
x

x
I,  
x

x

x

x

x

x
he  
x

x

x

x
to  
x

x
himself,  
x

x
as  
x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
stumbled  
x

x
along. 
x

x

x

x
put  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
very  
x

x

x

x
as  
x

x
it  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
on  
x

x
to  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
hiss  
x

x
was  
x

x
close  
x

x
behind  
x

x
him. 
x

x
He  
x

x
turned  
x

x
  
x

x
now  
x

x
and  
x

x
saw  
x

x
Gollum’s  
x

x
eyes  
x

x
like  
x

x
small  
x

x
green  
x

x
  
x

x
lamps  
x

x
coming  
x

x
up  
x

x
the  
x

x
slope. 
x

x
Terrified  
x

x
he  
x

x
tried  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
run  
x

x
faster,  
x

x
but  
x

x

x

x
he  
x

x
struck  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x
on  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
in  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
fell  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
sword  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
him. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
In  
x

x

x

x

x

x
Gollum  
x

x
was  
x

x
on  
x

x
him. 
x

x

x

x

x

x
wave  
x

x

passed  
x

x
by,

x

x
no  
x

x

x

x
of

x

and  
x

x

x

x
“One  
x

x
left,  
x

x
yes. 
x

x
One  
x

x
right,  
x

x
yes. 
x

x
Two  
x

x
right,  
x

x
yes,  
x

x
  
x

x
yes. 
x

x
Two  
x

x
left,  
x

x
yes,  
x

x
yes.”  
x

x
And  
x

x
so  
x

x
on  
x

x
and  
x

x
on. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
As  
x

x
the  
x

x
count  
x

x

x

x
he  
x

x
slowed  
x

x
down,  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
get  
x

x
shaky  
x

x
and  
x

weepy;  
x

x
for  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
water  
x

x
further  
x

x
and  
x

x
further  
x

x
behind,  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
was  
x

x
getting  
x

x
afraid. 
x

x
Goblins  
x

x
might  
x

x
be  
x

x
about,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
lost  
x

x
his  
x

x
ring. 
x

x
At  
x

x

x

x

a

x

on  
x

x
their  
x

x
left  
x

as  
x

x

x

went  
x

x

x

x

x

“Seven  
x

x
right,  
x

x
yes. 
x

x
Six  
x

x
left,  
x

x
yes!”

x

x

“This  
x

x
is  
x

x
it. 
x

x
This  
x

x

x

x

way  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
back-door,  
x

x
yes. 
x

x
Here’s  
x

x
the  
x

x
passage!”

x

x
  
x

x
He  
x

x
peered  
x

x
in,  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

“But  
x

x
we  
x

x
  
x

x
dursn’t  
x

x
go  
x

x
in,  
x

x
precious,  
x

x
no  
x

x
we  
x

x
dursn’t.

x

x
Goblinses  
x

x
down  
x

x
there. 
x

x
Lots  
x

x
of  
x

x
goblinses. 
x

x
We  
x

x
  
x

x
smells  
x

x
them. 
x

x
Ssss!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“What  
x

x
shall  
x

x

x

x

x
Curse  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
We  
x

must  
x

x
wait  
x

x
here,  
x

x
precious,  
x

x
wait  
x

x
a  
x

x
bit  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

to  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

had  
x

x

x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
way  
x

x
out  
x

x
after  
x

x

x

x

Bilbo  
x

x
  
x

x
could  
x

x
not  
x

x
get  
x

x
in!  
x

x

x

x
was  
x

x

x
sitting

x

humped  
x

x
up  
x

x

x

the  
x

x

x

x

x

x
more

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
stiffened  
x

x
at  
x

x
once,  
x

x
and  
x

x

and  
x

x

x

x

x

x
He  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

had  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
hearing  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
must  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Bilbo,  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
sped  
x

x
off

x

x

x

x
not  
x

x

x

x

x

x
what  
x

x
Gollum  
x

x
  
x

x
was  
x

x
doing. 
x

x
There  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
hissing  
x

x
and  
x

x
cursing  
x

x
  
x

x
almost  
x

x
at  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
first,  
x

x
then  
x

x

x

x

x

x
All  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
go  
x

x

x

x
further. 
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
had  
x

x
ever  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
his  
x

x
precious. 
x

x

x

x

x

x
brought  
x

x
Bilbo’s  
x

x
  
x

x
heart  
x

x
to  
x

x
his  
x

x
mouth,  
x

x
but  
x

x
still  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Now  
x

x
faint  
x

x

x

x

x

x
but  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
“Thief,  
x

x
thief,  
x

x
thief!  
x

x
Bag  
x

x
gins!  
x

x
We  
x

x
hates  
x

x
it,  
x

x
we  
x

x
  
x

x
hates  
x

x
it,  
x

x
we  
x

x
hates  
x

x
it  
x

x
for  
x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Then  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
But  
x

x
that  
x

x
too  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
menacing  
x

x
to  
x

x
Bilbo. 
x

x
“If  
x

x

x

x
are  
x

x
so  
x

x
  
x

x
near  
x

x
that  
x

x

x

x
smelt  
x

x
them,”  
x

x
he  
x

x
thought,  
x

x
“then  
x

x
they’ll  
x

x
  
x

x
have  
x

x
heard  
x

x
his  
x

x
shrieking  
x

x
and  
x

x
cursing. 
x

x
Careful  
x

x
  
x

x
now,  
x

x
or  
x

x

x

x

x

x
will  
x

x
lead  
x

x
you  
x

x
to  
x

x
worse  
x

x
things.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x

x

x
was  
x

x
low  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
in  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
floor. 
x

x
“A  
x

x
bit  
x

x
low  
x

x
for  
x

x
goblins,  
x

x
at  
x

x
least  
x

x
for  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
big  
x

x
ones,”  
x

x
thought  
x

x
Bilbo,  
x

x
not  
x

x
knowing  
x

x
that  
x

x
even  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
big  
x

x
ones,  
x

x
the  
x

x
ores  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
mountains,  
x

x
go  
x

x
  
x

x
along  
x

x
at  
x

x
a  
x

x
great  
x

x
speed  
x

x
stooping  
x

x
low  
x

x
with  
x

x
their  
x

x
  
x

x
hands  
x

x
almost  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
ground. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Soon  
x

x
the  
x

x
passage  
x

x
that  
x

x

x

x

x

x
sloping  
x

x
  
x

x
down  
x

x
began  
x

x
to  
x

x
go  
x

x
up  
x

x
again,  
x

x
and  
x

x
after  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
climbed  
x

x

x

x
That  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
But

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
passage  
x

x
turned  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
corner  
x

x
and  
x

x
dipped  
x

x
down  
x

x
again,  
x

x
and  
x

x
there,  
x

x
at  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
a  
x

x
short  
x

x

x

x
he  
x

x
saw,  
x

x
filtering  
x

x
  
x

x
round  
x

x
another  
x

x
corner  
x

x
—  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x
light. 
x

x
Not  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

Then  
x

x

began  
x

x
to  
x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
were  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
for  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

A

x
Of  
x

x
course  
x

x
they  
x

x
soon  
x

x
came  
x

x
down  
x

x
after  
x

x
him,  
x

x
  
x

x
hooting  
x

x
and  
x

x
hallooing,  
x

x
and  
x

x
hunting  
x

x
among  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
trees. 
x

x
But  
x

x
they  
x

x
don’t  
x

x
like  
x

x
the  
x

x
sun:  
x

x
it  
x

x
makes  
x

x
their  
x

x
  
x

x
legs  
x

x
wobble  
x

x
and  
x

x
their  
x

x
heads  
x

x
giddy. 
x

x
They  
x

x
could  
x

x
  
x

x
not  
x

x
find  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
with  
x

x
the  
x

x
ring  
x

x
on,  
x

x
slipping  
x

x
in  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
shadow  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
trees,  
x

x
running  
x

x
quick  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
quiet,  
x

x
and  
x

x
keeping  
x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
sun;  
x

x
so  
x

x
soon  
x

x
  
x

x
they  
x

x
went  
x

x
back  
x

x
grumbling  
x

x
and  
x

x
cursing  
x

x
to  
x

x
guard  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
door. 
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
had  
x

x
escaped. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
 
x

x
Chapter  
x

x
VI  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
OUT  
x

x
OF  
x

x
THE  
x

x
FRYING-PAN  
x

x
INTO  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
THE  
x

x
FIRE  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
had  
x

x
escaped  
x

x
the  
x

x
goblins,  
x

x
but  
x

x
he  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
  
x

x
know  
x

x
where  
x

x
he  
x

x
was. 
x

x
He  
x

x
had  
x

x
lost  
x

x
hood,  
x

x
cloak,  
x

x
  
x

x
food,  
x

x
pony,  
x

x
his  
x

x
buttons  
x

x
and  
x

x
his  
x

x
friends. 
x

x
He  
x

x
  
x

x
wandered  
x

x
on  
x

x
and  
x

x
on,  
x

x
till  
x

x
the  
x

x
sun  
x

x
began  
x

x
to  
x

x
sink  
x

x
  
x

x
westwards  
x

x
—  
x

x
behind  
x

x
the  
x

x
mountains. 
x

x
Their  
x

x
  
x

x
shadows  
x

x
fell  
x

x
across  
x

x
Bilbo’s  
x

x
path,  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
looked  
x

x
  
x

x
back. 
x

x
Then  
x

x
he  
x

x
looked  
x

x
forward  
x

x
and  
x

x
could  
x

x
see  
x

x
  
x

x
before  
x

x
him  
x

x
only  
x

x
ridges  
x

x
and  
x

x
slopes  
x

x
falling  
x

x
  
x

x
towards  
x

x
lowlands  
x

x
and  
x

x
plains  
x

x
glimpsed  
x

x
  
x

x
occasionally  
x

x
between  
x

x
the  
x

x
trees. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Good  
x

x
heavens!”  
x

x
he  
x

x
exclaimed. 
x

x
“I  
x

x
seem  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
have  
x

x
got  
x

x
right  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
other  
x

x
side  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Misty  
x

x
  
x

x
Mountains,  
x

x
right  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
edge  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Land  
x

x
  
x

x
Beyond!  
x

x
Where  
x

x
and  
x

x
O  
x

x
where  
x

x
can  
x

x
Gandalf  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
have  
x

x
got  
x

x
to?  
x

x
I  
x

x
only  
x

x
hope  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
goodness  
x

x
they  
x

x
are  
x

x
not  
x

x
still  
x

x
back  
x

x
there  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
power  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
goblins!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
He  
x

x
still  
x

x
wandered  
x

x
on,  
x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
little  
x

x
high  
x

x
  
x

x
valley,  
x

x
over  
x

x
its  
x

x
edge,  
x

x
and  
x

x
down  
x

x
the  
x

x
slopes  
x

x
  
x

x
beyond;  
x

x
but  
x

x
all  
x

x
the  
x

x
while  
x

x
a  
x

x
very  
x

x
uncomfortable  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
thought  
x

x
was  
x

x
growing  
x

x
inside  
x

x
him. 
x

x
He  
x

x
wondered  
x

x
  
x

x
whether  
x

x
he  
x

x
ought  
x

x
not,  
x

x
now  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
the  
x

x
magic  
x

x
  
x

x
ring,  
x

x
to  
x

x
go  
x

x
back  
x

x
into  
x

x
the  
x

x
horrible,  
x

x
horrible,  
x

x
  
x

x
tunnels  
x

x
and  
x

x
look  
x

x
for  
x

x
his  
x

x
friends. 
x

x
He  
x

x
had  
x

x
just  
x

x
  
x

x
made  
x

x
up  
x

x
his  
x

x
mind  
x

x
that  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
his  
x

x
duty,  
x

x
that  
x

x
he  
x

x
  
x

x
must  
x

x
turn  
x

x
back  
x

x
—  
x

x
and  
x

x
very  
x

x
miserable  
x

x
he  
x

x
felt  
x

x
  
x

x
about  
x

x
it  
x

x
—  
x

x
when  
x

x
he  
x

x
heard  
x

x
voices. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
He  
x

x
stopped  
x

x
and  
x

x
listened. 
x

x
It  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
sound  
x

x
  
x

x
like  
x

x
goblins;  
x

x
so  
x

x
he  
x

x
crept  
x

x
forward  
x

x
carefully. 
x

x
He  
x

x
  
x

x
was  
x

x
on  
x

x
a  
x

x
stony  
x

x
path  
x

x
winding  
x

x
downwards  
x

x
with  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
rocky  
x

x
wall  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
left  
x

x
hand;  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
other  
x

x
side  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
ground  
x

x
sloped  
x

x
away  
x

x
and  
x

x
there  
x

x
were  
x

x
dells  
x

x
below  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
level  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
path  
x

x
overhung  
x

x
with  
x

x
bushes  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
low  
x

x
trees. 
x

x
In  
x

x
one  
x

x
of  
x

x
these  
x

x
dells  
x

x
under  
x

x
the  
x

x
bushes  
x

x
  
x

x
people  
x

x
were  
x

x
talking. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
He  
x

x
crept  
x

x
still  
x

x
nearer,  
x

x
and  
x

x
suddenly  
x

x
he  
x

x
saw  
x

x
  
x

x
peering  
x

x
between  
x

x
two  
x

x
big  
x

x
boulders  
x

x
a  
x

x
head  
x

x
with  
x

x
  
x

x
a  
x

x
red  
x

x
hood  
x

x
on:  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
Balin  
x

x
doing  
x

x
look-out. 
x

x
He  
x

x
  
x

x
could  
x

x
have  
x

x
clapped  
x

x
and  
x

x
shouted  
x

x
for  
x

x
joy,  
x

x
but  
x

x
he  
x

x
  
x

x
did  
x

x
not. 
x

x
He  
x

x
had  
x

x
still  
x

x
got  
x

x
the  
x

x
ring  
x

x
on,  
x

x
for  
x

x
fear  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
meeting  
x

x
something  
x

x
unexpected  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
unpleasant,  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
saw  
x

x
that  
x

x
Balin  
x

x
was  
x

x
looking  
x

x
  
x

x
straight  
x

x
at  
x

x
him  
x

x
without  
x

x
noticing  
x

x
him. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“I  
x

x
will  
x

x
give  
x

x
them  
x

x
all  
x

x
a  
x

x
surprise,”  
x

x
he  
x

x
thought,  
x

x
  
x

x
as  
x

x
he  
x

x
crawled  
x

x
into  
x

x
the  
x

x
bushes  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
edge  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
dell. 
x

x
Gandalf  
x

x
was  
x

x
arguing  
x

x
with  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves. 
x

x
  
x

x
They  
x

x
were  
x

x
discussing  
x

x
all  
x

x
that  
x

x
had  
x

x
happened  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
them  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
tunnels,  
x

x
and  
x

x
wondering  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
debating  
x

x
what  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
to  
x

x
do  
x

x
now. 
x

x
The  
x

x
  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
were  
x

x
grumbling,  
x

x
and  
x

x
Gandalf  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
saying  
x

x
that  
x

x
they  
x

x
could  
x

x
not  
x

x
possibly  
x

x
go  
x

x
on  
x

x
with  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
their  
x

x
journey  
x

x
leaving  
x

x
Mr. 
x

x
Baggins  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
hands  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
goblins,  
x

x
without  
x

x
trying  
x

x
to  
x

x
find  
x

x
out  
x

x
if  
x

x
he  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
alive  
x

x
or  
x

x
dead,  
x

x
and  
x

x
without  
x

x
trying  
x

x
to  
x

x
rescue  
x

x
him. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“After  
x

x
all  
x

x
he  
x

x
is  
x

x
my  
x

x
friend,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
the  
x

x
wizard,  
x

x
  
x

x
“and  
x

x
not  
x

x
a  
x

x
bad  
x

x
little  
x

x
chap. 
x

x
I  
x

x
feel  
x

x
responsible  
x

x
for  
x

x
  
x

x
him. 
x

x
I  
x

x
wish  
x

x
to  
x

x
goodness  
x

x
you  
x

x
had  
x

x
not  
x

x
lost  
x

x
him.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
wanted  
x

x
to  
x

x
know  
x

x
why  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
  
x

x
ever  
x

x
been  
x

x
brought  
x

x
at  
x

x
all,  
x

x
why  
x

x
he  
x

x
could  
x

x
not  
x

x
stick  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x
his  
x

x
friends  
x

x
and  
x

x
come  
x

x
along  
x

x
with  
x

x
them,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
why  
x

x
the  
x

x
wizard  
x

x
had  
x

x
not  
x

x
chosen  
x

x
someone  
x

x
with  
x

x
  
x

x
more  
x

x
sense. 
x

x
“He  
x

x
has  
x

x
been  
x

x
more  
x

x
trouble  
x

x
than  
x

x
  
x

x
use  
x

x
so  
x

x
far,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
one. 
x

x
“If  
x

x
we  
x

x
have  
x

x
got  
x

x
to  
x

x
go  
x

x
back  
x

x
  
x

x
now  
x

x
into  
x

x
those  
x

x
abominable  
x

x
tunnels  
x

x
to  
x

x
look  
x

x
for  
x

x
  
x

x
him,  
x

x
then  
x

x
drat  
x

x
him,  
x

x
I  
x

x
say.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Gandalf  
x

x
answered  
x

x
angrily:  
x

x
“I  
x

x
brought  
x

x
him,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
I  
x

x
don’t  
x

x
bring  
x

x
things  
x

x
that  
x

x
are  
x

x
of  
x

x
no  
x

x
use. 
x

x
Either  
x

x
  
x

x
you  
x

x
help  
x

x
me  
x

x
to  
x

x
look  
x

x
for  
x

x
him,  
x

x
or  
x

x
I  
x

x
go  
x

x
and  
x

x
leave  
x

x
  
x

x
you  
x

x
here  
x

x
to  
x

x
get  
x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
mess  
x

x
as  
x

x
best  
x

x
you  
x

x
can  
x

x
  
x

x
yourselves. 
x

x
If  
x

x
we  
x

x
can  
x

x
only  
x

x
find  
x

x
him  
x

x
again,  
x

x
you  
x

x
  
x

x
will  
x

x
thank  
x

x
me  
x

x
before  
x

x
all  
x

x
is  
x

x
over. 
x

x
Whatever  
x

x
did  
x

x
  
x

x
you  
x

x
want  
x

x
to  
x

x
go  
x

x
and  
x

x
drop  
x

x
him  
x

x
for,  
x

x
Dori?”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“You  
x

x
would  
x

x
have  
x

x
dropped  
x

x
him,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
Dori,  
x

x
  
x

x
“if  
x

x
a  
x

x
goblin  
x

x
had  
x

x
suddenly  
x

x
grabbed  
x

x
your  
x

x
legs  
x

x
  
x

x
from  
x

x
behind  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
dark,

x
tripped  
x

x
up  
x

x
your

x
feet,  
x

x
  
x

and  
x

x
kicked  
x

x
you  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
back!”

x

x
  
x

x
“Then  
x

x

x

x
didn’t  
x

x
you  
x

x

x

x
him  
x

x
up

“Good  
x

x

x

x

x

x
you  
x

Goblins  
x

x

off

my

x
