x
into  
x

x
  
x

x
supper,  
x

x
and  
x

x
that  
x

x
will  
x

x
be  
x

x
much  
x

x
worse  
x

x
than  
x

x
having  
x

x
  
x

x
none  
x

x
ourselves.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
As  
x

x
they  
x

x
went  
x

x
on  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
looked  
x

x
from  
x

x
side  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
side  
x

x
for  
x

x
something  
x

x
to  
x

x
eat;  
x

x
but  
x

x
the  
x

x
blackberries  
x

x
  
x

x
were  
x

x
still  
x

x
only  
x

x
in  
x

x
flower,  
x

x
and  
x

x
of  
x

x
course  
x

x
there  
x

x
  
x

x
were  
x

x
no  
x

x
nuts,  
x

x
not  
x

x
even  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
nibbled  
x

x
a  
x

x
bit  
x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

They  
x

still  
x

x

on  
x

x
and  
x

x
on. 
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
long

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
was  
x

x
up  
x

x
and  
x

x
was  
x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

shaggy

x
coat  
x

x
  
x

x
caught  
x

x
fire,  
x

x
and  
x

he  
x

x
was  
x

x
leaping  
x

x
to  
x

x
and  
x

x
fro  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

went  
x

x
together  
x

x
above  
x

x
the  
x

x
tumult  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
burning,  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
swinging  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
air  
x

x
with  
x

x
his  
x

x
arms  
x

x
  
x

x
nearly  
x

x
breaking. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Now  
x

x
far  
x

x
below  
x

x
the  
x

x
goblins  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
wolves  
x

x
  
x

x
were  
x

x
scattering  
x

x
far  
x

x
and  
x

x
wide  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
woods. 
x

x
A  
x

x
  
x

x
few  
x

x
eagles  
x

x
were  
x

x
still  
x

x
circling  
x

x
and  
x

x
sweeping  
x

x
  
x

x
above  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
The  
x

x
flames  
x

x
about  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
trees  
x

x
sprang  
x

x
suddenly  
x

x
up  
x

x
above  
x

x
the  
x

x
highest  
x

x
  
x

x
branches. 
x

x
They  
x

x
went  
x

x
up  
x

x
in  
x

x
crackling  
x

x
fire. 
x

x
There  
x

x
  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
sparks  
x

x
and  
x

x
smoke. 
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
  
x

x
had  
x

x
escaped  
x

x
only  
x

x
just  
x

x
in  
x

x
time!  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Soon  
x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
black  
x

x
floor;  
x

x
and  
x

x
they  
x

x
  
x

x
were  
x

x
high  
x

x
up  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
sky,  
x

x
rising  
x

x
all  
x

x
the  
x

x
time  
x

x
in  
x

x
  
x

x
strong  
x

x
sweeping  
x

x
circles. 
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
never  
x

x
forgot  
x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x
flight,  
x

x
clinging  
x

x
onto  
x

x
Dori’s  
x

x
ankles. 
x

x
He  
x

x
moaned  
x

x
  
x

x
“my  
x

x
arms,  
x

x
my  
x

x
arms!”;  
x

x
but  
x

x
Dori  
x

x
groaned  
x

x
“my  
x

x
  
x

x
poor  
x

x
legs,  
x

x
my  
x

x
poor  
x

x
legs!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

At  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
let  
x

x
alone  
x

x
trees  
x

x
(never  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

his  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Summer  
x

x
or  
x

x
not,  
x

x
it  
x

x
  
x

x

x
very  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

The  
x

x

x

x

just  
x

x

x
  
x

x
appeared  
x

x
to  
x

x
know  
x

x
one  
x

x
another  
x

x
slightly,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
even  
x

x
to  
x

x
be  
x

x
on  
x

x
friendly  
x

x
terms. 
x

x
As  
x

x
a  
x

x
matter  
x

x
of  
x

x
fact  
x

x
  
x

x
Gandalf,  
x

x
who  
x

x
had  
x

x
often  
x

x
been  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
mountains,  
x

x
  
x

x
had  
x

x
once  
x

x
rendered  
x

x
a  
x

x
service  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
eagles  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
healed  
x

x
their  
x

x
lord  
x

x
from  
x

x
an  
x

x
arrow-wound. 
x

x
So  
x

x
you  
x

x
  
x

x
see  
x

x
‘prisoners’  
x

x
had  
x

x
meant  
x

x
‘prisoners  
x

x
rescued  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
goblins’  
x

x
only,  
x

x
and  
x

x
not  
x

x
captives  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
eagles. 
x

x
As  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
listened  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
talk  
x

x
of  
x

x
Gandalf  
x

x
  
x

x
he  
x

x

x

x
that  
x

x
at  
x

x
last  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
going  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
escape  
x

x
really  
x

x
and  
x

x
truly  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
dreadful  
x

x
  
x

x
mountains. 
x

x
He  
x

x
was  
x

x
discussing  
x

x
plans  
x

x
with  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
Great  
x

x
Eagle  
x

x
for  
x

x
carrying  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
himself  
x

x
and  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
far  
x

x
away  
x

x
and  
x

x
setting  
x

x
them  
x

x
  
x

x
down  
x

x
well  
x

x
on  
x

x
their  
x

x
journey  
x

x
across  
x

x
the  
x

x
plains  
x

x
  
x

x
below. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
Misty  
x

x
Mountains  
x

x
looking  
x

x
West  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
Eyrie  
x

x
towards  
x

x
Goblin  
x

x
Gate  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
Lord  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Eagles  
x

x
would  
x

x
not  
x

x
take  
x

x
them  
x

x
  
x

x
anywhere  
x

x
near  
x

x
where  
x

x
men  
x

x
lived. 
x

x
“They  
x

x
would  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
at  
x

x
us  
x

x
with  
x

x
their  
x

x
great  
x

x
bows  
x

x
of  
x

x
yew,”  
x

x
he  
x

x
  
x

x
said,  
x

x
“for  
x

x
they  
x

x
would  
x

x
think  
x

x
we  
x

x
were  
x

x
after  
x

x
their  
x

x
  
x

x
sheep. 
x

x
And  
x

x
at  
x

x
other  
x

x
times  
x

x
they  
x

x
would  
x

x
be  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
No!  
x

x
we  
x

x
are  
x

x
glad  
x

x
to  
x

x
cheat  
x

x
the  
x

x
goblins  
x

x
of  
x

x
their  
x

x
  
x

x
sport,  
x

x
and  
x

x
glad  
x

x
to  
x

x
repay  
x

x
our  
x

x
thanks  
x

x
to  
x

x
you,  
x

x
but  
x

x
  
x

x
we  
x

x
will  
x

x
not  
x

x
risk  
x

x
ourselves  
x

x
for  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
southward  
x

x
plains.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Very  
x

x
well,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
Gandalf. 
x

x
“Take  
x

x
us  
x

x
where  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
as  
x

x
far  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
are  
x

x
already  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
obliged  
x

x
to  
x

x
you. 
x

x
But  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
meantime  
x

x
we  
x

x
are  
x

x
  
x

x
famished  
x

x
with  
x

x
hunger.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“I  
x

x
am  
x

x
nearly  
x

x
dead  
x

x
of  
x

x
it,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
in  
x

x
a  
x

x
weak  
x

x
  
x

x
little  
x

x
voice  
x

x
that  
x

x
nobody  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“That  
x

x
can  
x

x
perhaps  
x

x
be  
x

x
mended,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
Lord  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Eagles. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Later  
x

x

x

x

x

x
might  
x

x
have  
x

x
seen  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x
of  
x

x
rock  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
figures  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
round  
x

x
it  
x

x
cooking  
x

x
and  
x

x
making  
x

x
a  
x

x
fine  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
smell. 
x

x
The  
x

x
eagles  
x

x
had  
x

x
brought  
x

x
up  
x

x
dry  
x

x
  
x

x
boughs  
x

x
for  
x

x
fuel,  
x

x
and  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
brought  
x

x
rabbits,  
x

x
  
x

x
hares,  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
small  
x

x
sheep. 
x

x
The  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
  
x

x
managed  
x

x
all  
x

x
the  
x

x
preparations. 
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
was  
x

x
too  
x

x
  
x

x
weak  
x

x
to  
x

x
help,  
x

x
and  
x

x
anyway  
x

x
he  
x

x
was  
x

x
not  
x

x
much  
x

x
  
x

x
good  
x

x
at  
x

x
skinning  
x

x
rabbits  
x

x
or  
x

x
cutting  
x

x
up  
x

x
meat,  
x

x
  
x

x
being  
x

x
used  
x

x
to  
x

x
having  
x

x
it  
x

x
delivered  
x

x
by  
x

x
the  
x

x
butcher  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
all  
x

x
ready  
x

x
to  
x

x
cook. 
x

x
Gandalf,  
x

x
too,  
x

x
was  
x

x
lying  
x

x
down  
x

x
  
x

x
after  
x

x
doing  
x

x
his  
x

x
part  
x

x
in  
x

x
setting  
x

x
the  
x

x
fire  
x

x
going,  
x

x
  
x

x
since  
x

x
Oin  
x

x
and  
x

x
Gloin  
x

x
had  
x

x
lost  
x

x
their  
x

x
tinder-boxes. 
x

x
  
x

x
(Dwarves  
x

x
have  
x

x
never  
x

x
taken  
x

x
to  
x

x
matches  
x

x
even  
x

x
  
x

x
yet.)  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
So  
x

x
ended  
x

x
the  
x

x
adventures  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Misty  
x

x
  
x

x
Mountains. 
x

x
Soon  
x

x
Bilbo’s  
x

x
stomach  
x

x
was  
x

x
feeling  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
again,  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
felt  
x

x
he  
x

x
could  
x

x
  
x

x
sleep  
x

x
contentedly,  
x

x
though  
x

x
really  
x

x
he  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
than  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
He  
x

x
slept  
x

x

x

x
up  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
rock  
x

x
more  
x

x

x

x
than  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
his  
x

x
own  
x

x

x

x
hole  
x

x
at  
x

x
home. 
x

x
  
x

x
But  
x

x
all  
x

x

x

x

x

x
dreamed  
x

x
of  
x

x
his  
x

x
own  
x

x
house  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
wandered  
x

x
in  
x

x
his  
x

x
sleep  
x

x
into  
x

x
all  
x

x

x

x
different  
x

x
  
x

x
rooms  
x

x

x

x
for  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

Chapter  
x

x

x
QUEER  
x

x
LODGINGS  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
next  
x

x
morning  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
woke  
x

x
up  
x

x
with  
x

x
the  
x

x
early  
x

x
  
x

x
sun  
x

x
in  
x

x
his  
x

x
eyes. 
x

x
He  
x

x
jumped  
x

x
up  
x

x
to  
x

x
look  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
time  
x

x
and  
x

x
to  
x

x
go  
x

x
and  
x

x
put  
x

x
his  
x

x
kettle  
x

x
on  
x

x
—  
x

x
and  
x

x
found  
x

x
  
x

x
he  
x

x
was  
x

x
not  
x

x
home  
x

x
at  
x

x
all. 
x

x
So  
x

x
he  
x

x
sat  
x

x
down  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
wished  
x

x
in  
x

x
vain  
x

x
for  
x

x
a  
x

x
wash  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
brush. 
x

x
He  
x

x
did  
x

x
  
x

x
not  
x

x
get  
x

x
either,  
x

x
nor  
x

x
tea  
x

x
nor  
x

x
toast  
x

x
nor  
x

x
bacon  
x

x
for  
x

x
  
x

x
his  
x

x
breakfast,  
x

x
only  
x

x
cold  
x

x
mutton  
x

x
and  
x

x
rabbit. 
x

x
And  
x

x
  
x

x
after  
x

x
that  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
to  
x

x
get  
x

x
ready  
x

x
for  
x

x
a  
x

x
fresh  
x

x
start. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
This  
x

x
time  
x

x
he  
x

x
was  
x

x
allowed  
x

x
to  
x

x
climb  
x

x
on  
x

x
to  
x

x
an  
x

x
  
x

x
eagle’s  
x

x
back  
x

x
and  
x

x
cling  
x

x
between  
x

x
his  
x

x
wings. 
x

x
The  
x

x
  
x

x
air  
x

x
rushed  
x

x
over  
x

x
him  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
shut  
x

x
his  
x

x
eyes. 
x

x
The  
x

x
  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
were  
x

x
crying  
x

x
farewells  
x

x
and  
x

x
promising  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
repay  
x

x
the  
x

x
Lord  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Eagles  
x

x
if  
x

x
ever  
x

x
they  
x

x
could,  
x

x
  
x

x
as  
x

x
off  
x

x
rose  
x

x
fifteen  
x

x
great  
x

x
birds  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
mountain’s  
x

x
side. 
x

x
The  
x

x
sun  
x

x
was  
x

x
still  
x

x
close  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
eastern  
x

x
edge  
x

x
of  
x

x
things. 
x

x
The  
x

x
morning  
x

x
was  
x

x
cool,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
mists  
x

x
were  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
valleys  
x

x
and  
x

x
hollows  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
twined  
x

x
here  
x

x
and  
x

x
there  
x

x
about  
x

x
the  
x

x
peaks  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
pinnacles  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
hills. 
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
opened  
x

x
an  
x

x
eye  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
peep  
x

x
and  
x

x
saw  
x

x
that  
x

x
the  
x

x
birds  
x

x
were  
x

x
already  
x

x
high  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
up  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
world  
x

x
was  
x

x
far  
x

x
away,  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
mountains  
x

x
were  
x

x
falling  
x

x
back  
x

x
behind  
x

x
them  
x

x
into  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
distance. 
x

x
He  
x

x
shut  
x

x
his  
x

x
eyes  
x

x
again  
x

x
and  
x

x
held  
x

x
  
x

x
on  
x

x
tighter. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Don’t  
x

x
pinch!”  
x

x
said  
x

x
his  
x

x
eagle. 
x

x
“You  
x

x
need  
x

x
not  
x

x
  
x

x
be  
x

x
frightened  
x

x
like  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
even  
x

x

x

x

x
look  
x

x
  
x

x
rather  
x

x
like  
x

x
one. 
x

x
It  
x

x
is  
x

x
a  
x

x
fair  
x

x
morning  
x

x
with  
x

x
little  
x

x
  
x

x
wind. 
x

x
What  
x

x
is  
x

x

x

x
than  
x

x

x

x

x

would  
x

x
have  
x

x
liked  
x

x
to  
x

x

x

x
“A  
x

x

x

x
bath  
x

x
  
x

x

x
late  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
him  
x

x
not  
x

x
to  
x

x
leave  
x

x
them. 
x

x
They  
x

x
  
x

x
offered  
x

x
him  
x

x
dragon-gold  
x

x
and  
x

x
silver  
x

x
and  
x

x
jewels,  
x

x
  
x

x
but  
x

x
he  
x

x
would  
x

x
not  
x

x
change  
x

x
his  
x

x
mind. 
x

x
“We  
x

x
shall  
x

x
  
x

x
see,  
x

x
we  
x

x
shall  
x

x
see!”  
x

x
he  
x

x
said,  
x

x
“and  
x

x
I  
x

x
think  
x

x
I  
x

x
have  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
earned  
x

x
already  
x

x
some  
x

x
of  
x

x
your  
x

x
dragon-gold  
x

x
—  
x

x
  
x

x
when  
x

x
you  
x

x
have  
x

x
got  
x

x
it.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
After  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Then  
x

x
they  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
their  
x

x
clothes  
x

x
and  
x

x
bathed  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
river,  
x

x
which  
x

x
  
x

x
was  
x

x
shallow  
x

x
and  
x

x
clear  
x

x
and  
x

x
stony  
x

x
at  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
had  
x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
which  
x

x
was  
x

x
now  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
warm,  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x

x

x
if  
x

x
still  
x

x
  
x

x
sore  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
little  
x

x
hungry. 
x

x

x

x
they  
x

x
crossed  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
ford  
x

x
(carrying  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbit),  
x

x
and  
x

x
then  
x

x
began  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
through  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
down  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
lines  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
tall  
x

x
  
x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
Carrock  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
near  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
he  
x

x

x

x
it  
x

x
  
x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“The  
x

x
Somebody  
x

x

x

x
spoke  
x

x
of  
x

x
—  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
You  
x

x
must  
x

x
all  
x

x
be  
x

x
very  
x

x
polite  
x

x
when  
x

x
I  
x

x
  
x

x
introduce  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
you  
x

slowly,  
x

x
two  
x

x
  
x

x
by  
x

x

x

x
I  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
be  
x

x
careful  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
angry  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x
dwarves  
x

x

x

x

x

x
round  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
explain  
x

x
it  
x

x
all  
x

x
a

x

x

x

x

—  
x

x

x

x
so  
x

x
on.

x

“Yes  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
And  
x

x

x

x

x

x

explaining  
x

x
very  
x

x

x

the  
x

x

x
“If  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
more,  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
is  
x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x

x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
“What!  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x
man  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Good  
x

x
gracious  
x

x
heavens,  
x

x
no,  
x

x
no,  
x

x
NO,  
x

x
NO!”  
x

x
  
x

x
said  
x

x
Gandalf. 
x

x
“Don’t  
x

x

x

x

x

x
again  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
any  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
word!  
x

x
He  
x

x
is  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
changes  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
I  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
fancy  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
He  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
lives  
x

x
most  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
far  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
I  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

Carrock  
x

at  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
will  
x

x
come  
x

x
when  
x

x
they  
x

x
will  
x

x
perish  
x

x
and  
x

x
I  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
That  
x

x
is  
x

x
why  
x

x
I  
x

x
believe  
x

he  
x

x
once  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
mountains  
x

x
himself.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
now  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
them. 
x

x
Up  
x

x
  
x

x
slope  
x

x
and  
x

x
down  
x

x
dale  
x

x
they  
x

x
plodded. 
x

x
It  
x

x
grew  
x

x
very  
x

x
  
x

x
hot. 
x

x
Sometimes  
x

x
they  
x

x
rested  
x

x
under  
x

x
the  
x

x
trees,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
then  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
felt  
x

x
so  
x

x
hungry  
x

x
that  
x

x
he  
x

x
would  
x

x
have  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
eaten  
x

x
acorns,  
x

x
if  
x

x
any  
x

x
had  
x

x
been  
x

x
ripe  
x

x
enough  
x

x
yet  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x
have  
x

x
fallen  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
ground. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
the  
x

x
middle  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
afternoon  
x

x
before  
x

x
  
x

x
they  
x

x
noticed  
x

x
that  
x

x
great  
x

x
patches  
x

x
of  
x

x
flowers  
x

x
had  
x

x
  
x

x
begun  
x

x
to  
x

x
spring  
x

x
up,  
x

x
all  
x

x
the  
x

x
same  
x

x
kinds  
x

x
growing  
x

x
  
x

x
together  
x

x
as  
x

x
if  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
been  
x

x
planted. 
x

x
Especially  
x

x
  
x

x
there  
x

x
was  
x

x
clover,  
x

x
waving  
x

x
patches  
x

x
of  
x

x
cockscomb  
x

x
  
x

x
clover,  
x

x
and  
x

x
purple  
x

x
clover,  
x

x
and  
x

x
wide  
x

x
stretches  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
short  
x

x
white  
x

x
sweet  
x

x
honey-smelling  
x

x
clover. 
x

x
There  
x

x
  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
buzzing  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
whirring  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
droning  
x

x
in  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
air. 
x

x
Bees  
x

x
were  
x

x
busy  
x

x
everywhere. 
x

x
And  
x

x
such  
x

x
  
x

x
bees!  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
had  
x

x
never  
x

x
seen  
x

x
anything  
x

x
like  
x

x
them. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“If  
x

x
one  
x

x
was  
x

x
to  
x

x
sting  
x

x
me,”  
x

x
he  
x

x
thought,  
x

x
“I  
x

x
  
x

x
should  
x

x
swell  
x

x
up  
x

x
as  
x

x
big  
x

x
again  
x

x
as  
x

x
I  
x

x
am!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
They  
x

x
were  
x

x
bigger  
x

x
than  
x

x
hornets. 
x

x
The  
x

x
drones  
x

x
  
x

x
were  
x

x
bigger  
x

x
than  
x

x
your  
x

x
thumb,  
x

x
a  
x

x
good  
x

x
deal,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
bands  
x

x
of  
x

x
yellow  
x

x
on  
x

x
their  
x

x
deep  
x

x
black  
x

x
bodies  
x

x
  
x

x
shone  
x

x
like  
x

x
fiery  
x

x
gold. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“We  
x

x
are  
x

x
getting  
x

x
near,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
Gandalf. 
x

x
“We  
x

x
  
x

x
are  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
edge  
x

x
of  
x

x
his  
x

x
bee-pastures.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
After  
x

x
a  
x

x
while  
x

x
they  
x

x
came  
x

x
to  
x

x
a  
x

x
belt  
x

x
of  
x

x
tall  
x

x
and  
x

x
very  
x

x
  
x

x
ancient  
x

x
oaks,  
x

x
and  
x

x
beyond  
x

x
these  
x

x
to  
x

x
a  
x

x
high  
x

x
thorn-  
x

x
  
x

x
hedge  
x

x
through  
x

x
which  
x

x
you  
x

x
could  
x

x
neither  
x

x
see  
x

x
nor  
x

x
  
x

x
scramble. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“You  
x

x
had  
x

x
better  
x

x
wait  
x

x
here,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
the  
x

x
wizard  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves;  
x

x
“and  
x

x
when  
x

x
I  
x

x
call  
x

x
or  
x

x
whistle  
x

x
begin  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x
come  
x

x
after  
x

x
me  
x

x
—  
x

x
you  
x

x
will  
x

x
see  
x

x
the  
x

x
way  
x

x
I  
x

x
go  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
but  
x

x
only  
x

x
in  
x

x
pairs,  
x

x
mind,  
x

x
about  
x

x
five  
x

x
minutes  
x

x
  
x

x
between  
x

x
each  
x

x
pair  
x

x
of  
x

x
you. 
x

x
Bombur  
x

x
is  
x

x
fattest  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
will  
x

x
do  
x

x
for  
x

x
two,  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
better  
x

x
come  
x

x
alone  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
last. 
x

x
Come  
x

x
on  
x

x
Mr. 
x

x
Baggins!  
x

x
There  
x

x
is  
x

x
a  
x

x
gate  
x

x
  
x

x
somewhere  
x

x
round  
x

x
this  
x

x
way.”  
x

x
And  
x

x
with  
x

x
that  
x

x
he  
x

x
  
x

x
went  
x

x
off  
x

x
along  
x

x
the  
x

x
hedge  
x

x
taking  
x

x
the  
x

x
frightened  
x

x
  
x

x
hobbit  
x

x
with  
x

x
him. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
They  
x

x
soon  
x

x
came  
x

x
to  
x

x
a  
x

x
wooden  
x

x
gate,  
x

x
high  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
beyond  
x

x
which  
x

x
they  
x

x
could  
x

x
see  
x

x
  
x

x
gardens  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
cluster  
x

x
of  
x

x
low  
x

x

x

x
buildings,  
x

x
  
x

x
some  
x

x
thatched  
x

x
and  
x

x
made  
x

x
of  
x

x
unshaped  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
stables,  
x

x
sheds,  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
long  
x

x
low  
x

x

x
  
x

x
house. 
x

x
Inside  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
rows  
x

x
and  
x

x
rows  
x

x
of  
x

x
hives  
x

x
with  
x

x
bell-  
x

x
  
x

x
shaped  
x

x
tops  
x

x
made  
x

x
of  
x

x
straw. 
x

x
The  
x

x
noise  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
giant  
x

x
bees  
x

x
flying  
x

x
to  
x

x
and  
x

x
fro  
x

x
and  
x

x
crawling  
x

x
in  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
out  
x

x
filled  
x

x
all  
x

x
the  
x

x
air. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
wizard  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbit  
x

x
pushed  
x

x
open  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
heavy  
x

x
creaking  
x

x
gate  
x

x
and  
x

x
went  
x

x
down  
x

x
a  
x

x
wide  
x

x
  
x

x
track  
x

x
towards  
x

x
the  
x

x
house. 
x

x
Some  
x

x
horses,  
x

x
very  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
well-groomed,  
x

x
trotted  
x

x
up  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
grass  
x

x
and  
x

x
looked  
x

x
at  
x

x
them  
x

x
intently  
x

x
with  
x

x
very  
x

x
  
x

x
intelligent  
x

x
faces;  
x

x
then  
x

x
off  
x

x

x

x
galloped  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“They  
x

x
have  
x

x
gone  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
strangers,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
Gandalf. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Soon  
x

x
they  
x

x
reached  
x

x
a  
x

x
courtyard,  
x

x
three  
x

x
walls  
x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x
which  
x

x
were  
x

x
formed  
x

x
by  
x

x
the  
x

x
wooden  
x

x
house  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
its  
x

x
two  
x

x
long  
x

x
wings. 
x

x
In  
x

x
the  
x

x
middle  
x

x
there  
x

x
was  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x
with  
x

x
many  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
beside  
x

x
it. 
x

x
Standing  
x

x
near  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
huge  
x

x
man  
x

x
with  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
thick  
x

x
black  
x

x
beard  
x

x
and  
x

x
hair,  
x

x
and  
x

x
great  
x

x
bare  
x

x
arms  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
legs  
x

x
with  
x

x
knotted  
x

x
muscles. 
x

x
He  
x

x
was  
x

x
clothed  
x

x
  
x

x
in  
x

x
a  
x

x
tunic  
x

x
of  
x

x
wool  
x

x
down  
x

x
to  
x

x
his  
x

x
knees,  
x

x
and  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
leaning  
x

x
on  
x

x
a  
x

x
large  
x

x
axe. 
x

x
The  
x

x
horses  
x

x
were  
x

x
  
x

x
standing  
x

x
by  
x

x
him  
x

x
with  
x

x
their  
x

x
noses  
x

x
at  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Ugh!  
x

x
here  
x

x
they  
x

x
are!”  
x

x
he  
x

x
said  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
horses. 
x

x
  
x

x
“They  
x

x
don’t  
x

x
look  
x

x
dangerous. 
x

x
You  
x

x
can  
x

x
be  
x

x
off!”  
x

x
He  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
great  
x

x
rolling  
x

x

x

x
put  
x

x
down  
x

x
his  
x

x
axe  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
came  
x

x
forward. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Who  
x

x
are  
x

x
you  
x

x
and  
x

x
what  
x

x
do  
x

x
you  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
standing  
x

x
in  
x

x
front  
x

x
of  
x

x
them  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
towering  
x

x
tall  
x

x
above  
x

x
Gandalf. 
x

x
As  
x

x
for  
x

x

x

x
he  
x

x
  
x

x
could  
x

x
easily  
x

x
have  
x

x
trotted  
x

x
through  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
without  
x

x
ducking  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x
to  
x

x
miss  
x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
man’s  
x

x
brown  
x

x
tunic. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“I  
x

x
am  
x

x
Gandalf,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
the  
x

x
wizard. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Never  
x

x
heard  
x

x
of  
x

x
him,”  
x

x
growled  
x

x
the  
x

x
man. 
x

x
  
x

x
“And  
x

x
what’s  
x

x
this  
x

x
little  
x

x
fellow?”  
x

x
he  
x

x
said,  
x

x
stooping  
x

x
  
x

x
down  
x

x
to  
x

x
frown  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbit  
x

x
with  
x

x
his  
x

x
bushy  
x

x
black  
x

x
  
x

x
eyebrows. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“That  
x

x
is  
x

x
Mr. 
x

x
Baggins,  
x

x
a  
x

x
hobbit  
x

x
of  
x

x
good  
x

x
  
x

x
family  
x

x
and  
x

x
unimpeachable  
x

x
reputation,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
  
x

x
Gandalf. 
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
bowed. 
x

x
He  
x

x
had  
x

x
no  
x

x
hat  
x

x
to  
x

x
take  
x

x
  
x

x
off,  
x

x
and  
x

x
was  
x

x
painfully  
x

x
conscious  
x

x
of  
x

x
his  
x

x
many  
x

x
  
x

x
missing  
x

x
buttons. 
x

x
“I  
x

x
am  
x

x
a  
x

x
wizard,”  
x

x
continued  
x

x
  
x

x
Gandalf. 
x

x
“I  
x

x
have  
x

x
heard  
x

x
of  
x

x
you,  
x

x
if  
x

x
you  
x

x
have  
x

x
not  
x

x
  
x

x
heard  
x

x
of  
x

x
me;  
x

x
but  
x

x
perhaps  
x

x
you  
x

x
have  
x

x
heard  
x

x
of  
x

x
my  
x

x
  
x

x
good  
x

x
cousin  
x

x
Radagast  
x

x
who  
x

x
lives  
x

x
near

x

x
very  
x

x
part  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
mountains  
x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
was  
x

x
describing. 
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of

their

x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

.

.

x
What  
x

x
  
x

x
did  
x

x
the  
x

x
rest  
x

x
sit  
x

x
on?  
x

x
They  
x

x
were  
x

x
not  
x

x
forgotten. 
x

x
The  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
other  
x

x
ponies  
x

x
came  
x

x
in  
x

x
rolling  
x

x
round  
x

x
drum-  
x

x
  
x

x
shaped  
x

x
sections  
x

x
of  
x

x
logs,  
x

x
smoothed  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
polished,  
x

x
and  
x

x
low  
x

x
enough  
x

x
even  
x

x
for  
x

x
Bilbo;  
x

x
so  
x

x
  
x

x
soon  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
all  
x

x
seated  
x

x
at  
x

x
Beorn’s  
x

x
table,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
hall  
x

x
had  
x

x
not  
x

x
seen  
x

x
such  
x

x
a  
x

x
gathering  
x

x
for  
x

x
many  
x

x
  
x

x
a  
x

x
year. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
There  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
a  
x

x
supper,  
x

x
or  
x

x
a  
x

x
dinner,  
x

x
such  
x

x
  
x

x
as  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
not  
x

x
had  
x

x
since  
x

x
they  
x

x
left  
x

x
the  
x

x
Last  
x

x
  
x

x
Homely  
x

x
House  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
West  
x

x
and  
x

x
said  
x

x
good-bye  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x
Elrond. 
x

x
The  
x

x
light  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
torches  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
fire  
x

x
  
x

x
flickered  
x

x
about  
x

x
them,  
x

x
and  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
table  
x

x
were  
x

x
two  
x

x
  
x

x
tall  
x

x
red  
x

x
beeswax  
x

x
candles. 
x

x
All  
x

x
the  
x

x
time  
x

x
they  
x

x
ate,  
x

x
  
x

x
Beorn  
x

x
in  
x

x
his  
x

x
deep  
x

x
rolling  
x

x
voice  
x

x
told  
x

x
tales  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
wild  
x

x
lands  
x

x
on  
x

x
this  
x

x
side  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
mountains,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
especially  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
dark  
x

x
and  
x

x
dangerous  
x

x
wood,  
x

x
  
x

x
that  
x

x
lay  
x

x
outstretched  
x

x
far  
x

x
to  
x

x
North  
x

x
and  
x

x
South  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
day’s  
x

x
ride  
x

x
before  
x

x
them,  
x

x
barring  
x

x
their  
x

x
way  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
East,  
x

x
the  
x

x
terrible  
x

x
forest  
x

x
of  
x

x
Mirkwood. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
listened  
x

x
and  
x

x
shook  
x

x
their  
x

x
  
x

x
beards,  
x

x
for  
x

x
they  
x

x
knew  
x

x
that  
x

x
they  
x

x
must  
x

x
soon  
x

x
  
x

x
venture  
x

x
into  
x

x
that  
x

x
forest  
x

x
and  
x

x
that  
x

x
after  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
mountains  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
the  
x

x
worst  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
perils  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x
pass  
x

x
before  
x

x
they  
x

x
came  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
dragon’s  
x

x
  
x

x
stronghold. 
x

x
When  
x

x
dinner  
x

x
was  
x

x
over  
x

x
they  
x

x
began  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x
tell  
x

x
tales  
x

x
of  
x

x
their  
x

x
own,  
x

x
but  
x

x
Beorn  
x

x
seemed  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
be  
x

x
growing  
x

x
drowsy  
x

x
and  
x

x
paid  
x

x
little  
x

x
heed  
x

x
to  
x

x
them. 
x

x
  
x

x
They  
x

x
spoke  
x

x
most  
x

x
of  
x

x
gold  
x

x
and  
x

x
silver  
x

x
and  
x

x
jewels  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
making  
x

x
of  
x

x
things  
x

x
by  
x

x
smith-craft,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
Beorn  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
appear  
x

x
to  
x

x
care  
x

x
for  
x

x
such  
x

x
things:  
x

x
  
x

x
there  
x

x
were  
x

x
no  
x

x
things  
x

x
of  
x

x
gold  
x

x
or  
x

x
silver  
x

x
in  
x

x
his  
x

x
hall,  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
few  
x

x
save  
x

x
the  
x

x
knives  
x

x
were  
x

x
made  
x

x
of  
x

x
metal  
x

x
at  
x

x
  
x

x
all. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
They  
x

x
sat  
x

x
long  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
table  
x

x
with  
x

x
their  
x

x
wooden  
x

x
  
x

x
drinking-bowls  
x

x
filled  
x

x
with  
x

x
mead. 
x

x
The  
x

x
dark  
x

x
night  
x

x
  
x

x
came  
x

x
on  
x

x
outside. 
x

x
The  
x

x
fires  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
middle  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
hall  
x

x
were  
x

x
built  
x

x
with  
x

x
fresh  
x

x
logs  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
torches  
x

x
  
x

x
were  
x

x
put  
x

x
out,  
x

x
and  
x

x
still  
x

x
they  
x

x
sat  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
light  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
dancing  
x

x
flames  
x

x
with  
x

x
the  
x

x
pillars  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
house  
x

x
  
x

x
standing  
x

x
tall  
x

x
behind  
x

x
them,  
x

x
and  
x

x
dark  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
top  
x

x
  
x

x
like  
x

x
trees  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
forest. 
x

x
Whether  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
magic  
x

x
or  
x

x
  
x

x
not,  
x

x
it  
x

x
seemed  
x

x
to  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
that  
x

x
he  
x

x
heard  
x

x
a  
x

x
sound  
x

x
  
x

x
like  
x

x
wind  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
branches  
x

x
stirring  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
rafters,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
hoot  
x

x
of  
x

x
owls. 
x

x
Soon  
x

x
he  
x

x
began  
x

x
to  
x

x
nod  
x

x
  
x

x
with  
x

x
sleep  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
voices  
x

x
seemed  
x

x
to  
x

x
grow  
x

x
far  
x

x
  
x

x
away,  
x

x
until  
x

x
he  
x

x
woke  
x

x
with  
x

x
a  
x

x
start. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
great  
x

x
door  
x

x
had  
x

x
creaked  
x

x
and  
x

x
slammed. 
x

x
  
x

x
Beorn  
x

x
was  
x

x
gone. 
x

x
The  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
were  
x

x
sitting  
x

x
  
x

x
cross-legged  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
floor  
x

x
round  
x

x
the  
x

x
fire,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
presently  
x

x
they  
x

x
began  
x

x
to  
x

x
sing. 
x

x
Some  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
verses  
x

x
were  
x

x
like  
x

x
this,  
x

x
but  
x

x
there  
x

x
were  
x

x
many  
x

x
  
x

x
more,  
x

x
and  
x

x
their  
x

x
singing  
x

x
went  
x

x
on  
x

x
for  
x

x
a  
x

x
long  
x

x
while:  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
wind  
x

x
was  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
withered  
x

x
heath,  
x

x
  
x

x
but  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
forest  
x

x
stirred  
x

x
no  
x

x
leaf:  
x

x
  
x

x
there  
x

x
shadows  
x

x
lay  
x

x
by  
x

x
night  
x

x
and  
x

x
day,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
dark  
x

x
things  
x

x
silent  
x

x
crept  
x

x
beneath. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
wind  
x

x
came  
x

x
down  
x

x
from  
x

x
mountains  
x

x
  
x

x
cold,  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
like  
x

x
a  
x

x
tide  
x

x
it  
x

x
roared  
x

x
and  
x

x
rolled;  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
branches  
x

x
groaned,  
x

x
the  
x

x
forest  
x

x
moaned,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
leaves  
x

x
were  
x

x
laid  
x

x
upon  
x

x
the  
x

x
mould. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
wind  
x

x
went  
x

x
on  
x

x
from  
x

x
West  
x

x
to  
x

x
East;  
x

x
  
x

x
all  
x

x
movement  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
forest  
x

x
ceased,  
x

x
  
x

x
but  
x

x
shrill  
x

x
and  
x

x
harsh  
x

x
across  
x

x
the  
x

x
marsh  
x

x
  
x

x
its  
x

x
whistling  
x

x
voices  
x

x
were  
x

x
released. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
grasses  
x

x
hissed,  
x

x
their  
x

x
tassels  
x

x
bent,  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
reeds  
x

x
were  
x

x
rattling  
x

x
—  
x

x
on  
x

x
it  
x

x
went  
x

x
  
x

x
o’er  
x

x
shaken  
x

x
pool  
x

x
under  
x

x
heavens  
x

x
cool  
x

x
  
x

x
where  
x

x
racing  
x

x
clouds  
x

x
were  
x

x
tom  
x

x
and  
x

x
rent. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
It  
x

x
passed  
x

x
the  
x

x
lonely  
x

x
Mountain  
x

x
bare  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
swept  
x

x
above  
x

x
the  
x

x
dragon’s  
x

x
lair:  
x

x
  
x

x
there  
x

x
black  
x

x
and  
x

x
dark  
x

x
lay  
x

x
boulders  
x

x
stark  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
flying  
x

x
smoke  
x

x
was  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
air. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
It  
x

x
left  
x

x
the  
x

x
world  
x

x
and  
x

x
took  
x

x
its  
x

x
flight  
x

x
  
x

x
over  
x

x
the  
x

x
wide  
x

x
seas  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
night. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
moon  
x

x
set  
x

x
sail  
x

x
upon  
x

x
the  
x

x
gale,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
stars  
x

x
were  
x

x
fanned  
x

x
to  
x

x
leaping  
x

x
light. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
began  
x

x
to  
x

x
nod  
x

x
again. 
x

x
Suddenly  
x

x
up  
x

x
  
x

x
stood  
x

x
Gandalf. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“It  
x

x
is  
x

x
time  
x

x
for  
x

x
us  
x

x
to  
x

x
sleep,’’  
x

x
he  
x

x
said,  
x

x
“  
x

x
—  
x

x
for  
x

x
us,  
x

x
  
x

x
but  
x

x
not  
x

x
I  
x

x
think  
x

x
for  
x

x
Beorn. 
x

x
In  
x

x
this  
x

x
hall  
x

x
we  
x

x
can  
x

x
rest  
x

x
  
x

x
sound  
x

x
and  
x

x
safe,  
x

x
but  
x

x
I  
x

x
warn  
x

x
you  
x

x
all  
x

x
not  
x

x
to  
x

x
forget  
x

x
  
x

x
what  
x

x
Beorn  
x

x
said  
x

x
before  
x

x
he  
x

x
left  
x

x
us:  
x

x
you  
x

x
must  
x

x
not  
x

x
  
x

x
stray  
x

x
outside  
x

x
until  
x

x
the  
x

x
sun  
x

x
is  
x

x
up,  
x

x
on  
x

x
your  
x

x
peril.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
found  
x

x
that  
x

x
beds  
x

x
had  
x

x
already  
x

x
been  
x

x
laid  
x

x
  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
side  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
hall,  
x

x
on  
x

x
a  
x

x
sort  
x

x
of  
x

x
raised  
x

x
  
x

x
platform  
x

x
between  
x

x
the  
x

x
pillars  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
outer  
x

x
wall. 
x

x
  
x

x
For  
x

x
him  
x

x
there  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
little  
x

x
mattress  
x

x
of  
x

x
straw  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
woollen  
x

x
blankets. 
x

x
He  
x

x
snuggled  
x

x
into  
x

x
them  
x

x
very  
x

x
  
x

x
gladly,  
x

x
summertime  
x

x
though  
x

x
it  
x

x
was. 
x

x
The  
x

x
fire  
x

x
  
x

x
burned  
x

x
low  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
fell  
x

x
asleep. 
x

x
Yet  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
night  
x

x
  
x

x
he  
x

x
woke:  
x

x
the  
x

x
fire  
x

x
had  
x

x
now  
x

x
sunk  
x

x
to  
x

x
a  
x

x
few  
x

x
  
x

x
embers;  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
and  
x

x
Gandalf  
x

x
were  
x

x
all  
x

x
  
x

x
asleep,  
x

x
to  
x

x
judge  
x

x
by  
x

x
their  
x

x
breathing;  
x

x
a  
x

x
splash  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
white  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
floor  
x

x
came  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
high  
x

x
moon,  
x

x
  
x

x
which  
x

x
was  
x

x
peering  
x

x
down  
x

x
through  
x

x
the  
x

x
smoke-  
x

x
  
x

x
hole  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
roof. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
There  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
growling  
x

x
sound  
x

x
outside,  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
noise  
x

x
as  
x

x
of  
x

x
some  
x

x
great  
x

x
animal  
x

x
scuffling  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
door. 
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
wondered  
x

x
what  
x

x
it  
x

x
was,  
x

x
and  
x

x
whether  
x

x
  
x

x
it  
x

x
could  
x

x
be  
x

x
Beorn  
x

x
in  
x

x
enchanted  
x

x
shape,  
x

x
and  
x

x
if  
x

x
he  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x
come  
x

x
in  
x

x
as  
x

x
a  
x

x
bear  
x

x
and  
x

x
kill  
x

x

x

x
He  
x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
hid  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
spite  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

platform  
x

x
on  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
Bofur,  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

was  
x

x

x
about  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“or  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

“Mostly  
x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
channel. 
x

x
I  
x

x
  
x

x
had  
x

x
to  
x

x
walk  
x

x
miles  
x

x
before  
x

x
I  
x

x
found  
x

x
a  
x

x
place  
x

x
where  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
river  
x

x
was  
x

x
wide  
x

x
and  
x

x
shallow  
x

x
enough  
x

x
for  
x

x
me  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x
wade  
x

x
and  
x

x
swim,  
x

x
and  
x

x
then  
x

x
miles  
x

x
back  
x

x
again  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x
pick  
x

x
up  
x

x
the  
x

x
tracks  
x

x
again. 
x

x
By  
x

x
that  
x

x
time  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
too  
x

x
late  
x

x
for  
x

x
me  
x

x
to  
x

x
follow  
x

x
them  
x

x
far. 
x

x
They  
x

x
went  
x

x
  
x

x
straight  
x

x
off  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
direction  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
pine-woods  
x

x
on  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
east  
x

x
side  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Misty  
x

x
Mountains,  
x

x
where  
x

x
we  
x

x
  
x

x
had  
x

x
our  
x

x
pleasant  
x

x
little  
x

x
party  
x

x
with  
x

x
the  
x

x
Wargs  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
night  
x

x
before  
x

x
last. 
x

x
And  
x

x
now  
x

x
I  
x

x
think  
x

x
I  
x

x
have  
x

x
  
x

x
answered  
x

x
your  
x

x
first  
x

x
question,  
x

x
too,”  
x

x
ended  
x

x
  
x

x
Gandalf,  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
sat  
x

x
a  
x

x
long  
x

x
while  
x

x
silent. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
thought  
x

x
he  
x

x
knew  
x

x
what  
x

x
the  
x

x
wizard  
x

x
  
x

x
meant. 
x

x
“What  
x

x
shall  
x

x
we  
x

x
do,”  
x

x
he  
x

x
cried,  
x

x
“if  
x

x
he  
x

x
leads  
x

x
  
x

x
all  
x

x
the  
x

x
Wargs  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
goblins  
x

x
down  
x

x
here?  
x

x
We  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
shall  
x

x
all  
x

x
be  
x

x
caught  
x

x
and  
x

x
killed!  
x

x
I  
x

x
thought  
x

x
you  
x

x
said  
x

x
  
x

x
he  
x

x
was  
x

x
not  
x

x
a  
x

x
friend  
x

x
of  
x

x
theirs.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“So  
x

x
I  
x

x
did. 
x

x
And  
x

x
don’t  
x

x
be  
x

x
silly!  
x

x
You  
x

x
had  
x

x
better  
x

x
  
x

x
go  
x

x
to  
x

x
bed,  
x

x
your  
x

x
wits  
x

x
are  
x

x
sleepy.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
hobbit  
x

x
felt  
x

x
quite  
x

x
crushed,  
x

x
and  
x

x
as  
x

x
there  
x

x
  
x

x
seemed  
x

x
nothing  
x

x
else  
x

x
to  
x

x
do  
x

x
he  
x

x
did  
x

x
go  
x

x
to  
x

x
bed;  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
while  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
were  
x

x
still  
x

x
singing  
x

x
songs  
x

x
  
x

x
he  
x

x
dropped  
x

x
asleep,  
x

x
still  
x

x
puzzling  
x

x
his  
x

x
little  
x

x
head  
x

x
  
x

x
about  
x

x
Beorn,  
x

x
till  
x

x
he  
x

x
dreamed  
x

x
a  
x

x
dream  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
hundreds  
x

x
of  
x

x
black  
x

x
bears  
x

x
dancing  
x

x
slow  
x

x
heavy  
x

x
  
x

x
dances  
x

x
round  
x

x
and  
x

x
round  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
moonlight  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
courtyard. 
x

x
Then  
x

x
he  
x

x
woke  
x

x
up  
x

x
when  
x

x
everyone  
x

x
  
x

x
else  
x

x
was  
x

x
asleep,  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
heard  
x

x
the  
x

x
same  
x

x
  
x

x
scraping,  
x

x
scuffling,  
x

x
snuffling,  
x

x
and  
x

x
growling  
x

x
as  
x

x
  
x

x
before. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Next  
x

x

x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
all  
x

x
wakened  
x

x
by  
x

x
  
x

x
Beorn  
x

x
himself. 
x

x
“So  
x

x
here  
x

x
you  
x

x
all  
x

x
are  
x

x
still!”  
x

x
he  
x

x
  
x

x
said. 
x

x
He  
x

x
picked  
x

x
up  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbit  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
“Not  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
up  
x

x

x

x
Wargs  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
wicked  
x

x
bears  
x

x
  
x

x
yet  
x

x
I  
x

x
see”;  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
poked  
x

x
Mr. 
x

x
Baggins’  
x

x
waistcoat  
x

x
  
x

x
most  
x

x
disrespectfully. 
x

x
“Little  
x

x
bunny  
x

x
is  
x

x
getting  
x

x
nice  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
fat  
x

x
again  
x

x
on  
x

x
bread  
x

x
and  
x

x
honey,”  
x

x
he  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
“Come  
x

x
and  
x

x
have  
x

x
some  
x

x
more!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
So  
x

x
they  
x

x
all  
x

x
went  
x

x
to  
x

x
breakfast  
x

x
with  
x

x
him. 
x

x
  
x

x
Beorn  
x

x
was  
x

x
most  
x

x
jolly  
x

x
for  
x

x
a  
x

x
change;  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

in  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
set  
x

them  
x

x
all  
x

x
laughing  
x

x
with  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x

x

x
nor  
x

x
  
x

did  
x

x
they  
x

x
have  
x

x
to  
x

x
wonder  
x

x
long  
x

x
where  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

so  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
told  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
himself. 
x

x
He  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
that  
x

he  
x

x

x

x

x

in

x

any  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
that  
x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x

x

x

x
Warg  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

for  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves,  
x

x
and  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
fiercely  
x

x
angry  
x

x
  
x

x
because  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Great  
x

x
Goblin,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
also  
x

x
because  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
chief  
x

x
wolfs  
x

x
  
x

x
nose  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
told  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
forced  
x

x
them,  
x

x
but  
x

x
he  
x

x
guessed  
x

x
there  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
than  
x

x
this  
x

x
afoot,  
x

x

x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

of  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
into  
x

x

x

x

x

x
shadowed  
x

x
by  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
might  
x

x
soon  
x

x
be  
x

x
made  
x

x
to  
x

x
find  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
dwarves,  
x

x
or  
x

x

x

x
take  
x

x
vengeance  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x

x
that  
x

x
lived  
x

x

and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“It  
x

x

x

x

x

x
good  
x

x
story,  
x

x
that  
x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

Beorn,  
x

x
“but  
x

x
I  
x

x
like  
x

x
it  
x

x
still  
x

x

x

x
now  
x

x

x

x
am  
x

x
sure  
x

x
it  
x

x
is  
x

x
  
x

x
true. 
x

x
You  
x

x
must  
x

x
forgive  
x

x
my  
x

x
not  
x

x
taking  
x

x
your  
x

x
word. 
x

x
  
x

x
If  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
would  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
word  
x

x
of  
x

x
no  
x

x
one  
x

x
that  
x

x
you  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
as  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
brother  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
I  
x

x
  
x

x
can  
x

x
only  
x

x
say  
x

x
that  
x

x
I  
x

x
have  
x

x
hurried  
x

x
home  
x

x
as  
x

x
fast  
x

x
as  
x

x
  
x

x
I  
x

x
could  
x

x
to  
x

x
see  
x

x
that  
x

x
you  
x

x
were  
x

x
safe,  
x

x
and  
x

x
to  
x

x
offer  
x

x
  
x

x
you  
x

x
any  
x

x
help  
x

x
that  
x

x
I  
x

x
can. 
x

x
I  
x

x
shall  
x

x
think  
x

x
more  
x

x
kindly  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
after  
x

x
this. 
x

x
Killed  
x

x
the  
x

x
Great  
x

x
Goblin,  
x

x
  
x

x
killed  
x

x
the  
x

x
Great  
x

x
Goblin!”  
x

x
he  
x

x
chuckled  
x

x
fiercely  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
himself. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“What  
x

x
did  
x

x
you  
x

x

x

x
with  
x

x
the  
x

x
goblin  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
Warg?”  
x

x
asked  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Come  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x
Beorn,  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x
followed  
x

x

x

x

x

x
house. 
x

x

x

x

x

x
head  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

Beorn  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
But  
x

x
now  
x

x
he  
x

x
was  
x

x
their  
x

x
friend,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
Gandalf  
x

x
thought  
x

x
it  
x

x
wise  
x

x
to  
x

x
tell  
x

x
him  
x

x
their  
x

x
whole  
x

x
  
x

x
story  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
reason  
x

x
of  
x

x
their  
x

x
journey,  
x

x
so  
x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x
they  
x

x
could  
x

x
get  
x

x
the  
x

x
most  
x

x
help  
x

x
he  
x

x
could  
x

x
offer. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
This  
x

x
is  
x

x
what  
x

x
he  
x

x
promised  
x

x
to  
x

x
do  
x

x
for  
x

x
them. 
x

x
He  
x

x
  
x

x
would  
x

x
provide  
x

x
ponies  
x

x
for  
x

x
each  
x

x
of  
x

x
them,  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
horse  
x

x
for  
x

x
Gandalf,  
x

x
for  
x

x
their  
x

x
journey  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
forest,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
would  
x

x
lade  
x

x
them  
x

x
with  
x

x
food  
x

x
to  
x

x
last  
x

x
them  
x

x
  
x

x
for  
x

x
weeks  
x

x
with  
x

x
care,  
x

x
and  
x

x
packed  
x

x
so  
x

x
as  
x

x
to  
x

x
be  
x

x
as  
x

x
  
x

x
easy  
x

x
as  
x

x
possible  
x

x
to  
x

x
carry  
x

x
—  
x

x
nuts,  
x

x
flour,  
x

x
sealed  
x

x
  
x

x
jars  
x

x
of  
x

x
dried  
x

x
fruits,  
x

x
and  
x

x
red  
x

x
earthenware  
x

x
pots  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
honey,  
x

x
and  
x

x
twice-baked  
x

x
cakes  
x

x
that  
x

x
would  
x

x
keep  
x

x
  
x

x
good  
x

x
a  
x

x
long  
x

x
time,  
x

x
and  
x

x
on  
x

x
a  
x

x
little  
x

x
of  
x

x
which  
x

x
they  
x

x
  
x

x
could  
x

x
march  
x

x
far. 
x

x
The  
x

x
making  
x

x
of  
x

x
these  
x

x
was  
x

x
one  
x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x
his  
x

x
secrets;  
x

x
but  
x

x
honey  
x

x
was  
x

x
in  
x

x
them,  
x

x
as  
x

x
in  
x

x
  
x

x
most  
x

x
of  
x

x
his  
x

x
foods,  
x

x
and  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
good  
x

x
to  
x

x
eat,  
x

x
  
x

x
though  
x

x
they  
x

x
made  
x

x
one  
x

x

x

x
Water,  
x

x
he  
x

x
said,  
x

x
  
x

x
they  
x

x
would  
x

x
not  
x

x
need  
x

x
to  
x

x
carry  
x

x
this  
x

x
side  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
forest,  
x

x
for  
x

x
there  
x

x
were  
x

x
streams  
x

x
and  
x

x
springs  
x

x
  
x

x
along  
x

x
the  
x

x
road. 
x

x
“But  
x

x
your  
x

x
way  
x

x
through  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
is  
x

x
dark,  
x

x
dangerous  
x

x
and  
x

x
difficult,”  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Water  
x

x

x

x
not  
x

x

x

x

x

x
find  
x

x
there,  
x

x

x

x

x

x
The  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
yet  
x

x
come  
x

x
for  
x

x
nuts  
x

x
(though  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
are  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
I  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
skins  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
will  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
some  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
anything  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of,  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

the  
x

x
  
x

x
other  
x

x
side. 
x

x
North  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Carrock  
x

x
the  
x

x
edge  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
Mirkwood  
x

x
drew  
x

x
closer  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
borders  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
Great  
x

x
River,  
x

x
and  
x

x
though  
x

x
here  
x

x
the  
x

x
Mountains  
x

x
too  
x

x
  
x

x
drew  
x

x
down  
x

x
nearer,  
x

x
Beorn  
x

x
advised  
x

x
them  
x

x
to  
x

x
take  
x

x
  
x

x
this  
x

x
way;  
x

x
for  
x

x
at  
x

x
a  
x

x
place  
x

x
a  
x

x
few  
x

x
days’  
x

x
ride  
x

x
due  
x

x
  
x

x
north  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Carrock  
x

x
was  
x

x
the  
x

x
gate  
x

x
of  
x

x
a  
x

x
little-  
x

x
  
x

x
known  
x

x
pathway  
x

x
through  
x

x
Mirkwood  
x

x
that  
x

x
led  
x

x
  
x

x
almost  
x

x
straight  
x

x
towards  
x

x
the  
x

x
Lonely  
x

x
Mountain. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“The  
x

x
goblins,”  
x

x
Beorn  
x

x
had  
x

x
said,  
x

x
“will  
x

x
not  
x

x
dare  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x
cross  
x

x
the  
x

x
Great  
x

x
River  
x

x
for  
x

x
a  
x

x
hundred  
x

x
miles  
x

x
  
x

x
north  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Carrock  
x

x
nor  
x

x
to  
x

x
come  
x

x
near  
x

x
my  
x

x
house  
x

x
  
x

x
—  
x

x
it  
x

x
is  
x

x
well  
x

x
protected  
x

x
at  
x

x
night!  
x

x
—  
x

x
but  
x

x
I  
x

x
should  
x

x
ride  
x

x
  
x

x
fast;  
x

x
for  
x

x
if  
x

x
they  
x

x
make  
x

x
their  
x

x
raid  
x

x
soon  
x

x
they  
x

x
will  
x

x
  
x

x
cross  
x

x
the  
x

x
river  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
south  
x

x
and  
x

x
scour  
x

x
all  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
edge  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
forest  
x

x
so  
x

x
as  
x

x
to  
x

x
cut  
x

x
you  
x

x
off,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
Wargs  
x

x
run  
x

x
swifter  
x

x
than  
x

x
ponies. 
x

x
Still  
x

x
you  
x

x
are  
x

x
  
x

x
safer  
x

x
going  
x

x
north,  
x

x
even  
x

x
though  
x

x
you  
x

x
seem  
x

x
to  
x

x
be  
x

x
  
x

x
going  
x

x
back  
x

x
nearer  
x

x
to  
x

x
their  
x

x
strongholds;  
x

x
for  
x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x
is  
x

x
what  
x

x
they  
x

x
will  
x

x
least  
x

x
expect,  
x

x
and  
x

x
they  
x

x
will  
x

x
have  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
longer  
x

x
ride  
x

x
to  
x

x
catch  
x

x
you. 
x

x
Be  
x

x
off  
x

x
now  
x

x
as  
x

x
quick  
x

x
  
x

x
as  
x

x
you  
x

x
may!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
That  
x

x
is  
x

x
why  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
now  
x

x
riding  
x

x
in  
x

x
silence,  
x

x
  
x

x
galloping  
x

x
wherever  
x

x
the  
x

x
ground  
x

x
was  
x

x
grassy  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
smooth,  
x

x
with  
x

x
the  
x

x
mountains  
x

x
dark  
x

x
on  
x

x
their  
x

x
left,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
distance  
x

x
the  
x

x
line  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
river  
x

x
with  
x

x
its  
x

x
  
x

x
trees  
x

x
drawing  
x

x
ever  
x

x
closer. 
x

x
The  
x

x
sun  
x

x
had  
x

x
only  
x

x
just  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
turned  
x

x
west  
x

x
when  
x

x
they  
x

x
started,  
x

x
and  
x

x
till  
x

x
evening  
x

x
it  
x

x
  
x

x
lay  
x

x
golden  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
land  
x

x
about  
x

x
them. 
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
to  
x

x
think  
x

x
of  
x

x
pursuing  
x

x
goblins  
x

x
behind,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
had  
x

x
put  
x

x
many  
x

x

x

x
between  
x

x
them  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
Beorn’s  
x

x
house  
x

x
they  
x

x
began  
x

x
to  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x

x
again  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
But  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
when  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
dusk  
x

x
came  
x

x
on  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
against  
x

x
the  
x

x
sunset  
x

x
they  
x

x
made  
x

x
a  
x

x
camp  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
set  
x

x
a  
x

x
guard,  
x

x
and  
x

x
most  
x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
uneasily  
x

x
with  
x

x
dreams  
x

x
in  
x

x
which  
x

x
there  
x

x
came  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
hunting  
x

x
wolves  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
cries  
x

x
of  
x

x
goblins. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Still  
x

x
the  
x

x
next  
x

x

x

x
dawned  
x

x
bright  
x

x
and  
x

x
fair  
x

x
  
x

x
again. 
x

x
There  
x

x
was  
x

x
an  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
upon  
x

x
the  
x

x
ground  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
air  
x

x
was  
x

x
chill,  
x

x
but  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
sun  
x

x

x

x
red  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
East  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
while  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
were  
x

x
still  
x

x
long  
x

x
  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
off  
x

x
again. 
x

x
So  
x

x
they  
x

x
rode  
x

x
now  
x

x
for  
x

x
two  
x

x
  
x

x
more  
x

x
days,  
x

x
and  
x

x
all  
x

x
the  
x

x
while  
x

x
they  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
flowers  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
Sometimes  
x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
sticking  
x

x
up  
x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
long  
x

x
grass,  
x

x
and  
x

x
at  
x

x
first  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
thought  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
the  
x

x
dead  
x

x
branches  
x

x
of  
x

x
trees. 
x

x
  
x

x
That  
x

x
third  
x

x
evening  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
so  
x

x
eager  
x

x
to  
x

x
press  
x

x
  
x

x
on,  
x

x
for  
x

x
Beorn  
x

x
had  
x

x
said  
x

x
that  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
early  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
fourth-day,  
x

x
that  
x

x
they  
x

x
  
x

x
rode  
x

x
still  
x

x
forward  
x

x
after  
x

x
dusk  
x

x
and  
x

x
into  
x

x
the  
x

x
night  
x

x
  
x

x
beneath  
x

x
the  
x

x
moon. 
x

x
As  
x

x

x

x
light  
x

x
faded  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
thought  
x

x
he  
x

x
saw  
x

x
away  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
right,  
x

x
or  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
left,  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
along  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
direction. 
x

x
But  
x

x
if  
x

x

x

x
dared  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
it  
x

x
to  
x

x
Gandalf,  
x

x
the  
x

x
wizard  
x

x
only  
x

x
said:  
x

x
  
x

x
“Hush!  
x

x
Take  
x

x
no  
x

x
notice!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Next  
x

x
day  
x

x
they  
x

x
started  
x

x
before  
x

x
dawn,  
x

x
though  
x

x
  
x

x
their  
x

x
night  
x

x
had  
x

x
been  
x

x
short. 
x

x
As  
x

x
soon  
x

x
as  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
light  
x

x
they  
x

x
could  
x

x
see  
x

x
the  
x

x
forest  
x

x
coming  
x

x
as  
x

x
it  
x

x
were  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x
meet  
x

x
them,  
x

x
or  
x

x
waiting  
x

x
for  
x

x
them  
x

like  
x

x
a  
x

x
black  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
frowning  
x

x
wall  
x

x
before  
x

x
them. 
x

x
The  
x

x
land  
x

x
began  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x
slope  
x

x
up  
x

x
and  
x

x
up,  
x

x
and  
x

x
it  
x

x
seemed  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbit  
x

x
  
x

x
that  
x

x
a  
x

x
silence  
x

x
began  
x

x
to  
x

x
draw  
x

x
in  
x

x
upon  
x

x
them. 
x

x
  
x

x
Birds  
x

x
began  
x

x
to  
x

x
sing  
x

x
less. 
x

x
There  
x

x
were  
x

x
no  
x

x
more  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
not  
x

x
even  
x

x

x

x
were  
x

x
to  
x

x
be  
x

x
seen. 
x

x
By  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
afternoon  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
reached  
x

x
the  
x

x
eaves  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
Mirkwood,  
x

x
and  
x

x
were  
x

x
resting  
x

x
almost  
x

x
beneath  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
great  
x

x
overhanging  
x

x
boughs  
x

x
of  
x

x
its  
x

x
outer  
x

x
trees. 
x

x
  
x

x
Their  
x

x
trunks  
x

x
were  
x

x
huge  
x

x
and  
x

x
gnarled,  
x

x
their  
x

x
  
x

x
branches  
x

x
twisted,  
x

x
their  
x

x
leaves  
x

x
were  
x

x
dark  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
long. 
x

x
Ivy  
x

x
grew  
x

x
on  
x

x
them  
x

x
and  
x

x
trailed  
x

x
along  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
ground. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Well,  
x

x
here  
x

x
is  
x

x
Mirkwood!”  
x

x
said  
x

x
Gandalf. 
x

x
  
x

x
“The  
x

x
greatest  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
forests  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Northern  
x

x
  
x

x
world. 
x

x
I  
x

x
hope  
x

x
you  
x

x
like  
x

x
the  
x

x
look  
x

x
of  
x

x
it. 
x

x
Now  
x

x
you  
x

x
  
x

x
must  
x

x
send  
x

x
back  
x

x
these  
x

x
excellent  
x

x
ponies  
x

x
you  
x

x
  
x

x
have  
x

x
borrowed.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
were  
x

x
inclined  
x

x
to  
x

x
grumble  
x

x
at  
x

x
  
x

x
this,  
x

x
but  
x

x
the  
x

x
wizard  
x

x
told  
x

x
them  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
fools. 
x

x
  
x

x
“Beorn  
x

x
is  
x

x
not  
x

x
as  
x

x
far  
x

x
off  
x

x
as  
x

x
you  
x

x
seem  
x

x
to  
x

x
think,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
you  
x

x
had  
x

x
better  
x

x
keep  
x

x
your  
x

x
promises  
x

x
anyway,  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
for  
x

x
he  
x

x
is  
x

x
a  
x

x
bad  
x

x
enemy. 
x

x
Mr. 
x

x
Baggins’  
x

x
eyes  
x

x
are  
x

x
  
x

x
sharper  
x

x
than  
x

x

x

x
if  
x

x
you  
x

x
have  
x

x
not  
x

x

x

x
each  
x

x
  
x

x
night  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
with  
x

us  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
our  
x

x
  
x

x
camps. 
x

x

x

x

x

x
to  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
an  
x

x

x

x

x

x
ponies  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
may  
x

x
be  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
his  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
not  
x

x

x

x
what  
x

x

x

x
he  
x

x
  
x

has  
x

x

x

x
you  
x

x
in  
x

x

x

x
dwarves  
x

x

x
them  
x

x
so  
x

x
  
x

x
far  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x
nor  
x

x
what  
x

x
would  
x

x

x

x
to  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
take  
x

x
them  
x

x
into  
x

x
the

x

x
  
x

x
“What  
x

x
about  
x

x
the  
x

x
horse,  
x

x
then?”  
x

x

x

x
Thorin. 
x

x

“You  
x

x
don’t  
x

x
mention  
x

x
sending  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

dwarves  
x

x

x
me,”

x

x
  
x

x
“No!  
x

x

x

x

x
Bilbo.

x
“I  
x

x

x

x

“There  
x

x

x

x

x

x
go  
x

x
two  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
miles  
x

x
or  
x

x
so  
x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x
your  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x
south. 
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

Mirkwood

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
dear  
x

x

x

x
Smaug  
x

x

x

x
though  
x

x

x
hope  
x

he  
x

x
is  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
expecting  
x

x
you.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

“Very  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“Good-bye!  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“Good-bye  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

and  
x

x

x
  
x

x
down  
x

x
into  
x

x

x

x
West. 
x

x
But  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
put  
x

x
  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x
to  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
called  
x

x
to  
x

x
them. 
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“Good-bye!  
x

x
Be  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
take  
x

x
care  
x

x
of  
x

x
yourselves  
x

x
—  
x

x
and  
x

x
DON’T  
x

x
  
x

x
LEAVE  
x

x
THE  
x

x
PATH!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
away  
x

x
and  
x

x
was  
x

x
soon  
x

x
lost  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x
sight. 
x

x
“O  
x

x
good-bye  
x

x
and  
x

x
go  
x

x
away!”  
x

x
grunted  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
dwarves,  
x

x
all  
x

x
the  
x

x
more  
x

x
angry  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Chapter  
x

x
VIII  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
FLIES  
x

x
AND  
x

x
SPIDERS  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
They  
x

x
walked  
x

x
in  
x

x
single  
x

x
file. 
x

x
The  
x

x
entrance  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
path  
x

x
was  
x

x
like  
x

x
a  
x

x
sort  
x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
made  
x

x
by  
x

x
two  
x

x
great  
x

x
trees  
x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x
leant  
x

x
together,  
x

x
too  
x

x
old  
x

x
and  
x

x
strangled  
x

x
with  
x

x
ivy  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
hung  
x

x
with  
x

x
lichen  
x

x
to  
x

x
bear  
x

x
more  
x

x
than  
x

x
a  
x

x
few  
x

x
  
x

x
blackened  
x

x
leaves. 
x

x
The  
x

x
path  
x

x
itself  
x

x
was  
x

x
narrow  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
wound  
x

x
in  
x

x
and  
x

x
out  
x

x
among  
x

x
the  
x

x
trunks. 
x

x
Soon  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
light  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
gate  
x

x
was  
x

x
like  
x

x
a  
x

x
little  
x

x
bright  
x

x
hole  
x

x
  
x

x
far  
x

x
behind,  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
quiet  
x

x
was  
x

x
so  
x

x
deep  
x

x
that  
x

x
their  
x

x
  
x

x
feet  
x

x
seemed  
x

x
to  
x

x
thump  
x

x
along  
x

x
while  
x

x
all  
x

x
the  
x

x
trees  
x

x
  
x

x
leaned  
x

x
over  
x

x
them  
x

x
and  
x

x
listened. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
As  
x

x
their  
x

x
eyes  
x

x
became  
x

x
used  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
dimness  
x

x
  
x

x
they  
x

x
could  
x

x
see  
x

x
a  
x

x
little  
x

x
way  
x

x
to  
x

x
either  
x

x
side  
x

x
in  
x

x
a  
x

x
sort  
x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x
darkened  
x

x
green  
x

x
glimmer. 
x

x
Occasionally  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
beam  
x

x
of  
x

x
sun  
x

x
that  
x

x
had  
x

x
the  
x

x
luck  
x

x
to  
x

x
slip  
x

x
in  
x

x
  
x

x
through  
x

x
some  
x

x
opening  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
leaves  
x

x
far  
x

x
above,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
still  
x

x
more  
x

x
luck  
x

x
in  
x

x
not  
x

x
being  
x

x
caught  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
tangled  
x

x
boughs  
x

x
and  
x

x
matted  
x

x
twigs  
x

x
beneath,  
x

x
  
x

x
stabbed  
x

x
down  
x

x
thin  
x

x
and  
x

x
bright  
x

x
before  
x

x
them. 
x

x
But  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
this  
x

x
was  
x

x
seldom,  
x

x
and  
x

x
it  
x

x
soon  
x

x
ceased  
x

x
altogether. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
There  
x

x
were  
x

x
black  
x

x
squirrels  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
wood. 
x

x
As  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
sharp  
x

x
inquisitive  
x

x
eyes  
x

x

x

x

x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
he  
x

x

x

x
catch  
x

x
glimpses  
x

x
of  
x

x
them  
x

x

x

x
off  
x

x
the  
x

x
path  
x

x
and  
x

x
scuttling  
x

x
behind  
x

x
tree-  
x

x
  
x

x
trunks. 
x

x
There  
x

x
were  
x

x
queer  
x

x
noises  
x

x
too,  
x

x
grunts,  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
hurryings  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
undergrowth,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
among  
x

x
the  
x

x
leaves  
x

x
that  
x

x
lay  
x

x
piled  
x

x
endlessly  
x

x
thick  
x

x
  
x

x
in  
x

x
places  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
forest-floor;  
x

x
but  
x

x
what  
x

x
made  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
noises  
x

x
he  
x

x
could  
x

x
not  
x

x
see. 
x

x
The  
x

x
nastiest  
x

x
things  
x

x
  
x

x
they  
x

x
saw  
x

x
were  
x

x
the  
x

x
cobwebs:  
x

x
dark  
x

x
dense  
x

x
  
x

x
cobwebs  
x

x
with  
x

x
threads  
x

x
extraordinarily  
x

x
thick,  
x

x
  
x

x
often  
x

x
stretched  
x

x
from  
x

x
tree  
x

x
to  
x

x
tree,  
x

x
or  
x

x
tangled  
x

x
in  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
lower  
x

x
branches  
x

x
on  
x

x
either  
x

x
side  
x

x
of  
x

x
them. 
x

x
  
x

x
There  
x

x
were  
x

x
none  
x

x
stretched  
x

x
across  
x

x
the  
x

x
path,  
x

x
but  
x

x
  
x

x
whether  
x

x
because  
x

x
some  
x

x
magic  
x

x
kept  
x

x
it  
x

x
clear,  
x

x
or  
x

x
  
x

x
for  
x

x
what  
x

x
other  
x

x
reason  
x

x
they  
x

x
could  
x

x
not  
x

x
guess. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
not  
x

x
long  
x

x
before  
x

x
they  
x

x
grew  
x

x
to  
x

x
hate  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
forest  
x

x
as  
x

x

x

x
as  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
hated  
x

x
the  
x

x
tunnels  
x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
goblins,  
x

x
and  
x

x
it  
x

x
seemed  
x

x
to  
x

x
offer  
x

x
even  
x

x
less  
x

x
  
x

x
hope  
x

x
of  
x

x
any  
x

x
ending. 
x

x
But  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
to  
x

x
go  
x

x
on  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
on,  
x

x
long  
x

x
after  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
sick  
x

x
for  
x

x
a  
x

x
sight  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
sun  
x

x
and  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
sky,  
x

x
and  
x

x
longed  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
feel  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
wind  
x

x
on  
x

x
their  
x

x
faces. 
x

x
There  
x

x
was  
x

x
no  
x

x
movement  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
air  
x

x
down  
x

x
under  
x

x
the  
x

x
forest-roof,  
x

x
and  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
everlastingly  
x

x
still  
x

x
and  
x

x
dark  
x

x
and  
x

x
stuffy. 
x

x
Even  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
dwarves  
x

felt  
x

x
it,  
x

x
who  
x

x
were  
x

x
used  
x

x
to  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

the  
x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x
but  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x
liked  
x

x
holes  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

felt  
x

that  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
were  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
It  
x

x
then  
x

x
became  
x

x
  
x

x

x
—  
x

x
not  
x

x
what  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
pitch:  
x

x
so  
x

x
black  
x

x
that  
x

x
you  
x

x
really  
x

x
could  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
nothing. 
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
in  
x

x
front  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
cleared  
x

x
the  
x

x
water  
x

x
with  
x

x
a  
x

x
mighty  
x

x
jump. 
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
reach  
x

x
the  
x

x
other  
x

x

x

x

Thorin  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
only  
x

x
one  
x

x

x

x
had  
x

x
kept  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
his  
x

x
wits. 
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
venison

x

x

x

“Bombur  
x

x

x

x

x
in!  
x

Bombur  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
to  
x

x
drink. 
x

x
  
x

x
Nothing  
x

x
wholesome  
x

x
could  
x

x
they  
x

x
see  
x

x
growing  
x

x
in  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
wood,  
x

x
only  
x

x
funguses  
x

x
and  
x

x
herbs  
x

x
with  
x

x
pale  
x

x
  
x

x
leaves  
x

x
and  
x

x
unpleasant  
x

x
smell. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
About  
x

x
four  
x

x
days  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
enchanted  
x

x
stream  
x

x
  
x

x
they  
x

x
came  
x

x
to  
x

x
a  
x

x
part  
x

x
where  
x

x
most  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
trees  
x

x
  
x

x
were  
x

x
beeches. 
x

x
They  
x

x
were  
x

x
at  
x

x
first  
x

x

x

x
to  
x

x
be  
x

x
  
x

x
cheered  
x

x
by  
x

x
the  
x

x
change,  
x

x
for  
x

x
here  
x

x
there  
x

x
was  
x

x
no  
x

x
  
x

x
undergrowth  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
shadow  
x

x
was  
x

x
not  
x

x
so  
x

x
deep. 
x

x
  
x

x
There  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x
about  
x

x
them,  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
could  
x

x
see  
x

x
some  
x

x
distance  
x

x
to  
x

x
either  
x

x
  
x

x
side  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
path. 
x

x
Yet  
x

x
the  
x

x
light  
x

x
only  
x

x
showed  
x

x
them  
x

x
  
x

x
endless  
x

lines  
x

x
of  
x

x
straight  
x

x
grey  
x

x
trunks  
x

x
like  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
some  
x

x
huge  
x

x
twilight  
x

x
hall. 
x

x
There  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
breath  
x

x
of  
x

x
air  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
noise  
x

x
of  
x

x
wind,  
x

x
but  
x

x
it  
x

x
had  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
sad  
x

x
sound. 
x

x
A  
x

x
few  
x

x
leaves  
x

x
came  
x

x
rustling  
x

x
down  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
remind  
x

x
them  
x

x
that  
x

x
outside  
x

x
autumn  
x

x
was  
x

x
coming  
x

x
  
x

x
on. 
x

x
Their  
x

x
feet  
x

x
ruffled  
x

x
among  
x

x
the  
x

x
dead  
x

x
leaves  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
other  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Still  
x

x
Bombur  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
they  
x

x
grew  
x

x
very  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
At  
x

x

x

x
they  
x

x
heard  
x

x
disquieting  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
Sometimes  
x

x
there  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

The

x

x
was  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
they  
x

x

x

not  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
on  
x

x
from  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
with  
x

x
what  
x

x
strength  
x

x

x

x
had  
x

x
left. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Two  
x

x

x

x

x
they  
x

x
found  
x

x
their  
x

x
path  
x

x
going  
x

x
  
x

x
downwards,  
x

x
and  
x

x
before  
x

x
long  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
in  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
almost  
x

x
entirely  
x

x
with  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

growth  
x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x
oaks. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Is  
x

x
there  
x

x
no  
x

x
end  
x

x
to  
x

x
this  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
“Somebody  
x

x

x

x
climb  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
his  
x

x

x

x
above  
x

x
the  
x

x
roof  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
tallest  
x

x

x

x

x

x
overhangs  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Of  
x

x

x

x

x

x
meant  
x

x

x

x
They  
x

x
  
x

x
chose  
x

x
him,  
x

x
because  
x

x
to  
x

x
be  
x

x
of  
x

x
any  
x

x
use  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
climber  
x

x
must  
x

x
get  
x

x
his  
x

x
head  
x

x
above  
x

x
the  
x

x
topmost  
x

x
  
x

x
leaves,  
x

x
and  
x

x
so  
x

x
he  
x

x
must  
x

x
be  
x

x
light  
x

x
enough  
x

x
for  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
highest  
x

x
and  
x

x
slenderest  
x

x
branches  
x

x
to  
x

x
bear  
x

x
him. 
x

x
  
x

x
Poor  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
up  
x

into  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
right  
x

x
out  
x

x
into  
x

x
the  
x

x
path,  
x

x
and  
x

x
up  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
to  
x

x
go  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
He  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
grimed  
x

x
from  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x
more  
x

x
than  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
near  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

he  
x

x
was  
x

x

x

x
whether  
x

x
there  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
how  
x

x
he  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

down  
x

x
  
x

x
again  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
above  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
then  
x

x

x

x

x

x
spiders  
x

x
all  
x

x
right. 
x

x
  
x

x
But  
x

x

x

x
were  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
size,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x
after  
x

x

x

x

x

x
Bilbo’s  
x

x

x

x

x
were  
x

x
nearly  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
He  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
up  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
only  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
sun  
x

x
was  
x

x

x

x
brilliantly,  
x

x
and  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
long  
x

x
  
x

x
while  
x

x

x

x
he  
x

x
could  
x

x
bear  
x

x
it. 
x

x
When  
x

x
he  
x

x
could,  
x

x
  
x

x
he  
x

x
saw  
x

x
all  
x

x
round  
x

x
him  
x

x
a  
x

x
sea  
x

x
of  
x

x
dark  
x

x
green,  
x

x
  
x

x
ruffled  
x

x
here  
x

x
and  
x

x
there  
x

x
by  
x

x
the  
x

x
breeze;  
x

x
and  
x

x
there  
x

x
  
x

x
were  
x

x
everywhere  
x

x
hundreds  
x

x
of  
x

x
butterflies. 
x

x
I  
x

x
  
x

x
expect  
x

x
they  
x

x

x

a  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
but  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
not  
x

x

x

x
at  
x

x
all,  
x

x

x

x
were  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
without  
x

x
any  
x

x
markings  
x

x
to  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
seen. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
at  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
for  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
time,  
x

x
and  
x

x
enjoyed  
x

x
the  
x

x
feel  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
breeze  
x

x
in  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
on  
x

x
his  
x

x
face;  
x

x
but  
x

x
at  
x

x
length  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
who  
x

x
were  
x

x
now  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
reminded  
x

x
him  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
was  
x

x
no  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
could  
x

x
see  
x

x
no  
x

x
end  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
trees  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
leaves  
x

x
in  
x

x
any  
x

x
direction. 
x

x
His  
x

x
heart,  
x

x
  
x

x
that  
x

x
had  
x

x

x

x
lightened  
x

x
by  
x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
sun  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x
sank  
x

x

x

x

x

x
was  
x

x

x

to  
x

x
go  
x

x
back  
x

x
to  
x

x
down  
x

x
below.

x
a  
x

x
twinkle  
x

x
of  
x

x
light  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
forest.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
They  
x

x
all  
x

x
looked,  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
longish  
x

x
way  
x

x
off,  
x

x
it  
x

x
  
x

x
seemed,  
x

x
they  
x

x
saw  
x

x
a  
x

x
red  
x

x
twinkle  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
dark;  
x

x

x
then  
x

x
another  
x

x
and  
x

x
another  
x

x
sprang  
x

x
out  
x

x
beside  
x

x
it. 
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
got  
x

x
up,  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x
along  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

a

x

the

x
edge  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
circle  
x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
suddenly  
x

x
from  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

the

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

all

x

x

x
lights  
x

x
again  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“Bilbo  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
dratted  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
confusticate  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

move

x
one.

“What  
x

x

x

wager  
x

x
there  
x

x

x

x
good  
x

x
juice  
x

x
inside.”

x
  
x

x

x
“Aye,  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
too  
x

x

x

well  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

the  
x

x

first.

“That

x

a  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

Already

x

x
spiders  
x

x
were  
x

x
beginning  
x

x
to  
x

x
weave  
x

x
their  
x

x
webs  
x

x
all  
x

x
  
x

round  
x

x

again  
x

x
from  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x
into  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

what

x
dusk. 
x

x
  
x

x
Still  
x

x
elves  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
and  
x

x
remain,  
x

x
and  
x

x
that  
x

x
is  
x

x
  
x

x
Good  
x

x
People. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
In  
x

x
a  
x

x
great  
x

x
cave  
x

x
some  
x

x
miles  
x

x
within  
x

x
the  
x

x
edge  
x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x
Mirkwood  
x

x
on  
x

x
its  
x

x
eastern  
x

x
side  
x

x
there  
x

x
lived  
x

x
at  
x

x
  
x

x
this  
x

x
time  
x

x
their  
x

x
greatest  
x

x
king. 
x

x
Before  
x

x
his  
x

x
huge  
x

x
  
x

x
doors  
x

x
of  
x

x
stone  
x

x
a  
x

x
river  
x

x
ran  
x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
heights  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
forest  
x

x
and  
x

x
flowed  
x

x
on  
x

x
and  
x

x
out  
x

x
into  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
marshes  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
feet  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
high  
x

x
wooded  
x

x
lands. 
x

x
  
x

x
This  
x

x
great  
x

x
cave,  
x

x
from  
x

x
which  
x

x
countless  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
opened  
x

x
out  
x

x

x

x
every  
x

x

x

x
wound  
x

x
far  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
had  
x

x
many  
x

x
passages  
x

x
and  
x

x
wide  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
neither  
x

x
so  
x

x
deep  
x

x
  
x

x
nor  
x

x
so  
x

x

x

x
In  
x

x
fact  
x

x
the  
x

x
subjects  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
mostly  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
hunted  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
open  
x

x
woods,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
had  
x

x
houses  
x

x
or  
x

x
huts  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
ground  
x

x
and  
x

x
in  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
branches. 
x

x
The  
x

x
beeches  
x

x
were  
x

x
their  
x

x
favourite  
x

x
  
x

x
trees. 
x

x
The  
x

x

x

x

x

x
was  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
strong  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
his  
x

x
people  
x

x
against  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Thorin  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
love  
x

x
dwarves,  
x

x

x

x
thought  
x

x
he  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
only  
x

x
took  
x

x
what  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
their  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

have  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
But  
x

x
Thorin  
x

x

x

x
only  
x

x

x

x
that  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“Where  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x
“I  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
expect  
x

x
starving  
x

x
in  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

“What  
x

x

x

x

x

“Looking  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Very  
x

x
well!”  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“Take  
x

x

x

x
away  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
even  
x

x

x

x
he  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
thongs  
x

x
on  
x

x

x

x

x

x
shut  
x

x
  
x

x

x

in  
x

x
one  
x

x
of  
x

x

x

x
inmost  
x

x

x
strong  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
They  
x

x
gave  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
plenty  
x

x

x

x

x
if  
x

x
not  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
were  
x

x
not  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
even  
x

x
to  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
when  
x

x
they  
x

x
captured  
x

x
them. 
x

x
The  
x

x
giant  
x

x
  
x

x
spiders  
x

x
were  
x

x
the  
x

x
only  
x

x

x

x
things  
x

x

x

x

x
had  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
he  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
next  
x

x
 
x

x
chapter  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

BARRELS  
x

x
OUT  
x

x
OF  
x

x
BOND  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
day  
x

x
after  
x

x
the  
x

x
battle  
x

x
with  
x

x
the  
x

x
spiders  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
made  
x

x
one  
x

x
last  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
