x

x
to  
x

x
find  
x

x
a  
x

x
way  
x

x
out  
x

x
before  
x

x
they  
x

x
died  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
hunger  
x

x
and  
x

x
thirst. 
x

x
They  
x

x
got  
x

x
up  
x

x
and  
x

x
staggered  
x

x
on  
x

x
  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
direction  
x

x
which  
x

x
eight  
x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
thirteen  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
them  
x

x
guessed  
x

x
to  
x

x
be  
x

x
the  
x

x
one  
x

x
in  
x

x
which  
x

x
the  
x

x
path  
x

x
  
x

x
lay;  
x

x
but  
x

x
they  
x

x
never  
x

x
found  
x

x
out  
x

x
if  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
right. 
x

x
  
x

x
Such  
x

x
day  
x

x
as  
x

x
there  
x

x
ever  
x

x
was  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
forest  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
fading  
x

x
once  
x

x
more  
x

x
into  
x

x
the  
x

x
blackness  
x

x
of  
x

x
night,  
x

x
  
x

x
when  
x

x
suddenly  
x

x
out  
x

x
sprang  
x

x
the  
x

x
light  
x

x
of  
x

x
many  
x

x
  
x

x
torches  
x

x
all  
x

x
round  
x

x
them,  
x

x
like  
x

x
hundreds  
x

x
of  
x

x
red  
x

x
  
x

x
stars. 
x

x
Out  
x

x
leaped  
x

x
Wood-elves  
x

x
with  
x

x
their  
x

x
bows  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
spears  
x

x
and  
x

x
called  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
to  
x

x
halt. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
There  
x

x
was  
x

x
no  
x

x
thought  
x

x
of  
x

x
a  
x

x
fight. 
x

x
Even  
x

x
if  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
had  
x

x
not  
x

x
been  
x

x
in  
x

x
such  
x

x
a  
x

x
state  
x

x
that  
x

x
they  
x

x
  
x

x
were  
x

x
actually  
x

x
glad  
x

x
to  
x

x
be  
x

x
captured,  
x

x
their  
x

x
small  
x

x
  
x

x
knives,  
x

x
the  
x

x
only  
x

x
weapons  
x

x
they  
x

x
had,  
x

x
would  
x

x
have  
x

x
  
x

x
been  
x

x
of  
x

x
no  
x

x
use  
x

x
against  
x

x
the  
x

x
arrows  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
elves  
x

x
  
x

x
that  
x

x
could  
x

x
hit  
x

x
a  
x

x
bird's  
x

x
eye  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
dark. 
x

x
So  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
stopped  
x

x
dead  
x

x
and  
x

x
sat  
x

x
down  
x

x
and  
x

x
waited  
x

x
  
x

x
—  
x

x
all  
x

x
except  
x

x
Bilbo,  
x

x
who  
x

x
popped  
x

x
on  
x

x
his  
x

x
ring  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
slipped  
x

x
quickly  
x

x
to  
x

x
one  
x

x
side. 
x

x
That  
x

x
is  
x

x
why,  
x

x
when  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
elves  
x

x
bound  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
in  
x

x
a  
x

x
long  
x

x
line,  
x

x
one  
x

x
  
x

x
behind  
x

x
the  
x

x
other,  
x

x
and  
x

x
counted  
x

x
them,  
x

x
they  
x

x
never  
x

x
  
x

x
found  
x

x
or  
x

x
counted  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbit. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Nor  
x

x
did  
x

x
they  
x

x
hear  
x

x
or  
x

x
feel  
x

x
him  
x

x
trotting  
x

x
along  
x

x
  
x

x
well  
x

x
behind  
x

x
their  
x

x
torch-light  
x

x
as  
x

x
they  
x

x
led  
x

x
off  
x

x
their  
x

x
  
x

x
prisoners  
x

x
into  
x

x
the  
x

x
forest. 
x

x
Each  
x

x
dwarf  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
but  
x

x
that  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
use  
x

x
of  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x
could  
x

x
not  
x

x
  
x

x
see  
x

x
where  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
going,  
x

x
and  
x

x
neither  
x

x
he  
x

x
nor  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
others  
x

x
knew  
x

x
where  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
started  
x

x
from  
x

x
  
x

x
anyway. 
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
had  
x

x
all  
x

x
he  
x

x
could  
x

x
do  
x

x
to  
x

keep  
x

x
up  
x

x
  
x

x
with  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
elves  
x

x
were  
x

x
making  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
go  
x

x
as  
x

x
fast  
x

x
as  
x

x
ever  
x

they  
x

could,  
x

x
sick  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
weary  
x

x
as  
x

x
they  
x

x
were. 
x

x
The  
x

x
king  
x

x
had  
x

x
ordered  
x

x
them  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x
make  
x

x
haste. 
x

x
Suddenly  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x
just  
x

x

x

x
to  
x

x

x

x

x
up  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
began  
x

x
to  
x

x
cross  
x

x
the  
x

x
bridge. 
x

x
This  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
bridge  
x

x

x

x
led  
x

x
across  
x

x
the  
x

x
river  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
king’s  
x

x
  
x

x
doors. 
x

x
The  
x

x
water  
x

x
flowed  
x

x
dark  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
their  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
rear.

x

x
not  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

up

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

Elvenking  
x

x

x

x

x

x
carven  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
was  
x

x

x

x
again. 
x

x
In  
x

x

x

x

x

x
he  
x

x
wore  
x

x
a  
x

x
crown  
x

x
  
x

of  
x

x

x

x

x

x
In  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x

x

x
held  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
carven  
x

x
staff  
x

x
of  
x

x
oak. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
Elvenking's  
x

x
Gate. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
prisoners  
x

x
were  
x

x
brought  
x

x
before  
x

x
him;  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
to  
x

x

x

x

x

x
for  
x

x

x

x
“Besides  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“There  
x

x
is  
x

x
no  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
once  
x

x

x

x
inside.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
their  
x

x
doings,  
x

x
and  
x

x
where  
x

x
they  
x

x
  
x

were  
x

x
going  
x

x
to,  
x

x
and  
x

x
where  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
coming  
x

x
  
x

x
from;  
x

x
but  
x

x

x

x
got  
x

x
little  
x

x
more  
x

x
news  
x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x
them  
x

x
  
x

x
than  
x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x
Thorin. 
x

x
They  
x

x
were  
x

x
surly  
x

x
and  
x

x
angry  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
not  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

“What  
x

x
have  
x

x
we  
x

x
done,  
x

x
O  
x

x
king?”  
x

x
said  
x

x
Balin,  
x

x
  
x

x
who  
x

x
was  
x

x

x

x

x

x

“Is

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
forest,  
x

x
to  
x

x
be  
x

x
hungry  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
killing  
x

x
them  
x

x
makes  
x

x
you  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Such  
x

x
a  
x

x
question  
x

x
of  
x

x
course  
x

x
made  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
angrier  
x

x
than  
x

x
ever,  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
answered:  
x

x
“It  
x

x
is  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
crime  
x

x
to  
x

x
wander

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
carried  
x

x
by  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
current  
x

x
to  
x

x
a  
x

x
place  
x

x
far  
x

x
down  
x

x
the  
x

x
river  
x

x
where  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
bank  
x

x
jutted  
x

x
out,  
x

x
near  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
very  
x

x
eastern  
x

x
edge  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
Mirkwood. 
x

x
There  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
collected  
x

x
and  
x

x
tied  
x

x
  
x

x
together  
x

x
and  
x

x
floated  
x

x
back  
x

x
to  
x

x
Lake-town,  
x

x
which  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
stood  
x

x
close  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
point  
x

x
where  
x

x
the  
x

x
Forest  
x

x
River  
x

x
  
x

x
flowed  
x

x
into  
x

x
the  
x

x
Long  
x

x
Lake. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
For  
x

x
some  
x

x
time  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
sat  
x

x
and  
x

x
thought  
x

x
about  
x

x
this  
x

x
  
x

x
water-gate,  
x

x
and  
x

x
wondered  
x

x
if  
x

x
it  
x

x
could  
x

x
be  
x

x
used  
x

x
for  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
escape  
x

x
of  
x

x
his  
x

x
friends,  
x

x
and  
x

x
at  
x

x
last  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
desperate  
x

x
beginnings  
x

x
of  
x

x
a  
x

x
plan. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
evening  
x

x
meal  
x

x
had  
x

x
been  
x

x
taken  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
prisoners. 
x

x
The  
x

x
guards  
x

x
were  
x

x
tramping  
x

x
away  
x

x
  
x

x
down  
x

x
the  
x

x
passages  
x

x
taking  
x

x
the  
x

x
torchlight  
x

x
with  
x

x
  
x

x
them  
x

x
and  
x

x
leaving  
x

x
everything  
x

x
in  
x

x
darkness. 
x

x
Then  
x

x
  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
heard  
x

x
the  
x

x
king's  
x

x
butler  
x

x
bidding  
x

x
the  
x

x
chief  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
guards  
x

x
good-night. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Now  
x

x
come  
x

x
with  
x

x

x

x

x

x

“and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
wine  
x

x
that  
x

x
has  
x

x

x

x

x

x
in. 
x

x

x

x

x

x
be  
x

x
  
x

x
hard  
x

x
at  
x

x
work  
x

x
tonight  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

of  
x

x

x

x

x

x
“I’ll  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
is  
x

x
a  
x

x
feast  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
with  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
his  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
elves,  
x

x

x

x

x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
flagons  
x

x
were  
x

x
set. 
x

x
Soon  
x

x

x

x

x
to  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

along  
x

x

x

x
all  
x

x
in  
x

x
  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Balin’s  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
to  
x

x
do,  
x

x
and  
x

x
all  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

“No  
x

x
time  
x

x

said  
x

x

x

x

x

x
“You  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Don't  
x

x

there’s  
x

x

what  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
“Drat  
x

x
this  
x

x
dwarvish  
x

x

x

x
he  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

in  
x

x

x

x
halls  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

“Upon  
x

x

x

x
said  
x

x
Thorin,

when

x

x

x

his  
x

x
  
x

x
friends,

x

x
lid  
x

x
had  
x

x
been  
x

x
fitted  
x

x
on  
x

x

x
there

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
voices  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
down  
x

x
the  
x

x
stream,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
out  
x

x
into  
x

x
the  
x

x
main  
x

x
current. 
x

x
Then  
x

x
he  
x

x
found  
x

x
it  
x

x
  
x

x
quite  
x

x
as  
x

x
difficult  
x

x
to  
x

x
stick  
x

x
on  
x

x
as  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
feared;  
x

x
  
x

x
but  
x

x
he  
x

x
managed  
x

x
it  
x

x
somehow,  
x

x
though  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
miserably  
x

x
uncomfortable. 
x

x
Luckily  
x

x
he  
x

x
was  
x

x
very  
x

x
  
x

x
light,  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
barrel  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
good  
x

x
big  
x

x
one  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
being  
x

x
rather  
x

x
leaky  
x

x
had  
x

x
now  
x

x
shipped  
x

x
a  
x

x
small  
x

x
  
x

x
amount  
x

x
of  
x

x
water. 
x

x
All  
x

x
the  
x

x
same  
x

x

x

x
was  
x

x
like  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
pony  
x

x

x

x
was  
x

x
always  
x

x
thinking  
x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
this  
x

x
way  
x

x
at  
x

x
last  
x

x

x

x
Baggins  
x

came  
x

x

x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
either  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
could  
x

x
see  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
main  
x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
away

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
This  
x

x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

the

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
them  
x

x
till  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
Poor  
x

x
  
x

x
dwarves!  
x

x

x

x
was  
x

x
not  
x

x
badly  
x

x
off  
x

x
now. 
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
it  
x

x
off

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
was  
x

x
no  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
felt  
x

x
cold  
x

x
all  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
him  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
fretted. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“This  
x

x
is  
x

x
a  
x

x
heavy  
x

x
load!”  
x

x
some  
x

x
grumbled. 
x

x
  
x

x
“They  
x

x
float  
x

x
too  
x

x
deep  
x

x
—  
x

x
some  
x

x
of  
x

x
these  
x

x
are  
x

x
never  
x

x
  
x

x
empty. 
x

x
If  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
come  
x

x
ashore  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
we  
x

x
might  
x

x
have  
x

x
had  
x

x
a  
x

x
look  
x

x
inside,”  
x

x
they  
x

x
said. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“No  
x

x
time  
x

x
now!”  
x

x
cried  
x

x
the  
x

x
raftman. 
x

x
“Shove  
x

x
  
x

x
off!”  
x

x
And  
x

x
off  
x

x
they  
x

x
went  
x

x
at  
x

x
last,  
x

x
slowly  
x

x
at  
x

x
first,  
x

x
until  
x

x
  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
passed  
x

x
the  
x

x
point  
x

x
of  
x

x
rock  
x

x

x

x
other  
x

x

x

x

x

x
to  
x

x
fend  
x

x
them  
x

x
off  
x

x
with  
x

x
poles,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
then  
x

x
quicker  
x

x
and  
x

x
quicker  
x

x
as  
x

x
they  
x

x
caught  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
main  
x

x
stream  
x

x
and  
x

x
went  
x

x
sailing  
x

x
away  
x

x
down,  
x

x
down  
x

x
  
x

x
towards  
x

x
the  
x

x
Lake. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
They  
x

x
had  
x

x
escaped  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
king

x

and  
x

were  
x

x
through  
x

x
the  
x

x
wood,  
x

x
but  
x

x
whether  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
to  
x

x

x

x

x

x
lighter  
x

x
and  
x

x
warmer  
x

x
as  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
that  
x

x
came  
x

x
down  
x

x
upon  
x

x
  
x

x
their  
x

x
left. 
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
about  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

of  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x
up  
x

and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

on  
x

x

x

x

x
still  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
water  
x

x
flowed  
x

x

x

x

x
through  
x

x
the  
x

x
midst. 
x

x

x
far  
x

x

x

x
its  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

Its  
x

x

x

x
neighbours  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

North-  
x

x

East  
x

x

The  
x

x

x

x

x

x
for  
x

x
ever,  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x

x

x

x

did  
x

not  
x

x

x

x

x

him

x

x
of  
x

x
all  
x

x
a  
x

x
barrel  
x

x
was  
x

x
cut  
x

x
  
x

x
loose  
x

x
by  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
and  
x

x
pushed  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
shore  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
opened. 
x

x
Groans  
x

x
came  
x

x
from  
x

x
inside,  
x

x
and  
x

x
out  
x

x
  
x

x
crept  
x

x
a  
x

x
most  
x

x
unhappy  
x

x
dwarf. 
x

x
Wet  
x

x
straw  
x

x
was  
x

x
in  
x

x
  
x

x
his  
x

x
draggled  
x

x
beard;  
x

x
he  
x

x
was  
x

x
so  
x

x
sore  
x

x
and  
x

x
stiff,  
x

x
so  
x

x
  
x

x
bruised  
x

x
and  
x

x
buffeted  
x

he  
x

x
could  
x

x
hardly  
x

x
stand  
x

x
or  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
stumble  
x

x
through  
x

x
the  
x

x
shallow  
x

x
water  
x

x
to  
x

x
lie  
x

x
  
x

x
groaning  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
shore. 
x

x
He  
x

x
had  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

has  
x

x

x

chained  
x

x

x

x

x

x
in  
x

x

x

x

x
for  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
Thorin,  
x

x
but  
x

x
you  
x

x
could  
x

x
only  
x

x
have  
x

x
told  
x

x
it  
x

x
by  
x

x
his  
x

x
  
x

x
golden  
x

x
chain,  
x

x
and  
x

x
by  
x

x
the  
x

x
colour  
x

x
of  
x

x
his  
x

x
now  
x

x
dirty  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
tattered  
x

x
sky-blue  
x

x
hood  
x

x
with  
x

x
its  
x

x
tarnished  
x

x
  
x

x

x
tassel. 
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
some  
x

x

x

x

x

x
would  
x

x
  
x

x
be  
x

x
even  
x

x
polite  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbit. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Well,  
x

x

x

x

x

alive  
x

x

x

x
are  
x

x

x

x

x

x
Perhaps  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
more  
x

x

x

x

x

x
dwarves,  
x

x
and  
x

x
also  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“Are

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
If  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
—  
x

x
you  
x

x
had  
x

x
better

x
slap  
x

x
your  
x

x
arms  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
try  
x

x
and  
x

x
help  
x

x
me  
x

x
get  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
others  
x

x
out  
x

x
while  
x

x
there  
x

x
is  
x

x
a  
x

chance!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Thorin  
x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
up  
x

x

x
  
x

the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
is  
x

x
not  
x

x
surprising  
x

x
that  
x

x
the  
x

x
guards  
x

x
were  
x

x
  
x

x
drinking  
x

x
and  
x

x
laughing  
x

x
by  
x

x
a  
x

x
fire  
x

x
in  
x

x
their  
x

x
hut,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
hear  
x

x
the  
x

x
noise  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
unpacking  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
or  
x

x
the  
x

x
footsteps  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
four  
x

x
scouts. 
x

x
  
x

x
Their  
x

x
astonishment  
x

x
was  
x

x
enormous  
x

x
when  
x

x
Thorin  
x

x
  
x

x
Oakenshield  
x

x
stepped  
x

x
in  
x

x
through  
x

x
the  
x

x
door. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Who  
x

x
are  
x

x
you  
x

x
and  
x

x
what  
x

x
do  
x

x
you  
x

x
want?”  
x

x
they  
x

x
  
x

x
shouted  
x

x
leaping  
x

x
to  
x

x
their  
x

x
feet  
x

x
and  
x

x
groping  
x

x
for  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
weapons. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Thorin  
x

x
son  
x

x
of  
x

x
Thrain  
x

x
son  
x

x
of  
x

x
Thror  
x

x
King  
x

x
  
x

x
under  
x

x
the  
x

x
Mountain!”  
x

x
said  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarf  
x

x
in  
x

x
a  
x

x
loud  
x

x
  
x

x
voice,  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
looked  
x

x
it,  
x

x
in  
x

x
spite  
x

x
of  
x

x
his  
x

x
torn  
x

x
  
x

x
clothes  
x

x
and  
x

x
draggled  
x

x
hood. 
x

x
The  
x

x
gold  
x

x
gleamed  
x

x
  
x

x
on  
x

x
his  
x

x
neck  
x

x
and  
x

x
waist;  
x

x
his  
x

x
eyes  
x

x
were  
x

x
dark  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
“I  
x

x
have  
x

x
come  
x

x
back. 
x

x
I  
x

x
wish  
x

x
to  
x

x
see  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
Master  
x

x
of  
x

x
your  
x

x
town!  
x

x
”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Then  
x

x
there  
x

x
was  
x

x
tremendous  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x
and  
x

x
all  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
  
x

“And  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“Fili

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“We  
x

x

x

x

x

x

“We

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“Then

x

x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
getting  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“We  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x
“I  
x

x
am  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
son

x

x

x

“These  
x

x

x

x

x
“But  
x

x
lock  
x

x
nor  
x

x
bar  
x

x
may  
x

x
hinder  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
homecoming  
x

x
spoken  
x

x
of  
x

x
old. 
x

x

x

x
is  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Master

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Lake,  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
men  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
from  
x

x
  
x

x
one  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
other. 
x

x
The  
x

x
Elvenking  
x

x
was  
x

x
very  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
in  
x

x
those  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
and

gold,  
x

x
to  
x

x
which  
x

x
habit

x
while  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
stayed  
x

x
in  
x

x
Lake-town,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
was  
x

x
careful  
x

x
never  
x

x
to  
x

x
become  
x

x
invisible. 
x

x
  
x

x
Still,  
x

x
I  
x

x
daresay,  
x

x
more  
x

x
was  
x

x
guessed  
x

x
than  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
known,  
x

x
though  
x

x
doubtless  
x

x
Mr. 
x

x
Baggins  
x

x
remained  
x

x
  
x

x
a  
x

x
bit  
x

x
of  
x

x
a  
x

x
mystery. 
x

x
In  
x

x
any  
x

x
case  
x

x
the  
x

x
king  
x

x
knew  
x

x
  
x

x
now  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves’  
x

x
errand,  
x

x
or  
x

x
thought  
x

x
he  
x

x
did,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
he  
x

x
said  
x

x
to  
x

x
himself:  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Very  
x

x
well!  
x

x
We’ll  
x

x
see!  
x

x
No  
x

x
treasure  
x

x
will  
x

x
come  
x

x
  
x

x
back  
x

x
through  
x

x
Mirkwood  
x

x
without  
x

x
my  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
something  
x

x
to  
x

x

x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
But  
x

x
I  
x

x
expect  
x

x
they  
x

x
  
x

x
will  
x

x
all  
x

x
come  
x

x
to  
x

x
a  
x

x
bad  
x

x
end,  
x

x
and  
x

x
serve  
x

x
them  
x

x
  
x

x
right!”  
x

He  
x

x
at  
x

x
any  
x

x
rate  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
believe  
x

x
in  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
  
x

x
fighting  
x

x
and  
x

x
killing  
x

x
dragons  
x

x
like  
x

x
Smaug,  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
strongly  
x

x
suspected  
x

x
attempted  
x

x
burglary  
x

x
or  
x

x
  
x

x
something  
x

x
like  
x

x
it  
x

x
—  
x

x
which  
x

x
shows  
x

x
he  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
wise  
x

x
  
x

x
elf  
x

x
and  
x

wiser  
x

x
than  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
northward  
x

x

x

x
the

x

x

x

x
would  
x

x
go,  
x

x
and  
x

waited. 
x

x
  
x

x

At  
x

x

x

x

x

x
a  
x

x

to  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
Master

and

x
his  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
councillors  
x

x
and  
x

x
said  
x

x
that  
x

x
soon  
x

x
he  
x

x
and  
x

x
his  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
company  
x

x
must  
x

x
go  
x

x
on  
x

x
towards  
x

x
the  
x

x
Mountain. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Then  
x

x
for  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
time  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
little  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x
if  
x

x
Thorin  
x

x
was  
x

x
after  
x

x
all  
x

x
really  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
the

x

x

x

Smaug,

Thorin,

x

x

Thorin

x

x

x

So  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
was

now

x

x
far  
x

x
on,  
x

x

x

x

x
were  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
DOORSTEP

x

x

x

x
right  
x

x
up  
x

x

x

x
Long  
x

x

x

x
out  
x

x
into  
x

x
the  
x

x
River  
x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
could  
x

x
all  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
up  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
western  
x

x
bank  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
joined  
x

by  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x
other  
x

x

x

x

x

x
necessaries  
x

x

the  
x

x
ponies  
x

x

x

x

x
their  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
had  
x

x

x

x
sent  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
packed  
x

x
what  
x

x
they  
x

x
could  
x

x
on  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

“Not  
x

x
at  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

come  
x

x
  
x

x

x
said  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x
and  
x

x
less  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Thorin

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
escort  
x

x
left  
x

x
them,  
x

x
making  
x

x
off  
x

x
  
x

x
swiftly  
x

x
down  
x

x
the  
x

x
river  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
shoreward  
x

x
paths,  
x

x
  
x

x
although  
x

x
the  
x

x
night  
x

x
was  
x

x
already  
x

x
drawing  
x

x
on. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
They  
x

x
spent  
x

x
a  
x

x
cold  
x

x
and  
x

x
lonely  
x

x
night  
x

x
and  
x

x
their  
x

x
  
x

x
spirits  
x

x
fell. 
x

x
The  
x

x
next  
x

x
day  
x

x
they  
x

x
set  
x

x
out  
x

x
again. 
x

x
Balin  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
rode  
x

x
behind,  
x

x
each  
x

x

x

x
another  
x

x
  
x

x
pony  
x

x
heavily  
x

x
laden  
x

x
beside  
x

x
him;  
x

x
the  
x

x
others  
x

x
were  
x

x
  
x

x
some  
x

x
way  
x

x
ahead  
x

x
picking  
x

x
out  
x

x
a  
x

x
slow  
x

x
road,  
x

x
for  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
there  
x

x
were  
x

x
no  
x

x
paths. 
x

x
They  
x

x
made  
x

x
north-west,  
x

x
  
x

x
slanting  
x

x
away  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
River  
x

x
Running,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
drawing  
x

x
ever  
x

x
nearer  
x

x
and  
x

x
nearer  
x

x
to  
x

x
a  
x

x
great  
x

x
spur  
x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Mountain  
x

x
that  
x

x
was  
x

x
flung  
x

x
out  
x

x
southwards  
x

x
  
x

x
towards  
x

x
them. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
weary  
x

x
journey,  
x

x
and  
x

x
a  
x

x
quiet  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
one. 
x

x
There  
x

x

x

x
no  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
pride  
x

x
and  
x

x
hopes  
x

x
which  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
in  
x

x
their  
x

x
hearts  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
singing  
x

x
of  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
away  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Dragon,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
reached  
x

x
the  
x

x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
all  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
arms

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
out  
x

x

x

x
it  
x

x

x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

a

x

x

x

the  
x

x

x
and  
x

x
every  
x

x
now  
x

x

x

x
again  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
water,  
x

x
and  
x

x
every  
x

x
now  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
again  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

“Let  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“We  
x

x
can  
x

x
do  
x

x
no  
x

x
  
x

x
good  
x

x
here!  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“The

x

x

x

x

away  
x

x

x

x

x
he  
x

x
might  
x

x
be  
x

x
lying  
x

x
out  
x

x
on  
x

x
the

x

x

x

x
things  
x

x
out

x
and  
x

x
debated,  
x

x

x

x

x

“Now  
x

x
is  
x

x

x

x

x
for  
x

x
our  
x

x

say  
x

x
so  
x

x
possessed  
x

x

x

x
said  
x

x
to  
x

x
himself. 
x

x
“You  
x

x
went  
x

x
and  
x

x
put  
x

x
your  
x

x
foot  
x

x
right  
x

x
  
x

x
in  
x

x
it  
x

x
that  
x

x
night  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
party,  
x

x
and  
x

x
now  
x

x
you  
x

x
have  
x

x
got  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x
pull  
x

x
it  
x

x
out  
x

x
and  
x

x
pay  
x

x
for  
x

x
it!  
x

x
Dear  
x

x
me,  
x

x
what  
x

x
a  
x

x
fool  
x

x
  
x

x
I  
x

x
was  
x

x
and  
x

x
am!”  
x

x
said  
x

x
the  
x

x
least  
x

x
Tookish  
x

x
part  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
him. 
x

x
“I  
x

x
have  
x

x
absolutely  
x

x
no  
x

x
use  
x

x
for  
x

x
dragon-  
x

x
  
x

x
guarded  
x

x
treasures,  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
whole  
x

x
lot  
x

x
could  
x

x
stay  
x

x
  
x

x
here  
x

x
for  
x

x
ever,  
x

x
if  
x

x
only  
x

x
I  
x

x
could  
x

x
wake  
x

x
up  
x

x
and  
x

x
find  
x

x
  
x

x
this  
x

x
beastly  
x

x
tunnel  
x

x
was  
x

x
my  
x

x
own  
x

x
front-hall  
x

x
at  
x

x
  
x

x
home!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
He  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
wake  
x

x
up  
x

x
of  
x

x
course,  
x

x
but  
x

x
went  
x

x
still  
x

x
  
x

x
on  
x

x
and  
x

x
on,  
x

x
till  
x

x
all  
x

x
sign  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
door  
x

x
behind  
x

x
had  
x

x
  
x

faded  
x

x
away. 
x

x
He  
x

x
was  
x

x
altogether  
x

x
alone. 
x

x
Soon  
x

x
he  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x

x

x
to  
x

x

x

x

x

x
“Is  
x

x

x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x
seem  
x

x
to  
x

x
see  
x

x
coming  
x

x
right  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
ahead  
x

x
down  
x

x
there?”  
x

x
he  
x

x
thought. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
It  
x

x
was. 
x

x
As  
x

x
he  
x

x
went  
x

x
forward  
x

x
it  
x

x
grew  
x

x
and  
x

x
grew,  
x

x
  
x

x
till  
x

x
there  
x

x
was  
x

x
no  
x

x
doubt  
x

x
about  
x

x
it. 
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
red  
x

x
light  
x

x
  
x

x
steadily  
x

x
getting  
x

x
redder  
x

x
and  
x

x
redder. 
x

x
Also  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
now  
x

x
undoubtedly  
x

x
hot  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
tunnel. 
x

x
Wisps  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
floated  
x

x
up  
x

x
and  
x

x
past  
x

x
him  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
began  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
too,  
x

x
began  
x

x
to  
x

x
throb  
x

x
in  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
mixed  
x

x
with  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
some  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
its  
x

x

x

x
down  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
red  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
in  
x

x
front  
x

x
of  
x

x
him. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
go  
x

x

x

x
he  
x

x
did;  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
picture  
x

x
him  
x

x
coming  
x

x
to  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Smaug!  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
Smaug  
x

x
lay,  
x

x
with  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
him  
x

x
where  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
were  
x

x
  
x

x
nearest  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
great  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
filled  
x

x
with  
x

x
a  
x

x
wealth  
x

x
that  
x

x
could  
x

x
not  
x

x

x

x
guessed. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
To  
x

x
say  
x

x
that  
x

x
Bilbo’s  
x

x
breath  
x

x
was  
x

x
taken  
x

x
away  
x

x
  
x

x
is  
x

x
no  
x

x
description  
x

x
at  
x

x
all. 
x

x
There  
x

x
are  
x

x
no  
x

x
words  
x

x
left  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
since  
x

x
Men  
x

x
  
x

x
changed  
x

x
the  
x

x
language  
x

x
that  
x

x
they  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
elves  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
all  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
was  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
had  
x

x
heard  
x

x
tell  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
had  
x

x
never  
x

x

x

x
come  
x

x
home  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
gazed  
x

x

x

x
almost  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
gold  
x

x
beyond  
x

x
price  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
count. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
gazed  
x

x
for  
x

x
what  
x

x
seemed  
x

x
an  
x

x
age,  
x

x
before  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
his  
x

x

x

x
he  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
even  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
as  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

Smaug  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
wing,  
x

x
opened  
x

x
a  
x

x
claw,  
x

x
the  
x

x
rumble  
x

x
of  
x

x
his  
x

x
snoring  
x

x
  
x

x
changed  
x

x
its  
x

x
note. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Then  
x

x

x

x

x

x
But  
x

x

x

x
dragon  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
  
x

x
wake  
x

x
—  
x

x

x

x

x

x
—  
x

x

x

x
shifted  
x

x
into  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
toiled  
x

x
back  
x

x
up  
x

x
the  
x

x
long  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

“I’ve  
x

x

x
hear  
x

x
no  
x

x
more  
x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

Thieves!

x

words  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
just  
x

x
  
x

x
about  
x

x
to  
x

x
creep  
x

x
inside  
x

x
the  
x

x
tunnel  
x

x
when  
x

x
Bifur  
x

x
  
x

x
gave  
x

x
a  
x

x
cry:  
x

x
“My  
x

x
cousins!  
x

x
Bombur  
x

x
and  
x

x
Bofur  
x

x
—  
x

x
  
x

x
we  
x

x
have  
x

x
forgotten  
x

x
them,  
x

x
they  
x

x
are  
x

x
down  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
valley!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“They  
x

x
will  
x

x
be  
x

x
slain,  
x

x
and  
x

x
all  
x

x
our  
x

x
ponies  
x

x
too,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
all  
x

x
our  
x

x
stores  
x

x
lost,”  
x

x
moaned  
x

x
the  
x

x
others. 
x

x
“We  
x

x
  
x

x
can  
x

x
do  
x

x
nothing.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Nonsense!”  
x

x
said  
x

x
Thorin,  
x

x
recovering  
x

x
his  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
dignity. 
x

x
“We  
x

x
cannot  
x

x
leave  
x

x
them. 
x

x
Get  
x

x
inside  
x

x
Mr. 
x

x
  
x

x
Baggins  
x

x
and  
x

x
Balin,  
x

x
and  
x

x
you  
x

x
two  
x

x
Fili  
x

x
and  
x

x
Kili  
x

x
—  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
dragon  
x

x
shan’t  
x

x
have  
x

x
all  
x

x
of  
x

x
us. 
x

x
Now  
x

x
you  
x

x
  
x

x
others,  
x

x
where  
x

x
are  
x

x
the  
x

x
ropes?  
x

x
Be  
x

x
quick!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Those  
x

x
were  
x

x
perhaps  
x

x
the  
x

x
worst  
x

x
moments  
x

x
  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
been  
x

x
through  
x

x
yet. 
x

x
The  
x

x
horrible  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x
Smaug’s  
x

x
anger  
x

x
were  
x

x
echoing  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
stony  
x

x
  
x

x
hollows  
x

x
far  
x

x
above;  
x

x
at  
x

x
any  
x

x
moment  
x

x
he  
x

x
might  
x

x
  
x

x
come  
x

x
blazing  
x

x
down  
x

x
or  
x

x
fly  
x

x
whirling  
x

x
round  
x

x
and  
x

x
find  
x

x
  
x

x
them  
x

x
there,  
x

x
near  
x

x
the  
x

x
perilous  
x

x
cliffs  
x

x
edge  
x

x
hauling  
x

x
  
x

x
madly  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
ropes. 
x

x
Up  
x

x
came  
x

x
Bofur,  
x

x
and  
x

x
still  
x

x
all  
x

x
  
x

x
was  
x

x
safe. 
x

x
Up  
x

x
came  
x

x
Bombur,  
x

x
puffing  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
blowing  
x

x
while  
x

x
the  
x

x
ropes  
x

x
creaked,  
x

x
and  
x

x
still  
x

x
all  
x

x
  
x

x
was  
x

x
safe. 
x

x
Up  
x

x
came  
x

x
some  
x

x
tools  
x

x
and  
x

x
bundles  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
stores,  
x

x
and  
x

x
then  
x

x
danger  
x

x
was  
x

x
upon  
x

x
them. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
A  
x

x
whirring  
x

x
noise  
x

x
was  
x

x
heard. 
x

x
A  
x

x
red  
x

x
light  
x

x
  
x

x
touched  
x

x
the  
x

x
points  
x

x
of  
x

x
standing  
x

x
rocks. 
x

x
The  
x

x
  
x

x
dragon  
x

x
came. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
They  
x

x
had  
x

x
barely  
x

x
time  
x

x
to  
x

x
fly  
x

x
back  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
tunnel,  
x

x
pulling  
x

x
and  
x

x
dragging  
x

x
in  
x

x
their  
x

x
bundles,  
x

x
  
x

x
when  
x

x
Smaug  
x

x
came  
x

x
hurtling  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
North,  
x

x
  
x

x
licking  
x

x
the  
x

x
mountain-sides  
x

x
with  
x

x
flame,  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
his  
x

x
great  
x

x

x

x
with  
x

x
a  
x

x
noise  
x

x
like  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
wind. 
x

x
  
x

x
His  
x

x

x

x
breath  
x

x
shrivelled  
x

x
the  
x

x
grass  
x

x
before  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
door,  
x

x
and  
x

x
drove  
x

x
in  
x

x
through  
x

x
the  
x

x
crack  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
  
x

x
left  
x

x
and  
x

x
scorched  
x

x
them  
x

x
as  
x

x
they  
x

x
lay  
x

x
hid. 
x

x
  
x

x
Flickering  
x

x
fires  
x

x
leaped  
x

x
up  
x

x
and  
x

x
black  
x

x
rock-  
x

x
  
x

x
shadows  
x

x
danced. 
x

x
Then  
x

x
darkness  
x

x
fell  
x

x
as  
x

x
he  
x

x
  
x

x
passed  
x

x
again. 
x

x
The  
x

x
ponies  
x

x
screamed  
x

x
with  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
terror,  
x

x
burst  
x

x
their  
x

x
ropes  
x

x
and  
x

x
galloped  
x

x
wildly  
x

x
off. 
x

x
  
x

x
The  
x

x
dragon  
x

x
swooped  
x

x
and  
x

x
turned  
x

x
to  
x

x
pursue  
x

x
  
x

x
them,  
x

x
and  
x

x
was  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“That’ll  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
our  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
Thorin. 
x

x
“Nothing  
x

x
can  
x

x

x

Smaug  
x

x
once  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
Here  
x

x
we  
x

x
are  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
unless  
x

x

x

x

x

x
fancies  
x

x
tramping  
x

x

x

x
long  
x

x
  
x

x
open  
x

x
miles  
x

x
back  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
river  
x

x
with  
x

x
Smaug  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
watch!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
not  
x

x
a  
x

x
pleasant  
x

x
thought!  
x

x
They  
x

x
crept  
x

x
  
x

x
further  
x

x
down  
x

x
the  
x

x
tunnel,  
x

x
and  
x

x
there  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
came  
x

x

x

x
through  
x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
Every  
x

x
now  
x

x
and  
x

x
again  
x

x
through  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
pass  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
as  
x

x
he  
x

x
hunted  
x

x
round  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
round  
x

x

x

x
mountain-sides. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
He  
x

x
guessed  
x

x
from  
x

x

x

x
ponies,  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

lake  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

his

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
in  
x

x
vain  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x
his  
x

x
wrath  
x

x

x

x
he  
x

x
went  
x

x
back  
x

x
to  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
to  
x

x
sleep  
x

x
—  
x

x
and  
x

x
to  
x

x
gather  
x

x
new  
x

x
strength. 
x

x
He  
x

x
  
x

x
would  
x

x
not  
x

x
forget  
x

x
or  
x

x
forgive  
x

x
the  
x

x
theft,  
x

x

x

x
if  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
but  
x

x
he  
x

x
could  
x

x
afford  
x

x
to  
x

x
wait. 
x

x
Slow  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
he  
x

x
crept  
x

x
back  
x

x
to  
x

x
his  
x

x
lair  
x

x
and  
x

x
half  
x

x
closed  
x

x
  
x

x
his  
x

x
eyes. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
When  
x

x
morning  
x

x
came  
x

x
the  
x

x
terror  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
grew  
x

x
less. 
x

x
They  
x

x
realized  
x

x
that  
x

x
dangers  
x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
inevitable  
x

x
in  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
no  
x

x

x

x

x

x
up  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
quest  
x

x

x

x
Nor  
x

x
could  
x

x
they  
x

x
get  
x

x
away  
x

x
just  
x

x
  
x

x
now,  
x

x
as  
x

x
Thorin  
x

x
had  
x

x
pointed  
x

x
out. 
x

x
Their  
x

x
ponies  
x

x
  
x

x
were  
x

x
lost  
x

x
or  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
they  
x

x
would  
x

x
have  
x

x
to  
x

x
wait  
x

x
  
x

x
some  
x

x
time  
x

x
before  
x

x
Smaug  
x

x
relaxed  
x

x
his  
x

x
watch  
x

x
  
x

x
sufficiently  
x

x
for  
x

x
them  
x

x
to  
x

x
dare  
x

x
the  
x

x
long  
x

x
way  
x

x
on  
x

x
foot. 
x

x
  
x

x
Luckily  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
saved  
x

x
enough  
x

x
of  
x

x
their  
x

x
stores  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
last  
x

x
them  
x

x
still  
x

x
for  
x

x
some  
x

x
time. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
They  
x

x
debated  
x

x
long  
x

x
on  
x

x
what  
x

x
was  
x

x
to  
x

x
be  
x

x
done,  
x

x
  
x

x
but  
x

x
they  
x

x
could  
x

x
think  
x

x
of  
x

x
no  
x

x
way  
x

x
of  
x

x
getting  
x

x
rid  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
Smaug  
x

x
—  
x

x
which  
x

x
had  
x

x
always  
x

x
been  
x

x
a  
x

x
weak  
x

x
point  
x

x
  
x

x
in  
x

x
their  
x

x
plans,  
x

x
as  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
felt  
x

x
inclined  
x

x
to  
x

x
point  
x

x
out. 
x

x
  
x

x
Then  
x

x
as  
x

x
is  
x

x
the  
x

x
nature  
x

x
of  
x

x
folk  
x

x
that  
x

x
are  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
they  
x

x
began  
x

x
to  
x

x
grumble  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbit,  
x

x
  
x

x
blaming  
x

x
him  
x

x
for  
x

x
what  
x

x
had  
x

x
at  
x

x
first  
x

x
so  
x

x
pleased  
x

x
  
x

x
them:  
x

x
for  
x

x

x

x
away  
x

x
a  
x

x
cup  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
up  
x

x
  
x

x
Smaug’s  
x

x
wrath  
x

x
so  
x

x
soon.

if  
x

x
Smaug  
x

x
hoped  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
get  
x

x
him  
x

x
to  
x

x
come  
x

x
nearer  
x

x
so  
x

x
easily  
x

x
he  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
disappointed. 
x

x
"No  
x

x
thank  
x

x
you,  
x

x
O  
x

x
Smaug  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
Tremendous!”  
x

x
he  
x

x
replied. 
x

x
“I  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
come  
x

x
for  
x

x
  
x

x
presents. 
x

x
I  
x

x
only  
x

x
wished  
x

x
to  
x

x
have  
x

x
a  
x

x
look  
x

x
at  
x

x
you  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
see  
x

x
if  
x

x
you  
x

x
were  
x

x
truly  
x

x
as  
x

x
great  
x

x
as  
x

x
tales  
x

x
say. 
x

x
I  
x

x
  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
believe  
x

x
them.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Do  
x

x
you  
x

x
now?”  
x

x
said  
x

x
the  
x

x
dragon  
x

x
somewhat  
x

x
  
x

x
flattered,  
x

x
even  
x

x
thouqh  
x

x
he  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
believe  
x

x
a  
x

x
word  
x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x
it. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

“Truly

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Greatest  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

“You  
x

x

x

x
nice  
x

x

x

x
for  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
liar,”  
x

x
said  
x

x

x

x
dragon. 
x

“You  
x

x

x

x
familiar  
x

x
with  
x

x
  
x

x
my  
x

x
name,  
x

x
but  
x

x

x

x
don’t  
x

x
seem  
x

x
to  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
smelling  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
you  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
you  
x

x

x

x
from,  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“You  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
from  
x

x
under  
x

x
the  
x

x
hill,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
through  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
I  
x

x
am  
x

x
he  
x

x
that  
x

x
walks  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

well

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

was  
x

x

x

x
for  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
“Lovely  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“But  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“I  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“I  
x

x

x

x
so  
x

x
last

night,”

“Lake-men,  
x

“Very  
x

x

x
O  
x

x
Barrel-rider!”  
x

x

x

x

x

x

“Maybe  
x

x
Barrel  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
said

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“Don’t  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
said

x
Smaug. 
x

x
“I  
x

x
know  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
one  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
not  
x

x

x

x
out  
x

x
at  
x

x
all,  
x

x
hobbit-smell;  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x

x

x
outside  
x

his  
x

x

x

x

x

x

him  
x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“I  
x

x

x

x
you  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
price  
x

x
for  
x

x
that  
x

x
cup  
x

x
  
x

x
last  
x

x
night?”  
x

x

x

x
went  
x

x
on. 
x

x
“Come  
x

x
now,  
x

x
did  
x

x
you?  
x

x
  
x

x
Nothing  
x

x
at  
x

x
all!  
x

x
Well,  
x

x

x

x

x

x
like  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
outside,  
x

x

what  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
for  
x

x

x

x
And  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

you  
x

x

it!  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
off  
x

x

x
you  
x

x

x

x

x
was  
x

x

x

x

x
to  
x

x

x

x

x

x

in  
x

x
the  
x

x
shadows,

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
possess  
x

x
a  
x

x
waistcoat  
x

x
of  
x

x
fine  
x

x
diamonds!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Yes,  
x

x
it  
x

x
is  
x

x
rare  
x

x
and  
x

x
wonderful,  
x

x
indeed,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
  
x

x
Smaug  
x

x
absurdly  
x

x
pleased. 
x

x
He  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
know  
x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
hobbit  
x

x

x

x
already  
x

x
caught  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“Look!”

x

x

x

sorry  
x

x
if  
x

x
  
x

x
you  
x

x
are  
x

x

x
about  
x

x
transport,

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
me  
x

x

x

x
not  
x

x
as  
x

x
you  
x

like!”

x

the

x

(long  
x

“The  
x

x

x

The  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

would  
x

x
not  
x

x
be  
x

x
troubled  
x

x
again  
x

x
from  
x

x
that  
x

x
direction. 
x

x
  
x

x
In  
x

x
the  
x

x
meanwhile  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
further  
x

x
vengeance  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
take. 
x

x
“Barrel-rider!”  
x

x
he  
x

x
snorted. 
x

x
“Your  
x

x
feet  
x

x
came  
x

x
  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
waterside  
x

x
and  
x

x
up  
x

x
the  
x

x
water  
x

x
you  
x

x
came  
x

x
  
x

x
without  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
I  
x

x
don’t  
x

x

x

x
your  
x

x
smell,  
x

x
but  
x

x
if  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
one  
x

x
of  
x

x
those  
x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
Lake,  
x

x
you  
x

x
  
x

x
had  
x

x
their  
x

x
help. 
x

x
They  
x

x
shall  
x

x
see  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
who  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
King  
x

x
under  
x

x
the  
x

x

x
Mountain!”

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
waiting,  
x

x
  
x

x
as  
x

x
it  
x

x
seemed,  
x

x
when  
x

x

x
were  
x

x
becoming  
x

x
  
x

choked  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
for  
x

x
want  
x

x
of  
x

x
air,  
x

x
they  
x

x
could  
x

x
  
x

x
bear  
x

x
it  
x

x
no  
x

x
longer. 
x

x

x

x
would  
x

x
almost  
x

x
have  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
sounds  
x

x
from  
x

x
below  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
dragon’s  
x

x
  
x

x
return. 
x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x
some  
x

x
cunning  
x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
his,  
x

x

x

x
could  
x

x
not  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

Thorin  
x

x

“Let  
x

x
us  
x

x
try  
x

x
the  
x

x
door!”  
x

x
he  
x

x

x

x
  
x

“I  
x

x
must  
x

x
feel  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
on  
x

x
my  
x

x
face  
x

x
soon  
x

x
or  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

Smaug

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

once  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“This

x

x

x

x

‘“While  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
as  
x

x

x

now

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

there  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

was  
x

x
on  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

At  
x

x
length  
x

x
Mr. 
x

x
Baggins  
x

x
could  
x

x
bear  
x

x
it  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
longer. 
x

x
“Confound  
x

x
you,  
x

x
Smaug,  
x

x
you  
x

x
worm!”  
x

x
he  
x

x
  
x

x
squeaked  
x

x

x

x
“Stop  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
me  
x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
then  
x

x
eat  
x

x
me,  
x

x
if  
x

x
you  
x

x
can  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
me!”

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
there  
x

x
was  
x

x

x

x

x
He  
x

x
went  
x

x
on,  
x

x
until  
x

x
he  
x

x
came  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
great  
x

x
  
x

x
doors  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
further  
x

x
side,  
x

x
and  
x

x
there  
x

x
a  
x

x
draught  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
air  
x

x
refreshed  
x

x
him,  
x

x
but  
x

x
it  
x

x
almost  
x

x
puffed  
x

x
out  
x

x
his  
x

x
  
x

x
light. 
x

x
He  
x

x
peeped  
x

x
timidly  
x

x
through,  
x

x
and  
x

x
caught  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
glimpse  
x

x
of  
x

x
great  
x

x
passages  
x

x
and  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
dim  
x

x
  
x

x
beginnings  
x

x
of  
x

x
wide  
x

x
stairs  
x

x
going  
x

x
up  
x

x
into  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
gloom. 
x

x
And  
x

x
still  
x

x
there  
x

x
was  
x

x
no  
x

x
sight  
x

x
nor  
x

x
sound  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
Smaug. 
x

x
He  
x

x
was  
x

x
just  
x

x
going  
x

x
to  
x

x
turn  
x

x
and  
x

x
go  
x

x
back,  
x

x
  
x

x
when  
x

x
a  
x

x
black  
x

x
shape  
x

x
swooped  
x

x
at  
x

x
him,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
brushed  
x

x
his  
x

x
face. 
x

x
He  
x

x
squeaked  
x

x
and  
x

x
started,  
x

x
  
x

x
stumbled  
x

x
backwards  
x

x
and  
x

x
fell. 
x

x
His  
x

x
torch  
x

x
dropped  
x

x
  
x

x
head  
x

x
downwards  
x

x
and  
x

x
went  
x

x
out!  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Only  
x

x
a  
x

x
bat,  
x

x
I  
x

x
suppose  
x

x
and  
x

x
hope!”  
x

x
he  
x

x
said  
x

x
  
x

x
miserably. 
x

x
“But  
x

x
now  
x

x
what  
x

x
am  
x

x
I  
x

x
to  
x

x
do?  
x

x
Which  
x

x
is  
x

x
  
x

x
East,  
x

x
South,  
x

x
North,  
x

x
or  
x

x
West?”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Thorin!  
x

x
Balin!  
x

x
Oin!  
x

x
Gloin!  
x

x
Fili!  
x

x
Kili!”  
x

x
he  
x

x
cried  
x

x
  
x

x
as  
x

x
loud  
x

x
as  
x

x
he  
x

x
could  
x

x
—  
x

x
it  
x

x
seemed  
x

x
a  
x

x
thin  
x

x
little  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
“The  
x

x
light’s  
x

x
gone  
x

x
  
x

x
out!  
x

x
Someone  
x

x
come  
x

x
and  
x

x
find  
x

x
me  
x

x
and  
x

x
help  
x

x
me!”  
x

x
  
x

x
For  
x

x
the  
x

x
moment  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x
had  
x

x
failed  
x

x
  
x

x
altogether. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Faintly  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
heard  
x

x
his  
x

x
small  
x

x
cries,  
x

x
  
x

x
though  
x

x
the  
x

x
only  
x

x
word  
x

x
they  
x

x
could  
x

x
catch  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
“help!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Now  
x

x
what  
x

x
on  
x

x
earth  
x

x
or  
x

x
under  
x

x
it  
x

x
has  
x

x
  
x

x
happened?”  
x

x
said  
x

x
Thorin. 
x

x
“Certainly  
x

x
not  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
dragon,  
x

x
or  
x

x
he  
x

x
would  
x

x
not  
x

x
go  
x

x
on  
x

x
squeaking.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
They  
x

x
waited  
x

x
a  
x

x
moment  
x

x
or  
x

x
two,  
x

x
and  
x

x
still  
x

x
there  
x

x
  
x

x
were  
x

x
no  
x

x
dragon-noises,  
x

x
no  
x

x

x

x
at  
x

x
all  
x

x
in  
x

x
fact  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
but  
x

x
Bilbo’s  
x

x
distant  
x

x
voice. 
x

x
“Come,  
x

x
one  
x

x
of  
x

x
you,  
x

x
  
x

x
get  
x

x
another  
x

x
light  
x

x
or  
x

x
two!”  
x

x
Thorin  
x

x
ordered. 
x

x
“It  
x

x
  
x

x
seems  
x

x
we  
x

x
have  
x

x
got  
x

x
to  
x

x
go  
x

x
and  
x

x
help  
x

x
our  
x

x
burglar.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“It  
x

x
is  
x

x
about  
x

x
our  
x

x
turn  
x

x
to  
x

x
help,”  
x

x

x

Balin,  
x

x
“and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

it  
x

x

x
  
x

x
safe  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
one  
x

x
by  
x

x
one,  
x

x
and  
x

x
went  
x

x
along  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
wall  
x

x
as  
x

x
hurriedly  
x

x
as  
x

x
they  
x

x
could. 
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
not  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

Bilbo  
x

x
himself  
x

x
coming  
x

x
back  
x

x
  
x

x
towards  
x

x
them. 
x

x
His  
x

x

x

x
had  
x

x
quickly  
x

x
returned  
x

x
as  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
as  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

“Only  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

a  
x

x

x

x

x

nothing  
x

x
  
x

x
worse!”  
x

he  
x

x
said  
x

x
in  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“Mr. 
x

x
Baggins!”  
x

x

x

“Here

With  
x

he  
x

x
put  
x

x
on  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
a  
x

x
small  
x

x
coat  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
mail,  
x

x
wrought  
x

x
for  
x

x
some  
x

x
young  
x

x
elf-prince  
x

x
long  
x

x
  
x

x
ago. 
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
of  
x

x
silver-steel,  
x

x
which  
x

x
the  
x

x
elves  
x

x
call  
x

x
  
x

x
mithril,  
x

x
and  
x

x
with  
x

x
it  
x

x
went  
x

x
a  
x

x
belt  
x

x
of  
x

x
pearls  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
crystals. 
x

x
A  
x

x
light  
x

x
helm  
x

x
of  
x

x
figured  
x

x
leather,  
x

x
  
x

x
strengthened  
x

x
beneath  
x

x
with  
x

x
hoops  
x

x
of  
x

x
steel,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
studded  
x

x
about  
x

x
the  
x

x
brim  
x

x
with  
x

x
white  
x

x
gems,  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
set  
x

x
upon  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
head. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“I  
x

x

x

x

x

x
he  
x

x
thought;  
x

x
“but  
x

x
I  
x

x
expect  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
look  
x

x
rather  
x

x

x

x
How  
x

x
they  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
Hill  
x

x

x

x
home!  
x

x
Still  
x

x
I  
x

x
wish  
x

x
there  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
looking-  
x

x
  
x

x
glass  
x

x
handy!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
All  
x

x
the  
x

x
same  
x

x
Mr. 
x

x
Baggins  
x

x
kept  
x

x
his  
x

x
head  
x

x
  
x

x
more  
x

x
clear  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
hoard  
x

x
than  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
did. 
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x
down  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
end  
x

x
of  
x

x
it  
x

x
all  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
“I  
x

x

x

x

x

x
a  
x

x
good  
x

x
many  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“for  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
something  
x

x
cheering  
x

x
out  
x

x
of  
x

x
one  
x

x
of  
x

x
Beorn’s  
x

x
  
x

x
wooden  
x

x
bowls!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Thorin!”  
x

x
he  
x

x
cried  
x

x
aloud. 
x

x
“What  
x

x
next?  
x

x
We  
x

x
  
x

x
are  
x

x

x

x
but  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Smaug  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
is  
x

x
not  
x

x
yet  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
tempted  
x

x

x

x
too  
x

x
long!”  
x

x
  
x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
answered  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

Not  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
hailed  
x

x
the  
x

x
others,  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
had  
x

x
covered  
x

again  
x

x
with  
x

x
their  
x

x

x

x
cloaks  
x

x
and  
x

x
their  
x

x

x

x
helms  
x

x
with  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
one  
x

x
by  
x

x
one  
x

they  
x

x

x
behind  
x

x
Thorin,  
x

x
a

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
in  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
for  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

yet  
x

more

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

Out  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x
deep  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
sent  
x

x
its  
x

x
pale  
x

x
light  
x

x
between  
x

x
the  
x

x
arms  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
Mountain,  
x

x
and  
x

x
beams  
x

x
of  
x

x
gold  
x

x
fell  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
pavement  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
threshold. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
A  
x

x
whirl  
x

x
of  
x

x
bats  
x

x
frightened  
x

x
from  
x

x
slumber  
x

x
by  
x

x
  
x

x
their  
x

x
smoking  
x

x
torches  
x

x
flurried  
x

x
over  
x

x
them;  
x

x
as  
x

x
they  
x

x
  
x

x
sprang  
x

x
forward  
x

x
their  
x

x
feet  
x

x
slithered  
x

x
on  
x

x
stones  
x

x
  
x

x
rubbed  
x

x
smooth  
x

x
and  
x

x
slimed  
x

x
by  
x

x
the  
x

x
passing  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
dragon. 
x

x
Now  
x

x
before  
x

x
them  
x

x
the  
x

x
water  
x

x
fell  
x

x
  
x

x
noisily  
x

x
outward  
x

x
and  
x

x
foamed  
x

x
down  
x

x
towards  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
valley. 
x

x
They  
x

x
flung  
x

x
their  
x

x
pale  
x

x
torches  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
ground,  
x

x
and  
x

x
stood  
x

x
gazing  
x

x
out  
x

x
with  
x

x
dazzled  
x

x
  
x

x
eyes. 
x

x
They  
x

x
were  
x

x
come  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
Front  
x

x
Gate,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
were  
x

x
looking  
x

x
out  
x

x
upon  
x

x
Dale. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Well!”  
x

x
said  
x

x
Bilbo,  
x

x
“I  
x

x
never  
x

x
expected  
x

x
to  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
looking  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
again,  
x

x
and  
x

x
to  
x

feel  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
wind  
x

x
on  
x

x
my  
x

x

x

x
But,  
x

x
ow!  
x

x
this  
x

x
wind  
x

x
is  
x

x
cold!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
It  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x

x
the  
x

x
arms  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Mountain  
x

x
into  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
among  
x

x

x

x

x

x
After  
x

x
their  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
‘‘and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

Smaug’s  
x

x

“And

x

“Five  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“Dear  
x

x

“More

x

x

x
they  
x

x
struck  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
old  
x

x
road,  
x

x
and  
x

x
before  
x

x
long  
x

x
came  
x

x
to  
x

x
a  
x

x
deep  
x

x
dell

x

x
among  
x

x
the  
x

x
rocks;  
x

x
there  
x

x
they  
x

x
  
x

x
rested  
x

x
for  
x

x
a  
x

x
while  
x

x

x

x
had  
x

x
such  
x

x
a  
x

x
breakfast  
x

x
as  
x

x
  
x

x
they  
x

x

x

x
chiefly  
x

x
cram  
x

x
and  
x

x
water. 
x

x
(If  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
I  
x

x

x

x
only  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
is  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

for

qoinq

downwards

East

FIRE

x
AND

WATER

x

x

x

x

x
news  
x

x

Smaug,  
x

x

x
must  
x

x
go  
x

x
back  
x

x
again  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
evening  
x

x

x

x
he  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
door  
x

x

x

x
off  
x

x

x
in  
x

x
rage,  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

Esgaroth  
x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
was  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
black  
x

x
East  
x

x
and  
x

x
chill,  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
were  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
quays,  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x
they  
x

x

x
fond  
x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
out  
x

x

x

x

x

x

lake  
x

x
as  
x

x
they  
x

x
opened  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x

x
  
x

x

x
their  
x

x
town  
x

x
the  
x

x
Lonely  
x

x
Mountain

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
Running  
x

x
River  
x

came  
x

x
down  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
North. 
x

x

x

x
its  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x
they  
x

x
see  
x

x
in  
x

x
clear  
x

x
weather,  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
it,  
x

x

x

x
it  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
drear  
x

even  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

Suddenly  
x

x

x

x

x

x
back  
x

x

x

x
view;  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x
glow  
x

x
touched  
x

x
it  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Look!”  
x

x
said  
x

x
one. 
x

x
“The  
x

x
lights  
x

x
again!  
x

x
Last  
x

x
  
x

x
night  
x

x
the  
x

x
watchmen  
x

x
saw  
x

x
them  
x

x
start  
x

x
and  
x

x
fade  
x

x
  
x

x
from  
x

x
midnight  
x

x
until  
x

x
dawn. 
x

x
Something  
x

x
is  
x

x
  
x

x
happening  
x

x
up  
x

x
there.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Perhaps  
x

x
the  
x

x
King  
x

x
under  
x

x
the  
x

x
Mountain  
x

x
is  
x

x
  
x

x
forging  
x

x
gold,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
another. 
x

x
“It  
x

x
is  
x

x
long  
x

x
since  
x

x
he  
x

x
  
x

x
went  
x

x
North. 
x

x
It  
x

x
is  
x

x
time  
x

x
the  
x

x
songs  
x

x
began  
x

x
to  
x

x
prove  
x

x
  
x

x
themselves  
x

x
again.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Which  
x

x
king?”  
x

x
said  
x

x
another  
x

x
with  
x

x
a  
x

x
grim  
x

x
  
x

x
voice. 
x

x
“As  
x

x
like  
x

x
as  
x

x
not  
x

x
it  
x

x
is  
x

x
the  
x

x
marauding  
x

x
fire  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
Dragon,  
x

x
the  
x

x
only  
x

x
king  
x

x
under  
x

x
the  
x

x
Mountain  
x

x
  
x

x
we  
x

x
have  
x

x
ever  
x

x
known.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“You  
x

x
are  
x

x
always  
x

x
foreboding  
x

x
gloomy  
x

x
things!”  
x

x
  
x

x
said  
x

x
the  
x

x
others. 
x

x
“Anything  
x

x
from  
x

x
floods  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
poisoned  
x

x
fish. 
x

x
Think  
x

x
of  
x

x
something  
x

x
cheerful!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Then  
x

x
suddenly  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
light  
x

x
appeared  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
low  
x

x
place  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
hills  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
northern  
x

x
end  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
lake  
x

x
turned  
x

x
golden. 
x

x
“The  
x

x
King  
x

x
beneath  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
Mountain!”  
x

x
they  
x

x
shouted. 
x

x
“His  
x

x
wealth  
x

x
is  
x

x
like  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
his  
x

x
silver  
x

x
like  
x

x
a  
x

x
fountain,  
x

x
his  
x

x
rivers  
x

x
golden  
x

x
  
x

x
run!  
x

x
The  
x

x
river  
x

x
is  
x

x
running  
x

x
gold  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
Mountain!”  
x

x
they  
x

x
cried,  
x

x
and  
x

x
everywhere  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
were  
x

x
opening  
x

x
and  
x

x
feet  
x

x
were  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
There  
x

x
was  
x

x
once  
x

x
more  
x

x
a  
x

x
tremendous  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
But  
x

x
the  
x

x
grim-  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
fellow  
x

x
ran  
x

x
hotfoot  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
Master. 
x

x
“The  
x

x
  
x

x
dragon  
x

x
is  
x

x
coming  
x

x
or  
x

x
I  
x

x
am  
x

x
a  
x

x
fool!”  
x

x
he  
x

x
cried. 
x

x
“Cut  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
bridges!  
x

x
To  
x

x
arms!  
x

x
To  
x

x
arms!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Then  
x

x
warning  
x

x
trumpets  
x

x
were  
x

x
suddenly  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
along  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

So

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
could  
x

x
see  
x

x
him  
x

x
as  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
them  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

down

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

(Bard  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the

x

x

x
to  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
last  
x

x
arrow. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
from  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x
all  
x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
A  
x

x

x
of  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

huddled  
x

x
into  
x

x
laden  
x

x
boats  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
market-pool. 
x

x
  
x

x
Weapons  
x

x
were  
x

x
flung  
x

x
down. 
x

x
There  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
mourning  
x

x

x

x
where  
x

x
but  
x

x
a  
x

x

x
time  
x

x
  
x

x
ago  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
songs  
x

x
of  
x

x
mirth  
x

x
to  
x

x

x
had  
x

x
been  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
their  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

in  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

fine  
x

x

their

x
think  
x

x
  
x

x
again  
x

x
of  
x

x
your  
x

x
words  
x

x
and  
x

x
go  
x

x
North  
x

x
with  
x

x
any  
x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x
will  
x

x
follow  
x

x
me.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Then  
x

x
he  
x

x
strode  
x

x
off  
x

x
to  
x

x
help  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
ordering  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
camps  
x

x
and  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
care  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
sick  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
wounded. 
x

x
But  
x

x
the  
x

x
Master  
x

x
scowled  
x

x
at  
x

x
his  
x

x
back  
x

x
  
x

x
as  
x

x
he  
x

x
went,  
x

x
and  
x

x
remained  
x

x
sitting  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
ground. 
x

x
  
x

x
He  
x

x
thought  
x

x
much  
x

x
but  
x

x
said  
x

x
little,  
x

x
unless  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x
call  
x

x
loudly  
x

x
for  
x

x
men  
x

x
to  
x

x
bring  
x

x
him  
x

x
fire  
x

x
and  
x

x
food. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Now  
x

x
everywhere  
x

x
Bard  
x

x
went  
x

x
he  
x

x
found  
x

x
talk  
x

x
  
x

x
running  
x

x
like  
x

x
fire  
x

x
among  
x

x
the  
x

x
people  
x

x
concerning  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
vast  
x

x
treasure  
x

x
that  
x

x
was  
x

x
now  
x

x
unguarded. 
x

x
Men  
x

x
  
x

x
spoke  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
recompense  
x

x
for  
x

x
all  
x

x
their  
x

x
harm  
x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x
they  
x

x
would  
x

x
soon  
x

x
get  
x

x
from  
x

x
it,  
x

x
and  
x

x
wealth  
x

x
over  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
to  
x

x
spare  
x

x
with  
x

x
which  
x

x
to  
x

x
buy  
x

x
rich  
x

x
things  
x

x
from  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
South;  
x

x
and  
x

x
it  
x

x
cheered  
x

x
them  
x

x
greatly  
x

x
in  
x

x
their  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
plight. 
x

x
That  
x

x
was  
x

x
as  
x

x
well,  
x

x
for  
x

x
the  
x

x
night  
x

x
was  
x

x
bitter  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
miserable. 
x

x
Shelters  
x

x
could  
x

x
be  
x

x
contrived  
x

x
for  
x

x
  
x

x
few  
x

x
(the  
x

x
Master  
x

x
had  
x

x
one)  
x

x
and  
x

x
there  
x

x
was  
x

x
little  
x

x
  
x

x
food  
x

x
(even  
x

x
the  
x

x
Master  
x

x
went  
x

x
short). 
x

x
Many  
x

x
took  
x

x
ill  
x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
that  
x

x
night,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
died,  
x

x
who  
x

x
had  
x

x
escaped  
x

x
uninjured  
x

x
  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
town;  
x

x
and  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
days  
x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x
followed  
x

x
there  
x

x
was  
x

x
much  
x

x
sickness  
x

x
and  
x

x
great  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
as  
x

x

x

x

x
though  
x

x
always  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
name,  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
had  
x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
people  
x

x
and  
x

x
direct  
x

x
the  
x

x
preparations  
x

x
  
x

for  
x

x
their  
x

x
protection  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
for  
x

x
Bard  
x

x
at  
x

x
once  
x

x

x
had  
x

x
speedy  
x

x
messengers  
x

x
sent  
x

x
up  
x

x
the  
x

x
river  
x

to  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

these

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
already  
x

x
on  
x

x
the  
x

x
move,  
x

x
although  
x

x
it  
x

x
was  
x

x
then  
x

x
  
x

x
only  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x
Smaug. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
had  
x

x
received  
x

x
news  
x

x
from  
x

x
his  
x

x

x
own  
x

x
messengers  
x

x
and  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
birds  
x

x

x

x
loved  
x

x
  
x

x
his  
x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
already  
x

x
knew  
x

x
much  
x

x
of  
x

x

x

x
had  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
great  
x

x
indeed  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
among  
x

x
all  
x

x
things  
x

x
with  
x

x
wings  
x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
here  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
there  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
borders  
x

x
of  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x
over  
x

x

x

x

x

x
spread:  
x

x
“Smaug  
x

x
is  
x

x
  
x

x
dead!”  
x

x
Leaves  
x

x
rustled  
x

x
and  
x

x
startled  
x

x

x

x
were  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
news  
x

x

x

x
west  
x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
had  
x

x

x
it

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

“That  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
“He  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

an  
x

x

x

x

x

x
all  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x
“that  
x

x
  
x

x
blows  
x

x
no  
x

x
one  
x

x
any  
x

x
good.”  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
So  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
was  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x
thick  
x

x
above  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x
thought  
x

x
that  
x

x

x

x
was  
x

x
awakening  
x

x
again,  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
as  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
But  
x

x
the  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
was  
x

x
the  
x

x
lord  
x

x
of  
x

x
a  
x

x
good  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
kindly  
x

x
people;  
x

x
so  
x

x
turning  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

now  
x

x
down  
x

x

x

x
Long

x

Lake. 
x

x
He  
x

x
had  
x

x
not  
x

x
boats  
x

x

x

x
for

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
by  
x

x
foot;  
x

x
but  
x

x
great  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
ahead  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x
Still  
x

x
elves  
x

x
are  
x

x
light-footed,  
x

x
and  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

treacherous  
x

x

x

x
between  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
Forest  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
Lake,  
x

x
their  
x

x
going  
x

x
was  
x

x
swift. 
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
death  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
was  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
With  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Master  
x

x
remained  
x

x
behind;  
x

x
and  
x

x
with  
x

x
him  
x

x
were  
x

x
  
x

x
some  
x

x
men  
x

x
of  
x

x
crafts  
x

x
and  
x

x
many  
x

x
skilled  
x

x
elves;  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
they  
x

x
busied  
x

x
themselves  
x

x
felling  
x

x
trees,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
collecting  
x

x
the  
x

x
timber  
x

x
sent  
x

x
down  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
Forest. 
x

x
  
x

x
Then  
x

x
they  
x

x
set  
x

x
about  
x

x
raising  
x

x
many  
x

x
huts  
x

x
by  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
shore  
x

x
against  
x

x
the  
x

x
oncoming  
x

x
winter;  
x

x
and  
x

x
also  
x

x
  
x

x
under  
x

x
the  
x

x
Master’s  
x

x
direction  
x

x
they  
x

x
began  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
planning  
x

x
of  
x

x
a  
x

x
new  
x

x
town,  
x

x
designed  
x

x
more  
x

x
fair  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
large  
x

x
even  
x

x
than  
x

x
before,  
x

x
but  
x

x
not  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
same  
x

x
  
x

x
place. 
x

x
They  
x

x
removed  
x

x
northward  
x

x
higher  
x

x
up  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
shore;  
x

x
for  
x

x
ever  
x

x
after  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
a  
x

x
dread  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
water  
x

x
where  
x

x
the  
x

x
dragon  
x

x
lay. 
x

x
He  
x

x
would  
x

x
never  
x

x
  
x

x
again  
x

x
return  
x

x
to  
x

x
his  
x

x
golden  
x

x
bed,  
x

x
but  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
stretched  
x

x
cold  
x

x
as  
x

x
stone,  
x

x
twisted  
x

x
upon  
x

x
the  
x

x
floor  
x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
shallows. 
x

x
There  
x

x
for  
x

x
ages  
x

x
his  
x

x
huge  
x

x
bones  
x

x
  
x

x
could  
x

x
be  
x

x
seen  
x

x
in  
x

x
calm  
x

x
weather  
x

x
amid  
x

x
the  
x

x
ruined  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
piles  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
old  
x

x
town. 
x

x
But  
x

x
few  
x

x
dared  
x

x
to  
x

x
cross  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
cursed  
x

x
spot,  
x

x
and  
x

x
none  
x

x
dared  
x

x
to  
x

x
dive  
x

x
into  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
shivering  
x

x
water  
x

x
or  
x

x
recover  
x

x
the  
x

x
precious  
x

x
stones  
x

x
  
x

x
that  
x

x
fell  
x

x
from  
x

x
his  
x

x
rotting  
x

x
carcase. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
But  
x

x
all  
x

x
the  
x

x
men  
x

x
of  
x

x
arms  
x

x
who  
x

x
were  
x

x
still  
x

x
able,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
most  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
Elvenking’s  
x

x
array,  
x

x
got  
x

x
ready  
x

x
  
x

x
to  
x

x
march  
x

x
north  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
Mountain. 
x

x
It  
x

x
was  
x

x
thus  
x

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x
in  
x

x
eleven  
x

x
days  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
ruin  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
town  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
head  
x

x
of  
x

x
their  
x

x
host  
x

x
passed  
x

x
the  
x

x
rock-gates  
x

x
at  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
end  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
lake  
x

x
and  
x

x
came  
x

x
into  
x

x
the  
x

x
desolate  
x

x
  
x

x
lands. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

Chapter  
x

x
XV

x

x
THE  
x

x
GATHERING  
x

x
OF  
x

x
THE  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
CLOUDS  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Now  
x

x
we  
x

x
will  
x

x
return  
x

x
to  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves. 
x

x
All  
x

x
  
x

x
night  
x

x
one  
x

x
of  
x

x
them  
x

x
had  
x

x
watched,  
x

x
but  
x

x
when  
x

x
  
x

x
morning  
x

x
came  
x

x
they  
x

x
had  
x

x
not  
x

x
heard  
x

x
or  
x

x
seen  
x

x
any  
x

x
  
x

x
sign  
x

x
of  
x

x
danger. 
x

x
But  
x

x
ever  
x

x
more  
x

x
thickly  
x

x
the  
x

x
birds  
x

x
  
x

x
were  
x

x
gathering. 
x

x
Their  
x

x
companies  
x

x
came  
x

x
flying  
x

x
  
x

x
from  
x

x
the  
x

x
South;  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
crows  
x

x
that  
x

x
still  
x

x
lived  
x

x
  
x

x
about  
x

x
the  
x

x
Mountain  
x

x
were  
x

x
wheeling  
x

x
and  
x

x
crying  
x

x
  
x

x
unceasingly  
x

x
above. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Something  
x

x
strange  
x

x
is  
x

x
happening,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
  
x

x
Thorin. 
x

x
“The  
x

x
time  
x

x
has  
x

x
gone  
x

x
for  
x

x
the  
x

x
autumn  
x

x
  
x

x
wanderings;  
x

x
and  
x

x
these  
x

x
are  
x

x
birds  
x

x
that  
x

x
dwell  
x

x
  
x

x
always  
x

x
in  
x

x
the  
x

x
land;  
x

x
there  
x

x
are  
x

x
starlings  
x

x
and  
x

x
flocks  
x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x
finches;  
x

x
and  
x

x
far  
x

x
off  
x

x
there  
x

x
are  
x

x
many  
x

x
carrion  
x

x
  
x

x
birds  
x

x
as  
x

x
if  
x

x
a  
x

x
battle  
x

x
were  
x

x
afoot!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Suddenly  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
pointed:  
x

x
“There  
x

x
is  
x

x
that  
x

x
old  
x

x
  
x

x
thrush  
x

x
again!”  
x

x
he  
x

x
cried. 
x

x
“He  
x

x
seems  
x

x
to  
x

x
have  
x

x
  
x

x
escaped,  
x

x
when  
x

x
Smaug  
x

x
smashed  
x

x
the  
x

x
mountain-  
x

x
  
x

x
side,  
x

x
but  
x

x
I  
x

x
don’t  
x

x
suppose  
x

x
the  
x

x
snails  
x

x
have!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Sure  
x

x
enough  
x

x
the  
x

x
old  
x

x
thrush  
x

x
was  
x

x
there,  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
as  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
pointed,  
x

x
he  
x

x
flew  
x

x
towards  
x

x
them  
x

x
and  
x

x
  
x

x
perched  
x

x
on  
x

x
a  
x

x
stone  
x

x
near  
x

x
by. 
x

x
Then  
x

x
he  
x

x
fluttered  
x

x
  
x

x
his  
x

x
wings  
x

x
and  
x

x
sang;  
x

x
then  
x

x
he  
x

x
cocked  
x

x
his  
x

x
head  
x

x
  
x

x
on  
x

x
one  
x

x
side,  
x

x
as  
x

x
if  
x

x
to  
x

x
listen;  
x

x
and  
x

x
again  
x

x
he  
x

x
sang,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
again  
x

x
he  
x

x
listened. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“I  
x

x
believe  
x

x
he  
x

x
is  
x

x
trying  
x

x
to  
x

x
tell  
x

x
us  
x

x
something,”  
x

x
  
x

x
said  
x

x
Balin;  
x

x
‘‘but  
x

x
I  
x

x
cannot  
x

x
follow  
x

x
the  
x

x
speech  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
such  
x

x
birds,  
x

x
it  
x

x
is  
x

x
very  
x

x
quick  
x

x
and  
x

x
difficult. 
x

x
Can  
x

x
you  
x

x
  
x

x
make  
x

x
it  
x

x
out  
x

x
Baggins?”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
"Not  
x

x
very  
x

x
well,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
Bilbo  
x

x
(as  
x

x
a  
x

x
matter  
x

x
of  
x

x
  
x

x
fact,  
x

x
he  
x

x
could  
x

x
make  
x

x
nothing  
x

x
of  
x

x
it  
x

x
at  
x

x
all);  
x

x
“but  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
old  
x

x
fellow  
x

x
seems  
x

x
very  
x

x
excited.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“I  
x

x
only  
x

x
wish  
x

x
he  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
raven!”  
x

x
said  
x

x
Balin. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“I  
x

x
thought  
x

x
you  
x

x
did  
x

x
not  
x

x
like  
x

x
them!  
x

x
You  
x

x
  
x

x
seemed  
x

x
very  
x

x
shy  
x

x
of  
x

x
them,  
x

x
when  
x

x
we  
x

x
came  
x

x
this  
x

x
  
x

x
way  
x

x
before.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Those  
x

x
were  
x

x
crows!  
x

x
And  
x

x
nasty  
x

x
suspicious-  
x

x
  
x

x
looking  
x

x
creatures  
x

x
at  
x

x
that,  
x

x
and  
x

x
rude  
x

x
as  
x

x
well. 
x

x
You  
x

x
  
x

x
must  
x

x
have  
x

x
heard  
x

x
the  
x

x
ugly  
x

x
names  
x

x
they  
x

x
were  
x

x
  
x

x
calling  
x

x
after  
x

x
us. 
x

x
But  
x

x
the  
x

x
ravens  
x

x
are  
x

x
different. 
x

x
  
x

x
There  
x

x
used  
x

x
to  
x

x
be  
x

x
great  
x

x
friendship  
x

x
between  
x

x
  
x

x
them  
x

x
and  
x

x
the  
x

x
people  
x

x
of  
x

x
Thror;  
x

x
and  
x

x
they  
x

x
often  
x

x
  
x

x
brought  
x

x
us  
x

x
secret  
x

x
news,  
x

x
and  
x

x
were  
x

x
rewarded  
x

x
  
x

x
with  
x

x
such  
x

x
bright  
x

x
things  
x

x
as  
x

x
they  
x

x
coveted  
x

x
to  
x

x
hide  
x

x
  
x

x
in  
x

x
their  
x

x
dwellings. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“They  
x

x
live  
x

x
many  
x

x
a  
x

x
year,  
x

x
and  
x

x
their  
x

x
memories  
x

x
  
x

x
are  
x

x
long,  
x

x
and  
x

x
they  
x

x
hand  
x

x
on  
x

x
their  
x

x
wisdom  
x

x
to  
x

x
their  
x

x
  
x

x
children. 
x

x
I  
x

x
knew  
x

x
many  
x

x
among  
x

x
the  
x

x
ravens  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
rocks  
x

x
when  
x

x
I  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
dwarf-lad. 
x

x
This  
x

x
very  
x

x
height  
x

x
  
x

x
was  
x

x
once  
x

x
named  
x

x
Ravenhill,  
x

x
because  
x

x
there  
x

x
was  
x

x
  
x

x
a  
x

x
wise  
x

x
and  
x

x
famous  
x

x
pair,  
x

x
old  
x

x
Care  
x

x
and  
x

x
his  
x

x
wife,  
x

x
  
x

x
that  
x

x
lived  
x

x
here  
x

x
above  
x

x
the  
x

x
guard-chamber. 
x

x
But  
x

x
I  
x

x
  
x

x
don’t  
x

x
suppose  
x

x
that  
x

x
any  
x

x
of  
x

x
that  
x

x
ancient  
x

x
breed  
x

x
  
x

x
linger  
x

x
here  
x

x
now.”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
No  
x

x
sooner  
x

x
had  
x

x
he  
x

x
finished  
x

x
speaking  
x

x
than  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
old  
x

x
thrush  
x

x
gave  
x

x
a  
x

x
loud  
x

x
call,  
x

x
and  
x

x
immediately  
x

x
  
x

x
flew  
x

x
away. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“We  
x

x
may  
x

x
not  
x

x
understand  
x

x
him,  
x

x
but  
x

x
that  
x

x
old  
x

x
  
x

x
bird  
x

x
understands  
x

x
us,  
x

x
I  
x

x
am  
x

x
sure,”  
x

x
said  
x

x
Balin. 
x

x
  
x

x
“Keep  
x

x
watch  
x

x
now,  
x

x
and  
x

x
see  
x

x
what  
x

x
happens!”  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Before  
x

x
long  
x

x
there  
x

x
was  
x

x
a  
x

x
fluttering  
x

x
of  
x

x
wings,  
x

x
  
x

x
and  
x

x
back  
x

x
came  
x

x
the  
x

x
thrush;  
x

x
and  
x

x
with  
x

x
him  
x

x
came  
x

x
a  
x

x
  
x

x
most  
x

x
decrepit  
x

x
old  
x

x
bird.

x
that  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
adventure  
x

x
was,  
x

x
properly  
x

x
speaking,  
x

x
over  
x

x
with  
x

x
  
x

x
the  
x

x
death  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
dragon  
x

x
—  
x

x
in  
x

x
which  
x

x
he  
x

x
was  
x

x
much  
x

x
  
x

x
mistaken  
x

x
—  
x

x
and  
x

x
he  
x

x
would  
x

x
have  
x

x
given  
x

x
most  
x

x
of  
x

x
his  
x

x
  
x

x
share  
x

x
of  
x

x
the  
x

x
profits  
x

x
for  
x

x
the  
x

x
peaceful  
x

x
winding  
x

x
up  
x

x
  
x

x
of  
x

x
these  
x

x
affairs. 
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
“Back  
x

x
to  
x

x
the  
x

x
Mountain!”  
x

x
cried  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
  
x

x
as  
x

x
if  
x

x
they  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
back  
x

x

x

x
had  
x

x
to  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x
with  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
of  
x

x

x

x
events  
x

x
already,  
x

x
  
x

you  
x

x

x

x
see  
x

x
that  
x

x
the  
x

x
dwarves  
x

x
still  
x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x
them. 
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

once  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
Front  
x

x

x

x
remained  
x

x

x

x
all  
x

x
the  
x

x
other  
x

x
  
x

x
gates  
x

x
(except,  
x

x
of  
x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
small  
x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

had  
x

x
long  
x

x
ago  
x

x

x

x
broken  
x

x
and  
x

x
blocked  
x

x
by  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x
Smaug,  
x

x
and  
x

x
no  
x

x
sign  
x

x
of  
x

x
them  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

were  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
that  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
work  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
them  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
they  
x

x

x

x
that  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
the  
x

x
Lake,  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
a  
x

x

x

x

x

x
Better  
x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
  
x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x

x
